hotels.name: YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road (SG Clean Certified)
hotels.address: 366 Orchard Road, Orchard, Singapore, Singapore, 238904

reviews.review_comment: Booked for 3D2N with balcony, the experience is amazing, room design is great and location is very centralised. Good choice for a short staycay
not bad
Took the balcony room with queen bed. Great view, room is well spaced out.
Good location, clean & comfortable. I love the adorable robot

I was at Yotel Singapore only for two nights. Room was very efficient made, just right as your outside most of the time anyway. I saw I nice mixture in the age of the guests. Guys like me, families and young people. Especially for the young people it is convenient that the hotel is real 2022 ! For me, 64 yrs, when I had some questions all the staff was great with their assistance. Also the IT man (senior) that helped me out with my mobile charge problems. All in all compliments ! Well done all.
Used the room for a birthday celebration & to use the pool! Quite cosy. Just nice for 4 pax. We didn’t stayover though. Convenient location!
Design is smart, bed is smart. There's robot for stuff delivering

reviews.review_title: Dated hotel in a good location ”
reviews.review_comment: The beds were too soft and the air conditioning could be colder. The lights and air conditioning would switch off because of the motion sensor, so it becomes a problem when you are sitting at the toilet bowl a little longer then usual.
It was a great weekend getaway. I just love the view from the room.
Location is very good.. But the BED is realyyyyy bad...veryyyyy uncomfortable...i cannot sleep because the bed..i think they use cheap BED...i will never ever stay in this hotel again

reviews.review_title: Best Value Central Orchard Road Hotel”
reviews.review_comment: Yotel is centrally located and reasonably priced for Orchard Road - convenient for everything
very small room, stressful stay
room is for solo or couple only
Room is small. If you’re looking for a solo staycation to rest your mind and charge yourself, this hotel will great for you!
very clean 👍
Nice! Good job.
convience to orchard shopping areas, easy access to MRT. polite and helpful crews.

Yotel is the benchmark for hotels. Ever since my first stay on 31 Dec last year, I’ve never considered any other hotels. It’s been my to-go place for my past two staycations. I’ve already booked my third one and can’t wait to return! Yotel is clean, tidy and has fabulous staff. The hotel feels just like my second home. It feels welcoming and comfortable to stay there. Give Yotel a try! (Or many :P)

Pros: Nicely furnished room with adjustable bed. Body wash, shampoo, conditioner, moisturizer and toothpaste/toothbrush provided. Vanity kit is available upon request. There is also Iron in the room which comes in handy for business traveler. Nice view out the window. International tv channels. AI robot helps to deliver extra bottled waters or towel which is interesting to see. Cons: Room is small. Bathroom floods each time you take a shower. Has self-check in kiosk but not very dummy proof (staff is prompt to jump in and help though).
Clean room, with fantastic location at the heart of Orchard Road. Only thing about the room is that it is very small, door opens right to the bed.
Good location to orchard shopping centres, easy to access subway. helpful crews.
Room is really tiny but hotel is conveniently located near all the huge malls. Within walking distance
Is too small
Neat
Good size compact space of a room. Splendid view from room/balcony. Location is very very good, walking distance to shaw movie theatre, shopping malls and food places.
Sinking in your bed.
Nil
Great location... Clean rooms... Downside.. Rooms service only once in 4 days

The location is good, close to everywhere. However the bed is too soft for comfort, it will sink when we sleep on it, and the room is too damp. I hang a jeans, it felt cold and damp when I wore it the next day.

I would highly recommend this hotel for short staycations. My overall stay was near perfection except for the fact that the housekeeping staff was making so much noise in the early morning around 7-8AM, when most guests are still sleeping. Despite calling the front desk and letting them know about this issue, the noises still persisted the next morning. I am very disappointed with this experience. I'm not talking about any noise, it's those noises where staff were laughing and shouting at the top of their lungs. I hope you can tell your staff to be more considerate for the guests in the future. All in all, I would still come back to stay at this hotel.

reviews.review_title: A Gem in the Heart of Town”
reviews.review_comment: Stayed here twice and the standard has been great and consistent. The staff are nice and friendly and above all professional in helping you no matter how busy they are. The room is small but its comfortable and clean. Price is afforadable for a place located at the buzz of town. Love the view from the room. Will not hesitate to come back again.
Room was small but cozy. Second time staying at Yotel and service and cleanliness was great. Plenty of food around the area as well

reviews.review_title: Great location for Orchard Road shoppers”
reviews.review_comment: A very smart and stylish hotel. I had a great view from the ceiling to floor windows in my room. Loved the cute robots who did room service.

reviews.review_title: Value for money but bed wasn’t the best ”
reviews.review_comment: Good deal for a hotel in the heart of Orchard. Small room but cozy enough. Bed was weird, not sure if it’s the mechanics of the smart bed but partner and I felt like we were sinking in, and if too close to the edge it feels like the bed is pushing you off. May stay again for the convenient location, but not ideal if you’re looking for a good night’s rest.
Great Hotel...
Room is quite small but the incline bed makes a different. Staff was nice and efficient. Location was perfect.
Not too bad! Clean.

Pros: clean. Has all basic amenities. Fantastic location Con: Stayed in the premium room. Had the worst sleep among all the hotels ive stayed in my entire life. The bed was sinking.. also since the bed was able to go up and down, i can feel the bend on the bed ard the area that was able to lift up. I thot only one side was sinking... the whole bed was sinking when i sat around to find a comfortable position. Its was a horrible night sleep. The pillow was alrite. My biggest issue is the bed. A hotel is for u to rest. If u are not fussy about a sinking bed and is ok waking up with a backache, by all means this hotel is for u, otherwise, look elsewhere.
Nope

Thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Yotel. The view was great from the 27th floor, and although the room is not as big as what you’d get from other hotels, Yotel made sure that it was a good use of space, and every part of the room was well thought out. The facilities/amenities provided were good (including the free welcome Cocktail), and the only gripe I had was the fact that the bath and the room itself is only separated by a glass panel, and water did leak out to the room itself, it’d have been nice if there was a small slope or step from the shower to the room so that it doesn’t happen though. But otherwise, a fantastic place to stay in, and Orchard Road is just a stone’s throw away. Great location. Will definitely come again!
not recommended
Thank you for wishing me happy birthday!thanks for the macarons and birthday cards! Mel,jac and the other guy!
good location and modern hotel
Needs some twin bed for some cases

reviews.review_title: Great locations with modern hotel concept ”
reviews.review_comment: Great locations has making differentiation to this hotel, and support with modern concept especially great bathroom designs able to feel the sun and connected to Orchard. The skin urban lotions, shampoo and etc fm Australia is so nice and upgrade the standard of this hotel. Will definitely staying in this hotel for future visits in Singapore orchard.
Situated in the heart of Orchad Road - strategic location, value for money, love the view (if you're on high floor).
Our stay was comfortable…although its small its really very clean the toilet has bidet the view is fantastic! the location is superb will come back again!
Room is not spacious but has all the necessary facilities and location is great to go to ION orchard wheellock place ets
Best location and affordable prices
I love that the room was really clean and well maintained. It feels really cosy too. No regret booking the room with balcony as the view was beautiful in the evening!

Like the cleanliness and location. Swimming pool is quite small, surprise they don't provide bath robe in room. The space for queen room is only able to fit 2 pax at max. Overall recommended for short staycation.
Hotel room is very clean and compact. Value for money and hotel staff is very friendly.
room though small, has space saving features. i like the feature that allows bed to be propped up. only grasp was the tv that was so bad at connecting to my samsung phone.
Nice cosy room for 1. Has smart tv which is a plus point. Most importantly, it is located in the heart of orchard.
Love the ambience. Staff are warm and friendly. Love the service with a smile. Walking distance to mrt and shopping malls
Small room but very clean and very convenient location. Staff are very friendly n helpful I wish I knew that I had to book for the swimming pool
Most convenient staycation venue in Singapore. Quality staff and efficient check-in process.

reviews.review_title: Great central location and value for money”
reviews.review_comment: Cleanliness and location wise is excellent. Not recommended during if going for swimming. No slots after check in, but no one was at the pool. Dissapointed abt this issue. Hopefully reservation for pool can be improve.

reviews.review_title: Nice albeit small room and great location”
reviews.review_comment: Very good service from housekeeping but unprofessional front desk officer (a woman with long hair). She was too harried and harsh towards guests.
Stayed for a night and enjoyed it very much. Room is small but clean and neat. Though the bed is just besides the door, i hardly hear any noise outside. Good location with many amenities nearby
good and nice for a escape
Room was clean when we checked in. It’s located at a good area and provided a lot of useful necessities
While the location is strategic, the bed is quite small for 2 ppl. We have stayed for 3D2N, but the staff never clean the room at all. Not even changing the dustbin. Disappointed.
Best thing is the location. But the room is smsll.
Very good location with awesome staff who are courteous and efficient, room was lovely with clean facilities and comfy bed!

This is my 1st time book with Yotel. My room lock have issue and after informed staff, they fast response to help chg new room for us even ald at the midnight. And give us a free drink to redeem on lvl10. This is professional. The pool is clean ,after swim won't feel uncomfortable. Will come back again.
The smart tv could not connect using ios.
The room is very cozy and nice 😍 2 people is just nice 👌🏻 The location is very convenient as well!

went for 2 days staycay. loved the room , small but compact and very modern! the pillows were really comfy and great to sleep in. Staff were all helpful since the beginning cause I made a wrong double booking and they help me out sort the problem out. Highly recommended and will be back to staycay again!
Friendly and Caring staff and surprising wishes for me with bday card & delicious macaroons. Like 👍🏼
Small room vs great location.
Super comfy bed and pillows. Great location as well.
The bed and pillow are super comfortable. Once u lie down, u wont feel like waking up again
The room and the view is AMAZING!!

Had a great stay! Booked the room with the balcony. The hotel accommodated our request for a high floor and gave us a room on the highest floor. The view was amazing! The service at the restaurant is excellent. Kudos to Matthew who went the extra mile for us. Not to mention the food as well -it was tasty and certainly value for money!
Bed can incline like hospital bed, pillows are good, many places to hang your stuff. Had a good view from the toilet

The staffs are attentive and gave a small gift token n birthday card on my birthday (though I didnt make any special request). the room is clean and had a great view overlook the city. Will definite go back again
Room is clean. Only the bed could have been better. Follows the weight so not really firm and stable.
delayed flight, does not wish to modify the stay, even with a supplement

Stayed there for 4 night. Superb location as its close to all amenities. Best place to walk around all the Malls in Orchard. I arrived earlier, the staff was very accomodating by allowing me to do early check-in. The in house cafe have good varieties of food & beverage selection. Only sad back, the bed is very small & not so comfortable. Was having back pain. Apart from that it was a perfect stay
staff was friendly and gave my boyfriend free snacks as it was his birthday. The room was clean. I especially loved the bed.
Your nice is so nice but your room is too small

Yotel's rooms are extremely small. It is really not worth the money. Queen bed doesn't feel like queen sized. Very small, even for 2 normal sized adults. Check in time is late at 3pm, check out time is early at 11am. Do not come here. There are other cheaper hotel deals you can get on carou-sell even. Do not come here. Rooms are not worth it.
Best hotel for a short getaway
Good for solo staycation! Not able to use miracast for my netflix shows but if you bring your own hdmi cable, that’ll be good! Bluetooth connection works for spotify. Overall it was a pleasant stay!
Bedding is sad
Very convenient near orchard.Hotel is nice,received the corner top room with a cityview.Love the bed super comfortable.
The room is rather small but the layout is cleverly designed to optimise the use of the limited space. One suggestion - a shower curtain will help to prevent the whole toilet being wet
There are 6 lifts in the hotel, but the waiting time for lift is still very long!
This is my 2nd visit to Yotel, first king room with Balcony is definitely worth the money, the room is super clean and the views are great!
You’ve got to be here & feel the cozy & nice view of either SG sun rise or Sun rise….
Thr bed was really comfortable and the hotel took note that we were there for our anniversary, and gave us a surprise gift. Really thankful of that. Will visit again.

Its a nice hotel even tho its a bit small but the soap and shampoo smells so nice on top of that theres lotion as well. The bed is the best part which is adjustable and super comfy!! And dont even get me started with the channels there was so many channels on the tv like astro and korean channels. Overall was a super pleasant stay i would definitely come again
Will repeat again !
Good value for money.... The city view at night was nice. The bed is very comfortable....If they have smart tv mean great.

It's a cute futuristic hotel that had a view in the toilet. Stayed there for 4 days 2 nights. The pool is quite nice. The restaurant also has good food. The room looks like in a futuristic set up. They call it a cabin. It's kinda tight for a queen sized bed. For travelers who have a back problem like me... The bed is quite soft for support. I guess it's built that way so that it can be bent. There is also no proper table which made it hard for me to do some desk top work. I used the foldable thing built below the tv which also works but not for longer hours. So if u plan to stay there and so some work, it's not a good place. I love the view from the toilet tho! Dint have the chance to experience Yoshi and Yolanda but I guess you guys should check it out! They're cute robots! 😍
Good choice if you want to feel like you're in the future! :)
This will be my Go To Hotel from now on! I love the service and I’m grateful that the staff accommodated my early check in request! Thank you Yotel Orchard! I will definitely come back!
Can be better
A nice place and comfortable environment

hotels.name: Hotel Grand Central (SG Clean, Staycation Approved)
hotels.address: 22 Cavenagh Road/Orchard Road, Orchard, Singapore, Singapore, 229617

reviews.review_comment: Location good

reviews.review_title: Golden location, valuable. Breakfast is pack delivery to room ”
reviews.review_comment: Clean ! Comfortable! Well maintained Old hotel. Breakfast is sent to room with one container, not worth to pay any dollars to get that breakfast. ☹️ Taste awful
Nice breakfast, quiet stay in middle of town.
Very good
Lazy housekeeping, Chinese auntie wont clean your room Miserable reception.
Poor AC. Small room. No room service.

reviews.review_title: Ok for a clean bed with no luxury.”
reviews.review_comment: Bed was comfortable a and clean. WiFi was slow and television restricted w I th no access in movie channel.

Besides location this hotel offers nothing. Either short staff or pure laziness , entire 4 days stay was without cleaning/housekeeping despite informing the chinese lady housekeeping required. Just dirty! Reception unfriendly and look miserable.
I paid extra for breakfast. Yet the breakfast is just a packet of bee Hoon hang at the door of our room with a kids pack orange juice and cup of yogurt.
Very accessible to MRT (400m away) and bus station (200m away). Taxi stand across the street.
Great stay,

Great location. Fairly clean with outdated decor. Has hyflux water filter but the cold option isnt cold at all. The pool does has a great view but they need to do better landscaping. The ferns are overwhelmed and dried too. Breakfast is totally not recommeded. Sent up tasteless, soggy fried maggie with 2 halfsie hotdogs for the first morning, and fried tasteless pasta for the 2nd ones. Location has loads of eateries, fret not.
Good

Jot what I want . I actually request for a beautiful view. But what I get is a dark and super inside room. Totally not a good place for staycation. And the service is suck . I ask whether can change the room type and the staff who on duty did not answer my request.
Respectful and helpful staff especiallu the two concierge and April, the Filipina manning the front desk.

reviews.review_title: Very dirty hotel room with many defective items/fixtures ”
reviews.review_comment: Very dirty bathroom, room, hallway, etc. Bathroom has mold, shampoo bottle and shower gel bottle were still left open by the bathtub from previous guest. Many items in the room were defective, including missing bedside table, broken bathroom door, broken towel rack, etc etc.

Daytime woman at the desk so so. Night time desk man fantastic. Went way out of his way to get copies printed of documents the Philippines wanted for quarantine free return entry. A real gem in these covid days
good. worth for money. excellent location
Staff was utterly rude worse customer service
Due to COVID, the hotel had closed restaurant and hence there was lot of challenges for food.

Stayed in triple room, suitable for 3 adults and 1 kid. Suprisingly there is a bathup even though the toilet is quite small. Rooftop swimming pool, with pool for kids. Location is very near to sommerset station and all the shopping malls.

The intention was to have bathtub and the bathtub is not very big but acceptable. Check in and check out is fast. Easily accessible. What's more where you are located near to Don Don Donki which is 24 hours.
Basic hotel no frills, good bed. Super small bathroom
Great!!
I am really disappointed by the marketing strategy adopted by this hotel, it serves pathetic breakfast , staff is really bad.

Aircond is ok. Not super cooling yet can accomodate singapore hot weather. Location is gd. Reach out to nearest bus stop and mrt station Shower and bathtub, water pressure flow is strong and hot enough Water dispenser, my favourites. Easy to reach out for hot coffee and tea Bedding is fine. Comfy and cosy Sound proof of the room, able to hear kids crying in midnight. Nothing can be expect Cleaner, housekeeping. very nice person, would greet you hello, gd morning and friendly The wifi, can be disconnected sometimes but mostly quite stable for me while work from hotel. Overall, i would choose to stay again.

Hotel very well located near somerset mrt. Nearby hv 24 hrs indian muslim food, laundry service and bar. Price was decent for long stay. Fridge arent that cooling. Aircond is not that freezing but able to hold up Singapore hot weather. Water flow is big when showering. What i like the most is the water hot dispenser. Not need boil water and u get hot water instantly.
Excellent. I will give u 7 stars if there is an option to it. Great!!!

This is our second time to be in this hotel abd again we have had an amazing time. The only thing that we did not like is the breakfast. While booking it was never mentioned that breakfast is pre-packed. The breakfast was non edible and mostly stone cold when delivered at our door. So we ended giving the majority of our breakfast packs away or throwing them in the rubbish bin. It was really a waste of money. So do not pay for their breakfast! We tried it this time because the website says that cafeteria is now available and we did not realize that breakfast is pre-packed! It was really disappointing! There is also very limited viewing channel thats why this time around we brought our apple device to be able to watch decent films :) Other than the horrible pre packed breakfast and limited viewing option, we actually enjoyed the location, the staff and the hotel itself. That’s why we came back and stayed even longer this time.

The receptionist that chinese lady. She is so rude!! Your technician that came and fix my tv. 好像我欠你们很多钱这样。不想做工就不要做啦。don't show your guest one kind of bullshit face! To the management ifyou wish to know further details , feel free to contact me!

reviews.review_title: Avoid the breakfast if possible unless you can’t go out ”
reviews.review_comment: The breakfast was really a let down. No coffee was provided with the breakfast set. Called the reception and asking if have coffee, answer is just “sorry there is no coffee” … if I was served the coffee with the bread and potato salad & orange juice, I might be rather contented ( not still, not worth the 15$ Per set) .. you can get better breakfast set for just 5-6$ near to the hotel. Stay was not bad, quite clean as things are new.. but I won’t stay there again as my experience was not so positive as I waited more than 1 hour for check in that day due to school holiday period

Hotel check in system was horrible. Waited for almost 30 mins before I was served at the counter and waited another 20 mins just to be checked in. After checking in, I had to wait for another 15 mins just to take the lift up to my room as there was a fire alarm testing going on and ended climbing the stairs to my room. Room in real life looks very different from what was pictured. Was a little disappointed with the outcome. Asked for Late Check out and was told to check out anytime before 1pm. Received a call from front desk at 12.15pm asking me to check out immediately. Very disappointed by the rude service by the Front Desk. When checking out, I still have to wait 5 to 10 mins to check out. Overall, it was a disappointing experience and will never consider coming back..
Small room however for the cheap price its worth it.

Most unfriendly and rude staff! Upon asking to change room to double bed as requested during booking. Reception airs name Beni. Lied on face that no one checking out for 3 week and girl fully book for 3 week so can not change room. And same day I check Agoda it was doing available room for coming days. Bad experience.

Check-in took us about half an hour, while there are two receptionists but only 3 groups in front of us. Also, have requested king size bed for couple, but the lady receptionist said that left with 2 single beds, understand that requests subject to availability but expect they at least combine the 2 single beds for us. This is the first time for us to stay in this hotel and also the only time.

reviews.review_title: 1 HOUR TO QUEUE at least TO Check IN”
reviews.review_comment: Ridiculously long queue to check in. Had been travelling and staying in so many hotels in so many countries. Never in my life had I ever thought a hotel in my own home town (Singapore) to be providing this kind of service. I don't believe you would choose to blame your below standard service on the Covid situation. Come on, definitely an hour at least just to Check in? I had paid for my stay, yes I understand that the usual procedure needs to be done, but you are severely under staffed. Well. i just left, that's it. Definitely won't be returning. So guys if you are reading this review, do think twice unless they can offer you cancellation if you didn't manage to check in. Well just too bad i had to forfeit my stay.
Very good

reviews.review_title: Best hotel for location with an affordable price.”
reviews.review_comment: Hotel Grand Central has the best location in SG right at the heart of Orchard road with the most affordable price and cozy room.
Nothing memorable in particular but respected that the hotel has decent customer service. Did not give me any problem and it is near to town so that is a plus point. Thanks

The hotel is conveniently located just 5 mins walking away from Orchard Central. Don’t need to worry about food and entertainment as they are all within walking distance. The room is of a decent size and relatively clean although it showed sign of old age.

At the price offered, I would say is value for money this location. Overall was fine since it is quite near to shoppongs, coffee shop and cafe. Toilet is clean but small. Room facilities is alright a bit old. Ok for short stay.

reviews.review_title: Good location and value for money”
reviews.review_comment: The quality of breakfast has room for improvement.
It was great experience

The Hotel was very clean and the comfortable. But the service wasn't that of what I expected . I was too tired I overslept one hour past the chk out and already there was a big commotion . Until the8 actually use Mastercard to open the door to ask my wife wake us up as my wife too was locked out cos we overslept when she went out to buy food . I was doing my night shift earlier before checking in. My wife offered to pay for another extension since she knew I was knocked out too tired but next moment she knew they already open the room which I felt theres no privacy. If they think something might have happen my wife is downstairs at their lobby to settle things. So it was a bad experience for me .
Nice room

I choose this hotel because of the pool. I tried to reserve a slot for the pool via email but I can only do it upon check-in. I checked in at about 3:50 pm but wasn't able to reserve a spot. The room is clean and the receptionist are kind.
We requst large room during our reservation but we can't get the room. Beside that, next to our room all in quarantine they did not seperate staycation customer and those whose in quarantine.

I think everything is fair enough. Didn’t get to use swimming pool as it was raining. Breakfast was PATHETIC. For one day breakfast, additional $30. We were served a halal meal which consist of 2 pcs prata and a few potatoes with curry. There’s small orange juice with a yoghurt. It’s really not worth it at all.
Location is superb for a staycay and affordable. Room and facilities are clean and service staff are welcoming. My only setback is my toilet has no bidet spray. Good to install one

reviews.review_title: Basic hotel in a centralise area”
reviews.review_comment: Overall its a ok stay, nothing much to comment about a hotel Very simple and basic hotel. However the location is great if you want a cheap hotel just right outside the shopping zone of orchard.
I like it as it's quiet!
Never come back again!

all requests were ignored. booked a king bed and got twin beds pushed together which were very easily separated. the beds were extremely itchy (I have sensitive skin, he does not). the counter staff were not very friendly either. location wise is pretty good and easy to locate. the hotel provides bath towels, shampoo, body shampoo and toothbrushes. soundproofing isn’t the best. overall, quite disappointing. they had a pretty cool water dispenser in the room though.
It’s very convenient ! Near MRT and Orchard shopping malls. Will try it again!
Bathroom size was pathetic.. aircon wasnt cold .. needless to mention, breakfast provided wasnt up to par.

Front office name Daphne was trully sucks. From the first time I approach her for registration, she don't even greet, smile n acknowledge my presence. Gv me a kind of look, e slowest registration I'm going thru at the counter. For formality sake just telling me no large bed n keep on telling me it's upon availability.. Eventhough I do made a remark in booking n payment 1 month in advance. What matters is not about the bed, but it's about her attitude. She don't deserve to be in the frontline.
Close to Orchard Road shopping area. Close to bars and restaurants. Room just big enough to be comfortable.
Hard Bed sheet, spoiled door with loud noise, broken glass , the top of the curtain is spoiled.
stinky room. chargeable for ice.
Nice location. Nice pool. Good ambience.

The room was just nice for 2 person's with a nice view as we got the 10th floor. However, the check in time was very slow. The facilities like swimming pool had restrictions (we could not go just to see as we have to request for the staff to escort us). The room had a lot of facilities. Worth the money paid.

reviews.review_title: You get what you paid for”
reviews.review_comment: Hotel cleanliness is atrocious. Limited TV channels available and fridge is not even cold. Staff is cold and not polite at all. They claimed to have a gym on site but its just a room with 2 equipment. On top of that, pool water is dirty and the bathtub in the room has a cracked on it. Highly not recommended but if you're to waste money, by all means
Not the best and not the worst. Location is great though
The room carpet got funny smell
I dun believe ur breakfast to ur guests some as SHN person or QO person.. We not SHN or Qo at ur hotel..but as guests for staycation The breakfast so bed.. not value of money
Got a good deal for $97 for one night. Got a nice room with a view, However, the bathtub had a crack in it that needs to be fixed.
All i can say its the best staycation so far....staff is super friendly...
Might come again

Terrible first impression I have for Hotel Grand Central by female staff Rosni dyring checking in. Even the housekeeping is friendly and polite than there front counter staffs. And the gym has only 1 equipment. Next time please do not advertise that you have a gym when there is only an equipment that we can use. Return to stay: NEVER!
the locations is good. Some of the staffs at the reception are not so friendly. the swimming pools is closed
Poor service, standard sucks, manager like hooligoon dun allow me to shorten my stay. food sucks. Hotel & toilet size so small not meant for human stay. Food oso not meant for human consumption!
This is our last minute plan but it turn out to be good. We had a nice stay.
Location of the hotel is near to Somerset MRT station. A lot of good choices to shop around Orchard. Good restaurant as well
Good and helpful Staff...
Location is not too good, water boiler is not working, otherwise is good value for money

reviews.review_title: Very very long check in queue and very mouldy smell”
reviews.review_comment: Almost 5 and check in queue was extremely long and slow staff. Room very musky and air con smell of mould. Cigarette smell in room also.
This hotel thou a bit dated, the staff are friendly and place are clean. Not expensive given the great location.
it's okayyyy
Food provided during SHN is so lousy. Chicken curry is very smelly. Staff don’t understand about customer service and easy going. Ask for tooth paste and brush 3 times and never send to room.

reviews.review_title: Read all the reviews B4 U book this hotel”
reviews.review_comment: Encountered a rude malay receptionist (speccy guy) on 1st day of CNY. He is a shame to those working in service industry. Got the worst room view, facing directly to 3 neighbouring rooms. Have to keep my curtains on at all times for privacy. Small dirty swimming pool full of hairs & dirt. Stay here unless you have low budget.......
Had a great time Highly recommended!
Very accessible, near by orchard central, 313 and plaza sing

room abit small but still good. fridge was not cold. great location! hotel should put a notice in the room, about booking of slot usage for facilities eg. swimming pool, etc. staff at check-in counter was polite and accomodating. Appreciated his help!!
Very good location. Rooms are small but clean and decently nice. Value for money. Overall, satisfied with my stay and its a good 3 star hotel.
They can better the room on water heater for drinking not hot and toiletries item some are not place.
Nice location with very clean room. And good house keeper

The hotel is no where close to a good value for money. They did not highlight that they will be providing a bento box for breakfast, even though I paid a premium for a breakfast inclusive rate. Also, there were only 6 channels on TV...so nothing much one could watch. The daily housekeeping was basic. All in all, I wouldnt recommend this hotel to anyone to stay
Nice and clean environment. Very convenient too.
It’s Certainly the best bed and pillows I’ve ever slept in the hotels, And the location is really good, very close to orchard road and the MRT station.
Strict follow of SOP - Which is what I liked stay here in the midst of Pandemic! Professional Security Staff Professional Reception Staff All very helpful
Easy Walk to Plaza Singapurra
Easy Access to amenities
Room quite small, cheap in the area, near shopping center, 10-15 mins to sommerset mrt st. Not recommend if you have big luggages
Plus great staff! For business or pleasure- very centrally located. Worth the money in Singapore! Manager Benny is fantastic and runs a great team of staff!
Awesome hotel for aolo travelers or couples who are not fussy. Clean and value for money. Good central city location

reviews.review_title: Overall we are satisfied and enjoyed our stay”
reviews.review_comment: We enjoyed our stay. Friendly staff, accommodation is good. We were on high flr corner room and its quiet. Clean bed and sheets. Complete TV, wifi, aircon, iron and iron board, vault, hairdryer in bathroom, rainshower head and handheld shower, hot and cold water dispenser is a plus to this hotel. (anytime available). Free slippers, shower gel and shampoo nice smell, toothbrush and toothpaste freshen breath, toiletries complete. Breakfast is more than enough. Usage of swimming pool safe by booking so its kinda exclusive an hr of usage . Overall satisfied stay at affordable price. Recommended. Worth it.
- very close to all classic landmarks Great & friendly staff -Safe and Secure place -Close to MRT
Excellent location.The staff had my room upgraded.
Nothings is good. And more than that if you have car you must pay for parking. I did call before I booked the hotel staff said yes there’s parking included in my package

hotels.name: Hilton Garden Inn Singapore Serangoon
hotels.address: 3 Belilios Road, Little India, Singapore, Singapore, 219924

reviews.review_title: Perfect location, Friendly staff and Quick response for customer request. ”
reviews.review_comment: Location is quite strategic to go to the famous malls as the malls are just 1 to 2 stops away from Little India MRT Stations. Friendly staffs especially the housekeeping staffs that are genuine and friendly to provide heartwarming services. The only imperfect point for my stay was the centralised air conditioning which disturb my sleep with low and high pitch sounds. I am a light sleeper whom cant sleep well with any sound while the 1st room that I stayed encountered motor failure and gratefully the service team changed another room for me within 30 mins.
The facility and quality of the hotel are excellent. The services from some of the front-desk staff can be improved. The breakfast is good. But some people may not like the neighborhood.
All is good! Except the thin walls and low water pressure.

reviews.review_title: Great location and value for money ”
reviews.review_comment: Love the location and also the room. It was clean and comfy and even has a bidet spray. Also love how its a mere walking distance to eateries. 10/10
very good
very good
Average

reviews.review_title: Great location for food but could be better”
reviews.review_comment: Was complimented with a late checkout after we were told to wait till 430pm for checkin. Checked in to see that we were given a king bed with a connecting door to the room beside. The wall definitely felt pretty thin at night bcus we can hear murmurings and sounds around . The bed sheets felt rough too. Looking at the bright side, the staff were friendly and it was great spot to explore food around the hotel.

reviews.review_title: Facilities is fine but overall stay experience not satisfy”
reviews.review_comment: Facilities look news, but sound isolation is bad. Can hear noise from next room and corridor. Super long check in time even just 5-6 group of ppl. Torqure guest standing one hour for the check in.
Comfy room
clean and comfortable
Standard facilities - nothing to complain. Housekeeping does a neat job - reception could use friendlier people. Check in Check out was quick.
Very Good Location.
Very friendly staff that made the stay better
Everything about this hotel is just wonderful. I am also amazed and thankful for how courteous and helpful the staff are. I would definitely come back again.

reviews.review_title: was disappointed the last day when check out. cause of the front disk staff of talking attitude ”
reviews.review_comment: Was there for my anniversary but at the end of it... ur staff never really check thing out n jus call n talk to me in the very rude manner... n rush me to check out... n never even say sry for that... spoil my mood... a not bad hotel with 4 star had this kind of staff with this attitude... even 5 star also no use
Had a good time and location super
Decent stay, the front desk had pretty long queues during check in and checkout times. car park was slightly troublesome.

Staff were very friendly! Rooms were clean. Our room was on the other side of the building from the temple and was very quiet. Good selection of food for breakfast. Would happily stay here again. Not far to walk to the MRT to get everywhere.

reviews.review_title: Very good tourist hotel nice small rooftop pool area ”
reviews.review_comment: Only a short walk to Little India MRT E exit

One of the best hotel i’ve ever stayed in Singapore. Very clean, tidy and well maintained. Walking distance around 5-600m to Little India MRT. A corner 7-11 is right next door which can quench your daily demands in drink and snacks. Thumb up!

Located right in middle of Little India with typical sights & sounds, a stone's throw away from City and major highways. Room is ok-sized for Singapore hotels and clean. Has a door that leads to car park directly on L4, convenient for those driving.

Overall pleasant stay, rooms are very clean and bright and facilities are fine. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Double bed room felt a bit small, but it is Singapore so it's not too much of a surprise. Placement of shower was a bit awkward as there was no door closing half of the shower.

When the name is Hilton we get carried away, but the truth of the matter is the name is not good enough it is much more required than that. We had our daughter travelling with us & they had given us seperate beds after we had requested for king bed. The experience with the staff also was not upto the mark. First time after booking with agoda we are not happy with the experience

yes the room was a little small. and located in a different wing where we had to walk a little further. but everything else was perfect. room was comfy and clean. extremely cozy. perfect location for us. and everyone was so friendly!

reviews.review_title: HGI Singapore: Unethical customer service in pursuit of ethical policy intentions.”
reviews.review_comment: Both my friend and I are below 21 y/o and we made full payment for a room at HGI via Agoda for NYE staycay. Since HGI’s ad on Agoda did not mention any minimum age requirements for check-in, we perceived HGI as OK. Upon arrival, I was denied checking-in due to the misinformation on Agoda (either one of us had to be at least 21 y/o). Waited for three hours there! I called Agoda, regarding this matter but HGI stood firm on its policy even after Agoda intervened. Later on, HGI CANCELLED my reservation without my acknowledgement. Another appalling thing was that the front desk personnel called Nick, told me that I needed a companion who’s 21 y/o & above to check-in with me and even suggested that I ask a random stranger to check-in with me. The horror! HGI Singapore should do better.
The best hotel in Singapore, think Singapore think Hilton Garden Inn!!!

reviews.review_title: Excellent hotel but away from main tourist spots. Not many European restaurants in area. ”
reviews.review_comment: Good breakfast , comfortable beds. Had to use MRT or Taxis to get around.

reviews.review_title: Next to a very loud temple - Avoid if you want to sleep past 6am in the morning””
reviews.review_comment: this hotel across the street next to the temple which has ceremonial chants/drums/bells every couple of hours or so very noise cant sleep , check in waiting time about 45 min, staff action slow , breakfest not much choose also , i wou;d return to this hotel ...

Not really near to mrt station. Surroundings easy to get food. Mind you. You have a long queue when checking in and checking out. We queued for half an hour. The Chinese guy at the reception attended our checking in and did our registration. He then demanded a $100 deposit for one night stay! We already prepaid our room in full. He told us that you have to pay your deposit or you will be not get your room access cards. We told him we have not enough cash at that moment and we dont have a credit card. If a debit card, it will take some time to refund back. He told us to draw cash at any atms nearby. So, we did. Then, when we came back with the cash, we saw a very long line of queue at the reception. We approached him and he told us to queue again. And we waited in line for more than half an hour. For goodness sake! You already registered us earlier ago and we have to re-queue.?! So much hassle in the checking in process! Then, we have to wait again for our room.
Very clean hotel with friendly and helpful staff also very polite, breakfast was excellent.

Was shocked coz i had to pay $100 for accidental purposes. I can understand if thats the rule but the way she asked it was nt appropriate. She was also not helpful and expectes us to have $100 cash with us. We dont mind paying but i think better customer service should be given to us.

reviews.review_title: Facility is good but the location is not really good ”
reviews.review_comment: Facility is great and the room is cozy (personally feel quite small). However the location has a little bit of issue. It is too close to India town and for the foreigner's perspectives it was not really pleasure to face it. All Indian restaurants and shops only.
This hotel is new and so has comfort bed . 7 eleven just beside the hotel . And it is convenient to travel to all the attractions

reviews.review_title: Nice comfort hotel with strategic location ”
reviews.review_comment: This hotel is new and so has comfort bed . 7 eleven just beside the hotel . And it is convenient to travel to all the attractions

reviews.review_title: Would hv loved to stay in htl that the staff values guest”
reviews.review_comment: Location is reasonable, middle of little india so predominantly indian guest. refurbed htl. However, very basic hotel, small rooms, dont really care kind of staffs, no mgmt presence, if u book thru agoda , u will be last in queue even to get a room. Will not stay in this htl or brand again
Bring your headphone to have a good sleep at the weekend. Temple is behind the hotel.
Excellent but hard to find place for booking, after three days I have to select another hotel for my family to came and join me

The Hilton Garden Inn is a standard hotel located withing a two minute walk of the Little India MRT and is in near proximity to the Mustafa Centre. The staff is very helpful and attentive to your needs. The pool is not the largest and is awkwardly located outside the windows of the restaurant. Other than this I have no issues with the hotel. It was our second time staying at this property and would not hesitate to stay again.

We loved our stay at the Hilton Garden Inn. We loved how close the hotel was to the city center! Great service let us check in early and made sure we had our grab and go breakfast even leaving the hotel around 4:30am.

Pros: walking distance to MRT, minimart besides the hotel, clean, breakfast ok even there’s not much to choose, city view room I recommend, nice staffs (especially in breakfast) Cons: I have to pay fot the internet connection
I didn't know it was located in Little India district. For Indian visitors, it may be best choice, I think. But almost everything was great.

reviews.review_title: Excellent Staff, Great Clean Hotel, Excellent Location”
reviews.review_comment: My experience with Hilton Garden Inn was excellent. From check-in to check-out, everything was smooth and we were served with a smile always. We had Issam at check-in, after a night flight, we were pretty exhausted and would like to check-in as quick as possible. Issam ensured that we had a smooth check-in. He also gave us tips on where to get a good local breakfast and the best place to get local currency. The room was spacious enough for a couple. The bed was amazingly comfortable. Location wise, it is perfect to experience the local culture. Surrounded by plenty of delicious food stalls. The staff was always very attentive to your needs. Kudos to Isa, Issam, Fithri and the Hilton Garden Inn Team. HIghly Recommended and definitely will be back.

I stayed at the hotel for a few days and was generally very pleased. My room was lovely, it was immaculately clean and the staff were all lovely. I had an issue with the curtains when I checked in and a technician arrived to sort it within about 10 mins - excellent service. The only one issue was that I had requested a quiet room; I appreciate it's not always possible to accommodate these requests, but my room was in the Serangoon Tower, right at the end so virtually backed on to the very busy, often noisy main road. Definitely not a quiet room but overall I still enjoyed my stay.

We stayed here for 4 days at the end of November 2019. The rooms were a good size and extremely clean. The staff were friendly and helpful. A special thank you to house keeping lady Marga (I think she’s Malaysian) she is an absolute asset to the hotel. Very friendly and a great ambassador to the Hilton brand. Also Nicholas at the front desk was also very helpful to us when our son was sick. A great place to stay and great value for money.

That´ s Singapore, so not super large rooms but well equiped and very, very clean. Nice staff, very friendly. 15-20mins walk to Bugis junction. 7-11 store near main entrance. A lot of indian shops around.
Walking distance MRT station and it located in little india. Room was spacious and completed with facilities. Breakfast was superb.

Great hotel! Location of the hotel is behind the Hindu temple. didn’t like the fact the temple prayers started so early ... 7am and it was really loud, you can hear everything right in our room. It was annoying especially if you wanted to sleep a bit more. Besides that it was great.
Good central place to stay with plenty of shops and restaurants all well priced Hotel clean tidy good breakfast helpful staff. Will stay again
Everything was perfect

reviews.review_title: Did not meet our expectations for a 4 star hotel”
reviews.review_comment: This was an okay hotel. Nothing stood out. We did not really use the facilities available at the hotel, outside of refilling our water bottles at the gym. The rooms were on the smaller side with a noisy drain and AC (which could not be turned off). Toiletries were nice and staff was very friendly.
the location is located at little india, surruding by indian restaurants and 10mins walking to subaway station

reviews.review_title: Excellent service in an interesting location. Helpful and friendly staff.”
reviews.review_comment: Facilities were clean. Fantastic breakfast buffet.
Pleasant stay from the minute check in to check out. All staff are very dedicated friendly. Parking is an added plus point. Keep up Hilton to your name.

As the hotel is not facing the main road, it's rather hard to access to public transport, even you can't get a pick up from the Grab App after many attempts. Taxi is only accessible through booking in advance.
The rooms were not cleaned properly and could notice the work is half done.
i enjoyed my stay here.. just what i was looking for
For some taxi drivers hard to find - hotel is behind the hindu temple. Very clean room, fit just enough. Small pool. Simple breakfast but still enough choices. Overall great stay in very clean room.
The hotel is very nice, clean and comfortable. It was a nice stay. We only think that for the price of the room, the breakfast could be included.

Very close to Little India MRT Station, exit E. Lots of Indian restaurants around the area and has a tiny 7-11 at right outside the hotel. Spacious toilet but the water pressure is quite low. Pillow is too soft and difficult to adjust the temperature of the air con (feel cold even at 25 degree). Take note that some of the windows may be frosted because the rooms are facing Istana (due to government regulation).

reviews.review_title: Your hotel reception staffs are very rude to handle the guest..Even duty manager also.”
reviews.review_comment: Our booking is not included breakfast.but some of group guest went to had breakfast and they ready to pay. And i enquire about bill manager said 8pax only..the next day he said 19pax.i was shocked..he gave us a wrong quote.and never ask for appologise.
First, I was given a twin room with a pair of ladies' shoes. Then moved to a king room with a dead cocroach.

Service was great, heard from previous reviews mentioned that their service is not good but I did not experience that. Everything was good, location is perfect. we did not stay at the wing which close to the temple so we couldn't comment about the noise. Room is extremely clean and we totally love it.
A very good hotel in an excellent location. Little India is a wonderful place to explore and enjoy the food delights.
Great

reviews.review_title: Location next to Temple creates a lot of noise”
reviews.review_comment: The facility of this hotel is fine. However, the hotel also has a building across the street next to the temple which has ceremonial chants/drums/bells every couple of hours or so. I remember not being able to nap because of the noise and the noise starts again very early around 6AM. I would not return to this hotel because of this. If you happen to choose this hotel because the location is OK and you're right in the heart of Little India, stay in the main building.
The hotel is nice and elegant, close to MRT, receptionists are friendly and helpful. :)
Clean and centrally located in Little India. Near to many Indian restaurants. Hotel staff is good and room is clean.

I so love the hotel. All the staffs are friendly and accommodating. They have a clean, cozy room. The beds are so comfy, you can really sleep well after a long day touring around Singapore. The location is the bomb because it was near Little India station, near Tekka Centre (where you can eat cheap but delish food). If you are shopaholic and you want the best money exchange rate the hotel is nearby Mustafa Centre.
The room is well furnished. It is clean. The staff are helpful.

The hotel was very clean , the staff were excellent , the pool was nice. For a Hilton Hotel this isn’t up to scratch after we checked in we had to carry bags to our room (not the staffs fault just not enough off them). And the breakfast was ordinary to say the least, l,m sorry I had to mention these negative points but it’s really what I think.

Nice comfortable bed Great location in little India Nice reception staff Unfortunate busy and wasn’t able to get early check in when I arrived Also no porter service so had to carry heavy luggage on my own
This hotel is located in Little India and is surrounded by Indian jewelry shops, souvenir shops and restaurants.

reviews.review_title: Short stay ay Hilton Garden Hotel”
reviews.review_comment: Lovely spacious and clean room. Brilliant friendly staff.
Hotel was lovely, clean and great gym. Location for food not so good however close to train stations and only 2-5 mins from foods.
Nice experience

reviews.review_title: Great stay with perfect location near metroline”
reviews.review_comment: Room is convy and enough space. Nice shower. Nice view and no city noice. Slept vert good on the large good beds
The bed was awesome, only that the pillows were too soft for my liking.
Very nice rooms, excellent service by housekeeping, check-in was tedious and could have been pleasant. check out was very efficient and warm.

reviews.review_title: Clean rooms with very good breakfast ”
reviews.review_comment: We stayed here for 4 nights. The rooms are lil bit small for the amount of money we paid but clean, well maintained. The breakfast was really good. Live omelette and Indian dishes as well.

reviews.review_title: It's a really nice hotel. I like the big windows especially when the sun shines in, in the morning. ”
reviews.review_comment: Nil
very clean and good staffs

reviews.review_title: Technically the best hotel in Little India!”
reviews.review_comment: Travelled to Singapore for leisure and business, and stayed 3 nights here. Absolutely love the service. Extremely friendly staff, especially the Front Office Manager, Riki, is absolutely a gem. Also, quality rooms, quality bedding and bath amenities are nice too. The lady who did the housekeeping should be rewarded. Further, the location is very convenient. Not in the busy centre of little india, and only 2 mins walk to MRT. 5 mins walk to Mustafa center and so many food options around the hotel. The best thing is, this hotel got a 7-11. So you are saved even you forgot something in the middle of the night. Definitely, this will be my stay in Singapore if I needed to stay somewhere close to little india.

Wonderful stay with Hilton. Hotel is located in a place surrounded by plenty of Indian restaurant and typically it is in Little India. Right hotel for people to stay from India. Will never miss the Indian traditional environment !!!
run a touch on the budget side but still maintained high standards breakfast was a treat all you could want and more hats off to this hotel

reviews.review_title: Best Hotel in Singapore till date ”
reviews.review_comment: I have stayed in Many Hotel, Hilton is one of the best in this price range, Need to improve area of Breakfast as well as food.
It was ok property to stay and go around location is good as it is close to metro and market. expectation was to see grand place which didn't happened.
Worth stay
Nice view from high floor room Nice toilet/room interior Good customer service crews/receptionists
Hotel is located in a very good location Near to all important places Maxiumum taxi fare is 15 dollars. From airport 20 minutes drive Hotels are walkable distance Central located

We loved the location. Rooms were clean and nice, didn't enjoy bathroom and shower facilities. When showered, water was all over the floor made us very uncomfortable. Half of side of the shower has glass and rest is open. Easily water flies over the floor. Could have been avoided if they put at least a shower curtain. When I asked them they answered that's all they have without any apologies. No space in bathroom for toiletries. It was not as comfortable as we expected. Staffs are not welcoming at all. No smile, no greetings at any point of time. Life Less hotel lobby.

Pros: staff were friendly and their buffet was pretty good Cons: Room service menu is very expensive and the food was below average. I ordered a cheese naan and they gave me a naan which had kraft cheese slices melted on top of it! There was no effort or skill put into it. In lieu they gave me a cheesecake and still charged me for the naan. The area was pretty poor. I wouldn’t stay there again

The location is great, less than 5 min from the train station, the staff is super friendly and helpful, but oh my god the property itself is super Disgusting, creepy and filthy. Hilton is a big name I am also a member of this chain of hotels , I stayed in many property of Hilton and trust me they have nice hotel with pleasant stay, but oh my god this hotel seems like it must be a old hotel which they may have renovated but the rooms , floors, are so dirty, the over all look is great when you walk in you will say nice, but oh my god the toilet have stains and the floor are dirty with black marks, we complain about this and staff member show us 3 different rooms and guess what it was hard to pick which one is more dirty, one room have spiders in it and the shower was leaking, the staff have no words, we were luck we only have 2 nights otherwise I would have asked for return . I will never ever stay in this hotel . sorry Hilton I never leave negative comment but I hope you will listen.

reviews.review_title: Next to a very loud temple - Avoid if you want to sleep past 6am in the morning”
reviews.review_comment: First impressions were good aside from a dirty bathroom and not being able to connect to the hotel wifi. Hotel room was clean, spacious and had a good view but not so good for privacy - I think the flats next door could watch me getting changed. Had a good nights sleep until 6am in the morning when the c*nts next door started banging drums and singing at 6am. This noise continued for 10 mins, stopped for 50 mins and started again at 7am. Thankfully I only stayed for 3 nights but given that I was feeling jet-laggy and wanted a decent sleep. The location of the hilton hotel is terrible and based on that would avoid at all costs.
The front desk staff was quite helpful, unfortunately we did't have a single bed as we requested before
Breakfast - very poor

My stay in Hilton Garden Inn was very enjoyable. It's located only 300 m from Little India MRT (Exit E - it's closer to the Property). I am amazed how the Hotel is always kept clean! The room is quite spacious (for Singapore size), very very clean, and the bed is so comfortable. I consider it a gem as the price is very affordable. I don't mind paying a few dollar more to get this kind of property. I will surely stay in this hotel again for my next visit to Singapore.

The place was clean and exceeded my expectations that was set. It was also great value for money and close to public transport. 10/10 would return to the hotel when I am back in Singapore. Thank you all for the pleasant experience.
Nice hotel to stay, but the soundproof can be better.

hotels.name: Resorts World Sentosa - Hotel Michael (SG Clean Certified)
hotels.address: 8 Sentosa Gateway, Sentosa, Singapore, Singapore, 098269

reviews.review_comment: Great place with many amenities and attractions at the doorstep. The room is clean and spacious.
Hotel room rather run down with urine smell on the bed even after change of bedsheets

It's a great location in RWS and it is near to universal studio but there are some strange business choices which hotel has made I would assume becoz of covid. Nice clean place for families with older children.

Checking in was so messy, I went in early completed registration and asked them what time my room will be ready. They told after 3pm, I went out raomed and gave them an hour more and came back at 4pm and still room was not ready. Had an unpleasant experience and the staff was not helping. Saw few other guests arguing with staff also, I had to wait more than an hour more to be allocated room and no help was offered to carry our luggage to room. They could have told us at first itself to come after 5pm. Rest of the stay was good . Not much choice or variety for breakfast. Very minimal choice.
The location of the hotel is great. Easy to explore around sentosa. The only down side is that the food and beverage choices within the hotels are limited. It could due to situation with Covid.
I request for a room with good view. End up, they give a room facing forest. My room not wifi access, informed the hotel, but nothing is done.

The rooms were big & spacious. My wife and kids loved the stay at this hotel. Wished the breakfast was better with more options and give bigger portions rather than making the guest feel shortchanged.
Great location with ameneties and attractions right at the doorstep.
Very nice location for shopping (Vivo) and other attractions. Pool booking is limited. Simple and filling breakfast. Will visit again for its fab location and near monorail trams and bus A B C

We are so excited to stay at Hotel Michael . We stay here for 2 night. before we come to the hotel they got a link for us to express check -in and book the pools and gym. We book our pool @7pm. But when we go down they said our name do not show at the name list. Third day morning 7am the housekeeper press our door bell when i open the door the staff said their system stated we have check-out. I told him we have not yet check-out. But the nightmare not yet end. 9am the housekeeper again come and press our door and said the system states we have check-out. I reply the same. I would like to ask how come a six star hotel can have this kind of mistake . Honestly after the stay I will not recommend Hotel Michael to my friends.

Not for couple who wants a quiet place. Running and stamping noise above our room on 10th floor. The deluxe room that we stay doesn't look anything like the picture of the room in Agoda website. Check in on 11 Mar afternoon was slow despite only a couple of guests stand in the queue Room was not pre-assigned despite putting our request during booking. Overall, no value for the money. Only one plus point is the breafast was good, both western and local.
Check-in was not the best but the room and location are great!
Near to everything in sentosa

Took two and a half hours to check in. could hear from others waiting, complaining this is a common problem with resorts world hotels. Under staffed, management trying to save money, should be relaced. Ruined our first day as we couldn't attend our planned events.
Overall is great however please do soemthing with the aircon. 1 temp difference is a very big temp cha ge from freezing to warm

reviews.review_title: Thank u agoda and hotel Michael!”
reviews.review_comment: Room was big enough for my 3 young boys to move around. Had some issue when I booked extra booking due to email error. However, both agoda and the hotel managed to solve the problem for me after my stay! Check in at the hotel was fast using the self kiosk. The staffs there were friendly and helpful to answer my questions.
internet too lousy

If you want to stay in Sentosa, then the location is great. But do not expect great service or amenities. The room is clean-ish and functional but somewhat bare. Almost zero to do inside the hotel. Service staff are friendly enough but will not give any perks even if celebrating something.
Good
Lovely Room.. I like t so much. Very Nice Food.. I Enjoyed ..everything very clean.. GOOD SERVICE.. THANK YOU VERY MUCH

need to change the aircon and the mini fridge not that cold... need to changs the tv box channel as it keeps on hang... the breakfast quality very bad.. the only im happy the room i have is big and clean... and the location is superb..
Good for staycation n relaxation
Great
Had a great time in the hotel

Toilet was mouldy - eyelid stickers were pasted on the walls, shower head had layer of visible mould, and shower curtains were also mouldy. Feedback to hotel with video but only shower head was cleaned. Location was great and convenient but I think other hotels are definitely more SGClean than this one.

The location is good as it is within Sentosa Island. The staff are friendly and they prepared something for my birthday. A birthday banner and cake made of towel. However , a few areas for improvement. The hotel swimming pool is fully booked already. They should enable the guest to book the hotel pool before arrival. The signal of mobile data and wifi is weak.

One of the cheaper hotels in Sentosa you can find. Room wise is quite huge for a family of 4 but there is no bath tub. The swimming pool is relatively small and overall the services was good. Quite a pleasant stay overall
Friendly staff and prepare gift for us. Near to mrt & USS, very convenient as there are a lot of food.

The design of the rooms are kind of dated but if u looking for a clean room with good location this is it. In view of the covid situation, don't expect great breakfast choices at the breakfast venue. There was some mixed up during check up on the free breakfast we had for one of the night stay. But the restaurant mgr was very helpful in resolving it.

I have always chose Hotel Michael whenever I need a break from the hustle and bustle. I love how efficient and systematic check in and outs are. I appreciate that the staffs will try their best to accomodate your request (I asked for connecting rooms during CNY period) I also have to give credits to the valet services there for always being energetic and responsive to our needs. The bathroom they have added a bidet which is to me the icing on the cake. Overall, my experiences will always be positive with Hotel Michael
Easy access to everywhere in Sentosa! I had a great stay. Made my next reservation immediately after check-out.

No point telling guests to pre-book check-in timing when we all had no clue what was happening. Reached the lobby and told to wait at the lounge and our Q number will be called. While waiting I can see guests who had come in just go to the Q. Not a single number flashed on the screen after 20mins but I see the Q moving. Asked the staff again and said to wait for the number again. My autistic son was already restless at thay time. Myself and another guest were frustrated & gave up and queued. We were served normally. Informed the staff but they were just so focused on clearing the Q without acknowledging the issue. Poor management.
Disappointed with the carpark situated at the basement. The front desk is far from the car park. The rooms is not that clean when we check in.
Lots of improvement needed

Hotel Michael is in a great location for visiting Sentosa. Their staff are very friendly and helpful and they are taking good COVID safety measures. However, considering the size of the room, no bathtub, and the water pressure is absolutely horrible, I'm debating if it was worth the cost. With that said, if you plan to spend most of the day outside and just need a place to shower and sleep, the location is unbeatable .
Perfect for USS and Underwater world.

reviews.review_title: Staff ( External RWS staff not RWS staff ) and Cleanliness ”
reviews.review_comment: Upon arrival, staff ambassador which I assumed are third party (red shirt) and black shirt (security) were not friendly and rude. I was shocked and upset with such first entrance impression upon arrival. The main RWS staff were nice and polite and attended to our registration swiftly. Cleanliness in room was bad. I have an infant of 8mth old crawling on it’s full carpeted room and to our shock , bunch of strains hairs were found. Toilets has a bad smell. For such a reputable place, I do not expect a 5-6 stars service as I know mistakes tend to happen but just a reasonable basic courtesy and cleanliness. Is what all I ask for. I am a seasoned traveler and when credits are due for appraisal I will sincerely give. But I have to be honest for what I have experienced for the benefit of others to consider. Facilities and venue wise a expected, world class.

We tried this hotel because we wanted access to Sentosa so that we do not have to travel back home. I love the hotel about it's convenient to the tram so it was accessible in and out of Sentosa. Even the cable car station was nearby. So i would give 5 star for the hotel convenient.

Hotel is conveniently situated at the first monorail stop so very accessible. Short distance to various dining places and USS. Took us some time to check in. There are self check-in counters but somehow it doesn’t work when we tried to use it. Room floor was dirty and the tv wasn’t working. Had to make a couple of calls before they sent someone to fix it. Other than that, the rest of the amenities were ok.
Con: No bath tub

For the guest who wants near beach and USS this hotel is a must book. Just make sure you request your small favour to them prior to arrival cause they will check for the availability. The lady in front of the concierge is not that accommodating on your small request. Just pls learn how to smile. It will somehow ease the guest who’s tired the whole day. Above all RW is a nice place to stay.
nice place
Location 4 star Staff 2 star . Room 2 star . Breakfast 2 star
Good room and very acomodating staffs..

reviews.review_title: Nearby to attractions but in room facilities not up to expectation”
reviews.review_comment: The hotel is nearby the Resorts World Sentosa Express Station, thus easy transport for those who are not driving. However, disappointed that the minibar is empty and no free drinks in the minibar for guests. For such 5 star hotel, there minibars should be filled with free consumption drinks. The coffee powder is also not of a high quality and guests are provided with only 2 mineral water. I am quite disappointed with the in room facilities. The pool is just so small too. If two family of five enter the pool, it is already crowded.
Nice experience
Good experience
Friendly staff. Clean rooms. Excellent location and amenities
We enjoyed our short staycation. Room was very spacious and the hotel staff extended our checkout time by 2 hours for free.

reviews.review_title: “No” is a harsh review. It’s more of a “yes, but…””
reviews.review_comment: In all fairness, the hotel had some really good aspects worth mentioning. Polite and attentive staff, clean rooms, a valet service so you don’t have to navigate the giant parking (yay!), a bidet in the toilet, the RWS mall is nearby which has some eateries as well as the obvious selection of attractions… It’s a “but” because by and large I didn’t feel it was value for money. For the amount charged, I felt the additional touches from a service perspective was missing. There was no complimentary drink/fruit to welcome us (no, the mask, sanitizer and wet tissue doesn’t really count… does it?), much less a welcome kit with some information that would have been useful for a first time guest. There were no bathrobes or coffee machine. There wasn’t even a menu for room service. When we called the reception and asked about halal options nearby they only mentioned McDonalds. When we ordered through Foodpanda our rider was told bikes weren’t allowed in so we had to walk to B1 in the adjoining building to pick up the food - an information that would have been nice to know so we could help navigate our delivery contact. I wish the room came with at least a bathtub to make up for the sad view of the canopy blocking any signs of life or energy. The swimming pool unfortunately didn’t make up for it with it’s dismal size with not much of a view too. All in all, it wasn’t a bad stay per se. It just felt lacking in the special touches which is a shame given it’s proximity to tourist attractions. It’s not even trying to keep up with newer competition. It’s the little touches that’ll make the stay seem value-for-money and Hotel Michael is in need of a customer service intervention if it hopes to survive longer.
Spotted termites all over the tables and toilet marble tiles is slippery. Please be careful when step in toilet even with dry foot!

We booked a room for a family of 5 during new year eve. We paid 700sgd + with extra bed. We were so disappointed when we first stepped into the room. There were only 2 toothbrush kits provided and no bath top!

reviews.review_title: Other than location, not a great experience”
reviews.review_comment: As a married couple, we requested a king bed, however, we were given twin beds. What was advertised as "nature view" on the Deluxe room was the back of a building of an amusement park. Why are guests asked for the number of his employer during check in?
good value
Hotel Michael is a good location if you really want to explore sentosa island but quite pricey
staff are not friendly

reviews.review_title: Not worth it at all compared to other hotel in the City”
reviews.review_comment: The only best thing is located in Sentosa, with easy access to the beach, otherwise not worth it all.
Parking was free Next to sentosa express station. Easy to access other parts of sentosa

Easy to access by car or by sentosa express Booked 2 rooms Had some problems with the automated check in process. Staff was on hand to help. Only problem that we encountered was that the toilet paper had a very strong smell of rubber. 😓 Other then that our family enjoyed your stay there

This time I booked 4 rooms, 2 for my family of 4 and another 2 for my sister-in-law's family. Hotel Michael was a clean and nice hotel with friendly staffs. Very near to all the attractions and eating place. We enjoyed ourselves very much, good experience.
Not happy as the rooms were not to expectations and the staff were not friendly n we only got our room at 5pm
My family and i really had a pleasant stay at hotel micheal! thank you!

Check in via their self check-in booth was a little hassle but the friendly and prompt staff makes up for it. We got our key within 30 mins. Our stay was pleasant and the staff, even the safety ambassadors were friendly. Hotel location is great! Hotel room is superb!

reviews.review_title: Stay at Hotel Michael, Sentosa Singapore”
reviews.review_comment: he first experience one has at the hotel is during check-in. The allocate 1 hour slots which have to be booked in advance, but these have no meaning. I had booked a 3pm slot for checking in, but when I went to the reception , I had to book a queue number which was 33 numbers behind the current queue number being processed. The expected wait is about 2 hours. They have an option to do self check in, but these machines just do not recognise the booking reference or NRIC and I could not use them. It is surprising that a hotel that is in operation for 11 years have not been able to streamline this process. When I reached the reception counter, I was told that no non-smoking rooms were available for the Deluxe Suites that I had booked. After some discussion , they upgraded me to a bigger suite , which was very generous of them. My stay itself was very comfortable and relaxing. The breakfast was limited, especially for vegetarians like me and my family, but the staff at the restaurant were understanding and provided us with a couple of options. For a 5 star Hotel they could offer some fruits and non alcoholic to the guests , but the rooms are bare. The suite I stayed in had a kitchen, but there was no cutlery - no plates, no spoons, ladles and bowls for utilising the kitchen. Finally , another feedback on housekeeping. One of the bathroom doors was stuck . When we called maintenance, one person came and said that he needs another person to come and help. On the 3rd day , when we checked out , the door was still not repaired. We had to lock the bedroom door to use the bathroom. Other than the above the stay was comfortable and relaxing.
Hotel room is very clean. Check-in is fast and very smooth.

The check in process wasn’t great at all, check in time slots given but the world were there and room were not ready at the point of check in, only registration allowed, self check in counters were like dummy couldn’t be use and need to be directed to the counter. After registering for check in, room were not issued and we need to wait an hour more for keys to be issued at another counter. Very confusing and frustrating check in process. Room were great and spacious, was given the last room of the aisle near exit but far away from lift no complaints on this. What compensated were the room after a whole day out. Didn’t get pool slots at all couldn’t comment, breakfast weren’t fantastic not much choices only 1 western and 1 local for selection. Other than that thankful for the short walk after a tired full day at uss.

reviews.review_title: Review of my stay at Hotel Michael”
reviews.review_comment: I understand that due to the COVID situation, guests were only allowed to check in by appointment. I am very sad that as a local I cannot say that I am happy with the way the hotel staff handle the situation. There are only 2 staff serving the hotel guests and check in was delayed for a least 2 hours. As our hotel stay comes with breakfast, the guest can only order their set meal for breakfast which is understandable during this period. However I would like the management to seriously review to the standard of the breakfast. This is not my first staycation at Sentosa and I had stayed in other Hotels in Sentosa. To compare the breakfast with the other hotels in Sentosa, I am surprised to share that the breakfast provided by Hotel Michael was way below standard. With my experience at Hotel Michael, I am certain that I won't be going back there a second time. On the whole I am disappointed with the service as well as the breakfast menu.

booked months earlier and also wrote in to request for king bedding since i have a 3 yr old who will sleep together on the king bed. hotel acknowledged my request but during check in at 2pm, system only showed twin bedding. had to wait more than 1.5hr for queue number to be called and informed king bed room is not available. upon further pleading, finally was given a king bedding room but could only get the room after 4:30pm. honestly hotel needs to improve their check in process and crowd management. there are many unhappy guests waiting for hours to check in on a Thursday afternoon. special compliment to the poor japanese hotel staff who was alone in the self check in section. she was so overwhelmed and guests were asking for hotel management’s help to have one more staff helping the poor lady but none came (at least for total 3hrs i spent waiting to check in from 2pm to 5pm)

Two and a half hours to check in. They say come at 3pm and the lobby is full with angry customers waiting to be checked in. When you finally get to the counter, find out that there are no rooms available. Even at 5pm!!! Management needs a kick, employ more staff to manage your peak periods. Feel sorry for the reception staff, they must cop a lot from the guests. Looked like the same situation the next two days when we went in and out. Angry customers waiting.
