The hotel staff were all very accomodating and the place is conducive for family with young kids. We had a very pleasant experience and the kids enjoyed our stay. Hope to be back soon. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

Pros:They accommodated our connecting room request Very close to Universal Studio n all the eateries Cons: Confusing checking in process n no clear instructions on arrival Not enough seat at lobby while MANY guests wait to check in. Only was able collected room key at 4:30pm for one room n the second room at 6:30pm Swimming pool extremely uninviting No bathtub Communicating issue with housekeeping personnel, guest must speak Chinese for smooth inquiries

Waiting to check in was horrible. Only 1 poor Japanese lady handling all the initial check in. Could have assign more people to help her especially now is the holiday season and the queue is long! Room only ready at 5pm! And have to check out at 12pm the next day! Room was quite clean and beds were comfortable. Staff was friendly. Overall quite a good staycation!

reviews.review_title: Bed Bugs in Room, Absolute Killer”
reviews.review_comment: The staff and service were excellent, but the cleanliness of the room was really a killer. I noticed some bites on my arms and legs on my second day of stay and assumed it was mosquitoes. However, the marks said otherwise; the work of bed bugs. Considering the reputation of Hotel Michael and the fact that Sentosa is a tourist attraction, I’m very disappointed that an issue like bed bugs present is still something that’s present.

reviews.review_title: Unexpectedly poor experience for a Singapore Hotel”
reviews.review_comment: Check in process extremely slow. Need to queue for 2 hours to check in. After check in, was told registration done but rooms are not ready. Extremely disappointing. Not worth the price paid.
2nd times visit, great choice!
1. Checking in is slow 2. Check-in kiosk isn't working 3. Under staff

Nice hotel to stay, big beds, spacious rooms, but in terms of facilities, not much to offer witching the hotel, stayed 2 nights and couldn’t even book the pool for usage. Try to book a slot before you check in if you can or want to swim
Apart from location, the hotel facilities is not worth the money. Breakfast at a terrible
Waste of time spending a couple hours to perform checkin and key collection. Staff seemed to be poorly trained to handle high guest flow.
Had to wait till 6pm till my room was made available on a Thursday. Requests made beforehand doesn’t seem to be entertained.
took 2 hours for to check in
Good for families as convenient to eateries. Hotel should cater breakfast menu for ypung children too e.g. pancakes/waffles.

It’s near to USS, beach and Vivocity. Food is everywhere so you don’t need to worry whether you’ll get hungry. One bad side is: I waited for 1 hr to check in when there’s only 2 counter that’s open. Cleanliness of the room is just so-so. As we could smell a strong cardboard and cigarette smell. Overall, just satisfied.
Excellent hotel to stay in RWS. Very convenient to move around as Sentosa Express is just round the corner.

The location is great and ~5mins walk to monorail, universal studio, casino and restaurants. Did not manage to use any facilities because all fully booked. The very disappointing part is it took almost 3 hours before we were able to check-in. We have already pre-book the check-in slots for between 2 to 3pm, but unfortunately the queue to check-in was extremely long and even when it gets to our turn, the room was not ready. Mange to check in around 545pm.
Rooms very clean, service was prompt. Im a smoker thus having a smoking room is a plus.

Not much activities and shops opened. Maybe due to USS closed on Monday to Wednesday weekly. Understand the suitation now but should provide other activities and information on the web for user consideration.

Be prepared to wait till 3.30pm to 4pm for room to be ready. I would recommend you come in the morning to check in first and collect the keys later. I queued up for at least 40min before I was issued my keys. Many ugly Singaporeans scolding the severely understaffed frontdesk and jumping queue. Frontdesk staff remained professional and calm. Kudos to them. Hotel management should be there at frontdesk to help. Hotel is basic. Small pool so book your swimming slots early. Room was basic with no items in mini bar. Shower amenities provided. Good super single beds and thick towels. Nightshift auntie (7 dec evening) and guy (8 dec evening) was kinda rude. Otherwise, friendly staff overall. Location is excellent but note that most shops closed on mons to weds including USS. Good basic hotel but stay only during off peak as hotel is very understaffed. Do not expect luxury.

.Our room WIFI is not working #09-15 , please fix it before the next guests complain again! Our confirmed booking for swimming at 9am on 6 Dec was unfortunately not recorded in your name list and we were turned away (please see attached document to prove our confirmation of swimming pool booking). We spoke to Duty Manager Bryan @ 6577-8888 but to no avail as he cannot fulfill our 9am slot !
Need to wait for one hour to check in, self check in system can not function fully.
Other than hotel check in, everything else is good, value for money

Had a long waiting time at hotel lobby before check in. There were cigarette stubs at balcony (not really a balcony, but a small opening close to the window). Other than that room were clean. The location is good in term of access to other Sentosa view points.

Hubby n I stayed at this hotel 3d2n. I requested for king bed as we were coming for Bday Celeb. But we were given 2 super single bed at the end. There’s only standing shower in the room nor bathtub. Floor is clean but still found some hair on the table. The most ridiculous was taking an hour just for check in only . My hubby also can’t get a chance to go swimming due to fully booked on Monday
Bad

Queue in line to check in and I am number 4 in the queue. However, it took more than 1 hour to check in as keep having “VIP” can skip the queue and go first. The swimming pool, forget about it as you will never able to book one if you only go stay for a day. Probably need to book 1 week in advance. Other than that, everything is ok.

My 2-night staycation was great BUT the check-in experience was challenging! I have earlier pre-booked my check-in slot but to my horror was told it has been replaced by first come first serve queuing system. Reason being it's the December holiday season and hence they are expecting lots of hotel guests to check-in. Wouldn't it make better sense to spread out the check-in time by following the pre-book system, instead of making all your hotel guests sit around in the lobby waiting for ages to be served. The queue was also very slow as priority was given to casino members. There many automatic check-in kiosks but unfortunately they don't work. Even the hotel staff were helpless in assisting the guests with these check-in kiosk.

Checkit appt - 1pm to 2pm Arrive - 1:30pm Checkit: 3:45pm Room ready : 530pm Worst checkin experience Swimming pool Appt : 8am Arrive : 8:05 am - no one at swimming counter. - Self service for towel - swimming area hv used towel and litter Not worth the money

We drove that, and the carpark is so far away from the hotel. For those who is first time, I am lost and can’t seem to find the hotel. I have to walked 20 mins just to get a sense of direction and how to find my hotel. The hotel facilities are old, the tv is like ages ago, and remote is hard to press. Even thought the island is great to explore and have fun, but quiet disappointed with the stay. The check in queue is long and the check in machine does not seem to work
Good location, big room

hotels.name: Hotel Grand Pacific (SG Clean Certified)
hotels.address: 101 Victoria Street, Bugis, Singapore, Singapore, 188018

reviews.review_comment: Reviews can be deceiving.. If you have an open mind, the hotel is actually not bad.. location is great, the staffs are excellent. Yeah, the hotel need abit of revamping but overall it is a great stay.
Very kind stuff. Worth the money. Room is in good size. Comfortable to stay in.

reviews.review_title: Best Location Hotel in the City”
reviews.review_comment: The only thing we didn't like was the smelly bed sheets and pilow case. But the location is the Best! Very accessible to anywhere in town.
Convenient place, many restaurants nearby, shops and shopping centres within walking distance. Spacious room with nice view

Got this hotel paid extra as it was advertised with hotel and pool , turned up both gym and pool had been closed for some time Breakfast is basic cold toast not much else Rooms are dated needs a update

reviews.review_title: Swimming pool was close for renovation and breakfast was so-so”
reviews.review_comment: Booked the hotel was thinking of bringing our kids to the swimming pool but we were disappointed that the swimming pool was close for renovation which wasn't stated on their website. The breakfast set come was in a set menu instead of buffet style which we can take and eat as much as we would had wanted. Not recommended for travelers especially with young kids

reviews.review_title: Great location and nice room. Restroom was little disappointed ”
reviews.review_comment: Great location where very near bugis and the room was amazing. Little comments regarding toilet. There is stain on bathtub and looks quite old. Overall good.
Everything was good except the swimming pool was under Reno.
Quite clean.

If you’re looking at an affordable hotel with decent room and good location then definitely book this hotel. My 3 night stay comes with free breakfast and the value was worth it. Thank to Ms. Christine for upgrading my room, she was kind and very helpful. The breakfast was plated as its still pandemic but for me its already filling. Thank you!
WiFi not working swimming pool close location is good
Sound of lift is loud, just like a train is approaching
Should have inform us if the swimming pool outbof service as as with young kids...they are looking forward to swim
Upon reaching the hotel, we were told that the hotel is only for SHN guests. We had to book another hotel for our staycation on the spot.

Wasn’t told they have Stay Home Notice guests or would not have book there because the risks of transmission is quite high. Overall reasonable rate and location but understaff and quite a long wait at the counter for check in.
very good location and smooth check in and out
Hotel is very spacious, and not too expensive. Very good location too. However, our room came with a smelly sofa chair. Hotel staff accommodated to replace it.
City Center and good service staff

Location was good just that its an old hotel. Minutes walk to city hall mrt and bugis station. Shopping malls like bugis+ and bugis junction are nearby too. Food is easily accessible like markets and coffeeshop. Front desk staff are very helpful with helping me with carrying up and down of the pram. Hotel should have ramp to be more accessible as there is a short flight of stairs in/out of the hotel. Overall its a good stay with reasonably priced. Christine , Hayley and the indian frontline staff were very helpful and friendly.
Recommended Centrally located budget hotel to serve SHN with meals package

reviews.review_title: Horrible breakfast and staff seems very unsure of what they are doing”
reviews.review_comment: First day of check in, staff did not mention any information regarding facility usage and breakfast details till we check with them. They focus only on telling us extra payment requirement if we got covid. Nxt day morning, me and my gf ordered their American breakfast set (without any special order) at their breakfast cafe. They forgot our order and we waited more than 20min till we notice the table beside us receive their order (they ordered the same item as us) even though we are there much earlier. When food is served, we notice that we are missing several food item from the breakfast set (grilled tomato, ham, bacon etc) and the egg choice is wrong as well. What puzzled us is how did they serve us the food with 3 item missing and did not realize it since it is part of standard menu. Told the staff and he changed it for us, only to bring out wrong item again. All in all, our food item is wrong served 3 time. Their poached egg is also cold like it been left in the aircon for quite some time as well as overcooked (like hard boiled egg). Their tea and juice is also very diluted. Only good thing we can think of is their staff brought us the beer can opener at night time when we called their front desk and request for it.

Booked the hotel via agent but when I went for check in the staff just told me that they dont accept staycation. And that I have to call the booking agent. It could be avoided if they email me in the first place.

the hotel is much newer than i thought. was worried that it is a very old hotel. so surprised to find out the interior of the room is quite new. toilet is quite new too. room is big, with bath tub. a good choice of stay. walking 500m can reach bugis junction, many shopping and nice food there.
Good location
The hotel did not inform me that STB required upon I check in.They should contact me instead.
Convenient location

reviews.review_title: Value for location but not room”
reviews.review_comment: Furnishing is minimal, run down and not very clean. Buffet at restaurant is great and hotel is conveniently located in Bugis/City Hall area. Close to eateries and bus stop in front of hotel.
Bad!

A very big and spacious room. Nice layout of the hotel and near to all the Shopping Malls and Restaurant. Fast in Check-In and Check-Out and the Air-Con is very cold in the room. Unfortunately the parking is not free at all eventhough if you are the Hotel Guest and the facilities of the hotel looks old. But overall our stay here is positive. Shall be back again.
All the staff are super friendly and helpful. Attended to room issues very promptly and satisfactorily. Breakfast is good variety.
LOVE THE LOCATION-WALKING DISTANCE TO MALLS,BUGIS MARKET AND BUGIS MRT STATION. ROOM WAS CLEAN AND NICE COMFY BED. FRIENDLY STAFFS TOO (:
The room is small compare with the price we paid for. Location very handy we liked it. In the room is very clean.

I stayed in Hotel Grand pacific for two days. Pros: The location is good. Close to MRT, shopping malls, Bugis, etc. Staffs are friendly. I was allowed to check-in at 10 am which I greatly appreciated after a long haul 25-hour flight. Cons: Bed - It is not comfortable. It is also not a wooden bed frame. It is a rollaway bed. Room- the room is small and looked old. There was a space between my window and outlayer window and that space was dusty.
Staff were excellent at all times in assisting my partner who needed the use of a wheelchair. This is our second stay at this hotel and we will definitely be staying there again.
Location near MRT and waking distance near little India and Bugie market places
Unfriendly and uncooperative staff, old and mouldy smells in the bedrooms, dirty pool.
Best location near two MRT City Hall & Bugis Station, Hotel Staff is good and thank to agoda to search best deal

reviews.review_title: Satisfactory hotel. Helpful staff. Good food. Reasonable price. ”
reviews.review_comment: Keep up the good work...!
Need to upgrade the hotel condition

we have been staying at this hotel twice per year on and off for the last twelve year when it was called the alson but the last couple of years it has gone down hill it is the first time we have used your company and we will use your company when we come in november and january but at a different hotel on the last day in january our room was flooded it took an hour for someone to come and another 30mins for the manager to come water was running through the wiring no apolige left email address but heard nothing took photos

reviews.review_title: Fantastic location close to MRT starions bus at the front door, rooms are clean and comfortable.”
reviews.review_comment: Have stayed here many times. Convenient location with bus at door and several MRT stations within a few minutes walk. Great breakfast, friendly staff. The rooms are clean and comfortable. Great value for money.
The property is tired looking. there are 3 lifts but seems like 1-2 were always not working properly. Bathroom sink was leaking, generally not worth the price. Other better options nearby
Too crowded with few elevators
Quite an old tired hotel but so clean and fantastic location! I would definitely stay again
stayed here many times always enjoyable and all requirements are attended to
The location was comfortable and walking distance of many tourist destinations. The room was not clean enough even after the repeated reminder.

The hotel is in good location very near to bugis and bus station , beside is 711 for 24 hrs food needs, the staff are so accomodation except the deskman who check us in , a little irritating -he has this bad manners not so welcoming and arrogant...overall our stay is really good and will book again when i come back to singapore..

reviews.review_title: Great hospitality and worth the value”
reviews.review_comment: Booked 3 rooms and thanks for the staff to arrange it at the same floor for two of the rooms. I booked a triple bedroom which comes with a queen bed n single bed. It fit just nice for two adults and one 5 years old kid. However, we have to keep an eye on our 7 months baby when we put him on bed as the bed was quite high compare to standard. We requested a baby cot the next day and thanks to the staff for arranging it as previously was told the room was quite crowed if they were to put a baby cot in. Thanks to the housekeeping staff as well to change the bed sheet when requested due to certain reason. It was a pleasant n great stay for us there. Besides, it was within walking distance to bugis+, bugis Street and bugis Junction mall in 10 minutes. Strategic location with a lot bus stop nearby.

The room was clean and my request for two extra pillows was acceded to. Room’s cooling aircon was switched on when I entered the room and the nice gesture of providing two oranges on the room table provides a tinge of warmness of the CNY’s festive spirits. I would certainly go back to this hotel again.

No water tap for using at toilet cleaning. Next day room cleaning very late and doing it very fast by not paying attention of setting beds and putting ckeaning of used coffee cups etc. Order room service of food take more than half hourbfor getting one fried noodle plate. Morning break fast many showing sign board of food but when open it found hot warer only. Coffee water is not hot and no one taking care at breakfast area. Asked for morning call first day staff said we forgot due to mistake of our new staff. Not worth at all for paying money with family trip. How they are showing 4 stars it should show 3 stars hotel.

Picked this hotel because of it's convenient location, and it is definitely in a very convenient location for access to Orchard Road and Bugis Street precinct. Marina Bay precinct can be accessed with a 20 minute walk. That's kind of where the good part ends. This is an obviously older and now quite tired hotel. The facilities were adequate, but the room was tired but adequate. Dining in the restaurant was extremely disappointing for one evening meal we had there (seafood buffet), and the breakfast was adequate, but nothing more. I would suggest that this hotel is a relatively cheap option if you don't intend to spend any time in the hotel other than sleeping, and that you dine elsewhere.
-Good location -Very friendly and helpful staffs -Rooms are BIG, clean & comfortable -Breakfast is awesome
The room.is very old ..the batchroom is dirty expecially the drained water hole .that is a small insect come out from the drain hole ..the room is old and no clean

reviews.review_title: Value hotel with great access to food and shopping”
reviews.review_comment: Excellent access to buses and MRT and very close to Bugis, where there are lots of food choices and shopping. Good value and comfortable accommodation.

the front desk was quick to help me when they see struggle to carry my luggage. They also checked in to see if i was alright when i turn on the do not disturb for the whole day. location is about 10 min walk to bugis junction. bed was good and room is clean
The hotel appears to be understaffed. The checking-in process took a lot of time and so did the checking out. The location is great and the room was suitably large and clean.

The rooms are a bit old... paint and wood is peeling off esp. in the toilet door ... dust everywhere .. their cupboard and closet seems like haven't been cleaned for ages ... stains on the sheets .. old towels .. stains on the carpet .... during our 3 nights stay, they never changed the bed sheets not even once. They don't vacuum the floor... they just tidy up the beds, changed the towels, replenish the toiletries.. NOT worth the money paid for 2 rooms!!
Nice hotel
goood
The room spacious and clean, but maybe it's need some renovations.
Great location for couple who prefer walk for shopping
All good

Good location, good pricing. Breakfast here is about the best value meal in Singapore. Some of the rooms are a bit dated, but they are gradually renovating them. Staff are very friendly and helpful. Biggest problem is the lifts. Three lifts, one of which wasn't working the whole time we were there, and the two operating lifts were not electrically connected - pushing buttons only activated one of the lifts - leading to longer delays than necessary especially at peak times like checkout.
Get the newly renovated room.. smaller than the old version
You can go anywhere easy
Noisy guests spoiled it

For $400 a night. This is by far my worst experience. Firstly there were stairs right when you reach the entrance and no one was there to assist you life your luggage up. I was only offered assistances when I reach the front desk which was obviously too late. Recep was not friendly at all. She did not even give a smile. Another guest interrupted but she clearly did not speak English and she seemed like like lost her bag. But instead of offering help, Recep have her a look of disgust. Like she couldn’t be bothered. She just replied with a “huh? What? no no no. I don’t know.” And went on with doing her staff. She then handed me over to another Recep. A younger male who seemed new or maybe just reserved. Seemed nervous. She kept on telling him what to do and what room to give me. Spoke in Chinese infront of me which to me was offensive. If you need to speak in private pull him aside instead of just telling him across the front desk in another language. Someone else could have assumed that they were talking about them. So it is definitely not nice at all. Room was old and dated. Bedsheet Had some stains on it. I called for ice. Remember I’m paying $400 for one night. I was then told that a bucket of ice would cost $5. I’ve never been charged for ice so to me this was absurd given the price I was paying and this was not a budget hotel. Pushed one of the beds to the corner as I needed more space and lo and behold, dust and rubbish were found. Clearly they have not swept or vacuumed under the bed for years. Lift was also old and slow. There were different buttons for different lifts. So that was confusing too. All in all, totally not worth the price. Not a very pleasant experience too. Very much disappointed and a total waste of $400.
The location is very convinient to Bugis and bus to Suntec and other places

I’ve been staying in this hotel for quite sometimes, as i can say I’m a reguler, and always satisfied with this hotel. Good location for the first. Secondly, the staffs very nice, polite and communicative . We like Velu very much (the concierge) Nice room, spacious enough but the twin bed is small for me and my child (age 9), so if you bring children and want to stay in 1 room, you have to order additional bed for the comfy nice sleep. Definitely will recommend this hotel to may friends and family. Keep up the good work!
Hotel with old amenities need upgrade

reviews.review_title: Good hotel to stay, near to bugis street”
reviews.review_comment: Reception staff Mr Kenny Lai was good. Thank you. Not so keen with the staff at the restaurant, not friendly. Skipped the idea for buffet lunch cause the staffs at the restaurant.

We had a great room (1416) that was clean and modern. The beds were really comfy and the rooms were quiet and we slept well. It is a shower over a bath, but there was a handle to hold to assist with getting in and out and the bath only had low sides so it was better than others. There was some enamel coming off in the bath but we werent bothered by that. The location is excellent, with an MRT line less than 5 mins away (bras basah) and a bus stop out the front that many buses stop at. The Bugis and City Hall MRT were 5-10 mins walk away. There is a small hawker centre straight across the road, and the bugis shopping centre and market about 5 mins walk away.
Location is good not far from bugis and easy to find food, room is big and clean

Great shopping and eats - all things BUGIS within easy walk from hotel. Close to Bugis and Bras Basah MRT. Bras Basah is the station to choose if making your way there from an MRT with luggage as only 200m. Beds are a bit hard but a mattress topper was supplied when we called reception which made the bed more comfortable. Great buffet breakfast. Several food courts nearby under $10 AUD. Bus stop right outside hotel. Used MRT to Casino $1.50 SGD each and as it was after midnight coming back to the hotel only $8 AUD taxi ride back including surcharge.

Rooms were clean, bit dated but the location was fantastic. Near Bugis and City Hall MRT’s. Breakfast was good, presentation lacking a little but plenty of it. Same for westerners every morning. Bacon, eggs, baked beans, hashbrowns, fruit plus danishes and Chinese choices.
when I stayed, few of rooms in my floor were being maintained. I heard some hacking.

The hotel is worth your money, maybe not the hi-tech type but you can have a good sleep with their comfy bed and pillows, good breakfast choices, and the staff named Velu is the most friendly and accomodating staff during our stay.
The only cons is that the parking is not free 😬
Toilet bowl was clogged. Basically the hotel is too old and need to refurbished. The carpet is not vacuum and I can see lots of hair n dust.

reviews.review_title: Good value for location and good sized & comfy bed”
reviews.review_comment: Pros -very good location around Bugis, just opposite National Library which is another plus for my kids to have some quiet time -comfy bed, extra pillows for us and kids, complimentary baby cot, bottled water and good selection of tv channels -next to it is a 7-Eleven -very near to attractions, malls, bus stop, mrt -staff is friendly and check in/out is a breeze Cons - hotel room furnitures are dated and old but it is still usable so I am OK with it -Toilet smells after flushing but still bearable -Bath tub sized a bit small for adult, just nice for my 6&8yo kids to play in it -Cleanliness can be improved eg:dusty around the corners of wardrobe, under the bed and floor. -If you are sensitive to sound, you might need to consider to ask for room at the far end as we can hear tourists passing our room and talking outside/ other kids running around But for such price and location I would say worth it!!

The ONLY issue I wish to highlight is the attitude of the front desk staff. I am wondering if "Greetings" is not mandatory in their service. I wonder if that is only extended to foreigners that aren't Asian looking. I enquired about the legitimacy of having my Identity Card photocopied & the response was rather stern & harsh as though I was making a big fuss, which I didn't. I handed my credit card to the lady staff when a deposit was required. She processed the transaction but however, a male staff completed the transaction & returned my card instead. I thought it was strange that she didn't return my card herself. I think it is important that the same person who handled a customer's card should be the one to return back to the customer as this would prevent an error in returning to a wrong customer. Finally, did she wish me a pleasant stay in the hotel? I didn't expect any but it would have made my day if she did.

reviews.review_title: Very disappointed with the hotel staff. They give me room with renovation ongoing on top of my room”
reviews.review_comment: The hotel should not give the room to me. Even on sunday morning arround 8am the contruction start. can't sleep at all. Will not recommended for all type of travellers.
The carpet and beds are a bit dated but the staff and location were excellent. Staff was very helpful. For the money, it was definitely a good deal.

reviews.review_title: This is old hotel, insolation is needed to fix, too noisy”
reviews.review_comment: Don't think we will be back to this hotel again
Very good staff, clean room, Great location as the center of Singapore. Very good to stay.
Walking distance to shopping area and public transport such as MRT are very near.

First time we stayed here room was very new and nice. Two years later when we stayed here, we got s room that was not renovated yet ? I wouldn’t recommend but all in all adequate room even if a bit old

Value for money, Good size clean & comfortable room. breakfast had good variety of food to select from. Location was perfect for shopping & restaurants. Staff helpful & friendly. Definitely stay again.*****

Staff were very helpful, friendly and accommodating - arranged airport shuttle service. Location is very central to transport, eateries and shopping malls. Rooms were nice and large, but dark gloomy decor. Housekeeping requires attention in ensuites ie; terrible mould under hand basin rim, bath tap and bath drain. Pool area needs to be available a little later in the evenings. Would stay again
Near Mustafa Centre where there is everything there
Its an old establishment. But location wise its good
simple but complete facilities for two night stay..

reviews.review_title: The only thing changed as a concern is no key needed for going up the elevator which lowers the secu”
reviews.review_comment: The hotel has lowered the security requirement for inserting room key in order to go up the elevator which is my concern of guest security.

reviews.review_title: The hotel provides a good location in Singapore ”
reviews.review_comment: If you are food addict person or you love to walk around to discover the beauty of Singapore then this hotel is the one. Disadvantages: 1) their breakfast is not halal and it’s same and boring. 2) they don’t have hand spray in the bathroom 🤦‍♂️. If you have no problem with the above then I highly recommend this hotel to everyone.
Pros: Near shopping.mall Cron: kind of old and no free parking
Good Hotel
the hotel was very cosy, walking distance from everything, really enjoyed my stay there
very good
Good location, apart from that this hotel has nothing going for it. The bathroom is so small it’s a struggle when the door is open. The internet is poor.

Good location. Room is very tired, small and toiletries are basic. The carpet is old. The lifts are small and could only handle about 5 people and luggage. Overload easily.. The staff at reception was very kind and showed us three rooms available that we could choose as we were dissatisfied with the first two rooms that were given to us.

hotels.name: Hotel G Singapore (SG Clean Certified & Staycation Approved)
hotels.address: 200 Middle Road, Bugis, Singapore, Singapore, 188980

reviews.review_comment: Lot of eateries around, and walking distance to shopping mall
The room is too small
loved the hotel vibe and very central location! room is comfy only downside is no fridge. Restaurants were great too. will be back again!
Explore the heart of Singapore without paying exorbitant prices. G hotel is a sure cozy and convenient place.
Staffs are friendly and they provide prompt room service. The room is a little small but big enough for 1 person.

Really excellent amenities in a very small room, although not unexpectedly so. Still very well designed to make the most of the small space, and loved the toiletries too. The location is excellent for all kinds of good and affordable food. Oh, and 25 degrees' burgers are amazing!
Cozy

Simply love e location of e hotel..walking distance to bugis junction.. Love e room..although its small bt i find it very cozy Staff are friendly.. Need not worry abt food..food are every where around e location
The cleanliness of toilet need to improve, especially the floor as there quite slip
The room is cozy and perfect for solo travellers.Location is convenient and food surrounding.Staff is friendly and helpful.

Booked the queen package with free upgrade and burger in bed. However, we were given the smaller room instead of the upgraded one. When I contacted customer service, they offered a free upgrade and free parking (the original package that I bought) when I book with them AGAIN. Overall, quite a lousy experience.

reviews.review_title: Great location and value for money”
reviews.review_comment: The location is convenient with MRT stations and bus stations nearby and the room is comfortable and clean.

reviews.review_title: Great location and many eatery just around. ”
reviews.review_comment: Hotel is just a very basic
near town and cafes
Nice hotel for staycation 👍👍👍

Horrible stay at hotel G. Carpark doesn’t even have enough lots. To add insult to injury, they only provide 1 carpark coupon even though I stayed for 2 nights which is ridiculous. Room is tiny, not very clean. Please avoid staying here, money is better spent elsewhere.
Good stay but very very small room...

reviews.review_title: Great location and nice boutique hotel”
reviews.review_comment: Hassle free check in and out. Hotel staff is friendly and helpful. Room size is adequate for single or couple. Spacious room and big comfortable bed. Very convenient place with 2 restaurant in the hotel and lots of eatery nearby.

For short stay - no wardrobe, luggage stool or mini fridge. For solo or couple - frosted glass between bath and room. For WFH - good standard table and chair (not office). However, only the bed is facing the small TV (no mirroring or cast). View of next building. Pillows and quilt smell although linen is clean. Staff has great customer service. Location is ideal for exploring and shopping.
Location of the hotel is good, but it is very noisy inside the room. Rooms are close together, bad sound proofing.
2d1night stay. Clean room. Love Ginett food and wine.

Hotel is great, have returned for multiple times. Bathroom is spacious and clean, with tons of bathroom accessories available for use. Room decor is also beautiful and pictures shown are accurate and true to size of room. However the prices can be revisited as it has been increasing steadily over the past few months. Definitely recommend if price is not an issue.
Very nice & convenience hotel 👍🏻👏🏻
The room is very small
Great if you looking for a cozy and peace environment, design of the room was fabulous. With a reasonable price too

stayed 3 nights ..when sunrise , they are cracking noises from outside the room . No idea what is that nosies sounds like metal expansion noises …1st night of stay , I felt itches over my body , bed perhaps not clean. Requested to change flwg to solve the problem .

Room were rather small. Kinda dusty around the curtain areas indeed housekeeping should make an effort to do some cleaning. Water around basin area tend to leak on the floor maybe due to the small area n low running tap. Room is very comfortable, and situated in a very convenient location. Multiple mrt station within walking distance. Food at 25 Degrees is delicious. I will recommend friends to stay here. We were lucky to secure a room at such ideal location at the very last minute of new year's eve. Staff were very prompt and courteous on any of our request during our stay. Keep it up ✅ Overall had a good experience with Hotel G. 🙂

Me and my partner check in late . We book the park view room but there’s no one park view room available. So have to downgrade to city view which we don’t mind. But feel that they should reserve the room .
Rooms are very compact and "cosy". Clean and value for money. Centralised location and easy access to the MRT and food nearby.
Very clean hotel & cosy...
Clean and comfort place to chill, and relax.

reviews.review_title: Decent ! For its location and friendliness of the staffs”
reviews.review_comment: Thanks Aiman for facilitating the stay. I had a last min booking during Christmas but had an exceptional stay.
Clean & Comfortable Room, But Too Bright! Easy Access To City Or Temples Or Nearby Food Centre. Nice Pub & Decor.

reviews.review_title: Value for money, wifi may be an issue”
reviews.review_comment: Definitely worth the price. Strategic location. Very helpful staff as I was serving my quarantine while waiting foe PCR test result. The Wifi can be unstable at times though.

reviews.review_title: Nice hotel room with many food arnd the hotel”
reviews.review_comment: Nice hotel room with many food arnd the hotel

reviews.review_title: Nice hotel at a good location”
reviews.review_comment: My first time staying in this hotel. Location: Good location as it's near Sim Lim Square, shopping centers, and food courts/restaurants. Transportation: Near bus stops and 10 min walking to MRT. Room: Small but comfortable. There's not much of a view out of my room. Some of the electrical outlets and light bulbs were burnt out and need to be replaced, and there's quite a bit of dust that can be seen behind the TV since it's mounted in a way that can be seen easily. Staff: Friendly and efficient. Parking: Ample paid parking within the building. Overall enjoyed my stay for a few nights.

Hidden gem in town. Loved the huge tv and good shower. However, there were ants in the room and cigarette smell (even though it’s a non-smoking hotel). Service could have been better. But overall for the price paid, I think it’s decent enough.
My 1st encounter, as a hotel guest, I had to pay for carpark. Should add all room rates with carpark. Overall satisfied.
Nice hotel n good food
An amazing stay. Being an amazing affordable boutique hotel is not easy to maintain but you guys did it with great customer service. Having basic gym with boutique ambience is nice.
Great room ambience
ok
It would be wonderful if a fridge could be provided in the room
excellent nice. No parking place.
Cosy, quite nice bedroom but poor bathroom/toilet design. Floor always wet and never dry throughout my stay. Otherwise great location, lots of food nearby.
Very bad experience, in Covid-19’s times also Not clean the room

I realised I left my expensive silk pyjamas in hotel after checking out. When I called to Hotel G for several times and they feedback that they will get back to me but never called me back after waiting for 1 day. Every time I called back and their staffs just gave me the same answer which are their staffs are still busy to clean other rooms. Truly disappointed with the service.
the mattress is super soft... did not have a good rest. the aircon was making noise.... 🤦‍♂️ 🤦‍♂️ 🤦‍♂️

a funky hotel, getting there for first timer was not easy as the hotel entrance/lobby/driveway is on level 2 (Had to enter the building carpark to get there). Not suitable for couple imo as the room is really tiny but efficient. The frontdesk staff are polite and helpful. Overall a good experience.. Thank you!

I'm not sure if it is because they were overwhelmed, but there were a few pain points. Let's go through the good points first. 1) Room was a bit more spacious than I expected, with the toilet quite generous. More importantly, the room was clean and the bed was comfortable. 2) Even though there wasn't a refrigerator, staff was kind enough to offer a solution which was to place it in a common refrigerator and retrieve it later. Now, the not so good points. 1) The reception is always busy. 9 times out of 10, nobody picks up my call. And I wasn't calling at the peak period (i.e. check in check out timing) either. 2) I understand that parking is not included, and that was made clear when I asked the staff. Staff mentioned that there is a max charge of $15. Imagine my shock when I was charged almost double of that. I'm not sure if a coupon was needed to get that flat rate or not, but I wasn't offered and it was implied to me that per entry, that was the maximum I'll be charged and that it'll be automatic. It's not a large amount but it sure left a sour taste in my mouth. Overall, it's not too bad, a little pricey but maybe don't come when they're busy.
Paid King bedroom but room size quite small...But everything is good.
Paid King bedroom but room size quite small...But everything is good.
Nice room and staff, but super long wait.

Honestly speaking, the room that I book is very small for this price. Ambience wise thumb up and that comes with a window view that can see bit of MBS. Room a bit dusty and can see cob web on the ceiling. Pillow is also very thin. Bed placement is not fantastic at all for a chinese who is superstitious as the bed is facing the door directly. Power point is also very limited. No bidet in the toilet as well. But the pressure of the rainshower is damn good. Check in wise is fast and smooth. Overall experience - average for this hefty price.
Room was super small, toilet was horrible. Have mosquito in the room…
Friendly staff and seamless check-in, great experience
Air cond no cold enough The controller unable to control the temperature correctly

Went to Hotel G to celebrate my birthday and anniversary with my hubby. We love the lightings in the room. Room was clean. Staff were very helpful and friendly. Breakfast @ 25 degrees was really good. Gym was also equipped with good and new machines for a good workout. Only thing missing is that the hotel does not have a pool. Else we would really enjoy the stay even more.
Clean and well decorated
Great location n easy access to food places
Nil
Refer to my other review for details.

The hotel is just 3 minutes walk away from Bencoolen MRT exit A. Right at the lobby is a burger restaurant / chill bar, not to mention the ample food options around the area. At this pricing, you are getting hot shower, clean bed, cold aircon and free water/coffee/tea/good toiletries. Highly recommeneded!

Been here a couple times. Nice comfy room, although very small. But staff are nice. Downside is the parking. Dropoff/parking can be confusing for first-timers. Gotta be careful. Other than that, everything else is ok.

Best deal for couples if you’re looking for a short getaway just to have couple time to Netflix & Chill. We arrived on a peaked Saturday with lots of occupants in the line for check in, time took about 20mins with 3 counter staff, considered pretty fast. Staffs were very polite and efficient, everything was smooth and made easy. The promo comes with a room upgrade so we default had an King’s room which is adequately sufficient for couples, not a big room but it’s modernly furnished. In the center of Bugis, there’s plenty of food and location to roam about. Then comes the morning breakfast burgers and fries, it was delicious. Check out time was also shifted to 2pm as part of the package, that was hard to miss for any staycation. Overall an very worthy bang for buck promotion, I would at least minimum recommend an King size room thou if you can’t stand small rooms. Another drawback would be the lift which is only one that serves all occupants.

Yes, it is value for money if you are looking for a Three Stars Hotel when you come to Singapore. But not for local travellers looking for a staycation. Room is too small, toilet is small too. Tried calling 'G Stop' several times but nobody picked up. Burgers delivered are really delicious though. Thanks but really just one try.
Great location and clean room.
Been coming for weekly getaways..no complains. everything smooth. n gd front counter staff.
Thought my one-night stay was as comfortable as it could be. The staff was really friendly and helpful.

reviews.review_title: Not so welcoming receptionist, dirty toilet.”
reviews.review_comment: Welcomed by a not so friendly receptionist during check-in. When enter the room the toilet was not cleaned properly with un-emptied bin and stain on toilet bowl. They were supposed to send food at 11-1pm as i opt for burgersinbed theme but the cold burger and fries was send at 1.30pm saying that they tried to send earlier but we weren't there..

2nd time staying in this hotel. Was happy that we gotten a free upgrade to King room. Everything was good except was disturbed by this noisy sound from the ceiling at night time ... not sure from the aircon or what as it went on throughout the night and didnt even stop, making me and my partner did not sleep well. Not a good stay this time round.
Great stay
Excellent Location

Great welcome from the reception team! They were able to assist and provide a solution quickly while maintaining the standard of their hotel service when I called in earlier to ask about early check in and also regarding the maintenance work done which disrupted my stay they. Location was prime and close to shopping ctrs and food places. Room was comfy and clean. One feedback is to install a bidet in the bathroom. Else, everything else was exceeding my expectations. Thank you team Hotel G! ☺
Just perfect.. maybe a little bit small for couple but still its quite resonable

reviews.review_title: Great stay! will come back again”
reviews.review_comment: Had a really great stay w hotel G, i checkin at ard 2.24pm and was surprisingly smooth, the man who service me at the reception was so friendly!👍🏻✨ Everything was nice n clean just that you might need to as for more set of the essential (shampoo,toothpaste etc) as its too little

reviews.review_title: SMALL BUT CLEAN ROOM WITH GOOD LOCATION.”
reviews.review_comment: We booked Hotel G because it’s close to Bugis Junction, Fortune Center, and pretty close to Fort Canning, Clarke Quay and Plaza Singapura etc. There are plentiful of food choices all around hence it’s very convenient. Staff have been very helpful and accommodating :) Room is also clean but is rather small and narrow. The windows are generally small and for some rooms, it’s very small (maybe only about 50cm) hence the rooms are quite dark which is one thing that we don’t like. Other than that, I think the breakfast choices can be improved to include vegetarian and vegan choices to cater to a wider crowd.

I've always loved Hotel G - mainly the location, overall vibes and staff are why I keep returning.. Having booked the room for a special occasion, I reached out to the Hotel G Team with a request of checking out late. Not only was my request granted (with an additional fee of course), a staff named Dayana gladly upgraded my room as well. I was beyond elated! Whilst the room came with its own set of problems (the phone line couldn't work - backstory: we wanted to ask if we could have our pint of ice cream kept in their freezer, which was allowed btw!), the setbacks were quickly attended to by a technician pakcik - including ensuring that our ice cream did not result in an unfortunate state. Thank you to Mell who was also crazy helpful! Absolutely love Hotel G, and more importantly, the amazing staff! 💕
Clean environment
This hotel is one of the most value for money in terms of location, level of service provided and smart TV available. Pillows should be changed for better comfort
Clean quaint room nearby central area and easily accessible to great food and drinks places.

Really enjoyed our staycation at Hotel G. Great service provided by hotel staff. No minibar in room but our request for ice was always met promptly Only one drawback is that sounds from the plumbing (?) could be heard from time to time.
Value for $ , Get staycation
Location is very convenience, with many eateries nearby. Nice room with vey comfort bedding. Good for the staycation after the busy week schedule

Coming back second time, overall is still good. Downside is only the extension of check out to 6pm can be slightly costly (up to almost $100 for the late check out). Other than that, quite happy on the stay.

Location is good, close to fortune center and 10mins walk to bugis junction. Room is clean and spacious (we choose the special package of complimentary room upgrade) Necessities also provided in the room. Tv also good, they have different kind of channels.
convenient
It’s bad
Cons: - No mini fridge - No free parking - Only 2 charging sockets Pros: - The bed was good
It’s a new hotel with 5star looks.

Booked this last minute during prime date thus there was a line during check-in. Despite that, the check in was fast and staff were friendly. Love the location. In the middle of Bugis and Orchard which is super convenient. Will be back for my next staycation.
Book a package with complimentary breakfast and $50 voucher for takeaway. Also late check out till 2pm. High value
Very good n clear

I always love going to hotel G for my staycation. But experience was average this time as the in house phone was spoilt since i check in and was a hassle for me to go to the reception to request for ice and water.
Im glad I chose this place to have me time for myself ❤️

reviews.review_title: Hotel G end of july staycation”
reviews.review_comment: Room wise quite small for a queen bed sharing. Loved the deco in the room, amenities were pretty basic
No bar fridge. Currently having covid guest to to stock some xtra beverage n small bite food.

Staffs were very prompt, although there was a long queue before we book in due to the covid 19 restrictions. They were very smiley and greet us all along with the experience from the ground floor till check in.
I enjoyed the laid back vibe of the place. Good location, near to restaurants and buses around Sentosa. There is also a complimentary shuttle from harborfront mrt.
Great location,the room is clean friendly staff and housekeeping too..

hotels.name: Summer View Hotel (SG Clean and Staycation Approved)
hotels.address: 173 Bencoolen Street, Bugis, Singapore, Singapore, 189642

reviews.review_comment: Very accommodating hotel staff. My mom is wheelchair bound. The staff are willing to help us with the back access for wheelchair to travel in out smoothly. Good location to shopping centres, hawker centres and Fortune Centre especially for vegetarians

looks nicce on the outside but lift lobby no aircon and very narrow. Rooms are not soundproof and overnight can hear other loud guest talking and laughing. No visitors allowed as well nobody can visit. sigh

Went in with friends. We had a 2 bed-room with additional 2 more single beds. We came there literally just to sleep and prep so it was okay. The room had a very small window and it felt like a maze finding it. If you ever want a group stay for anight this one is great.
Very near to bugis, and have quite a lot nice food around

Location is ok, walking distance to MRT. Just right next to Burlington Square / behind Kwan Imm temple. Downstairs have Korean store, convenient for snacks / drinks top up. And 7-11 opposite. Downside is that the sound proof is very bad, corridor voices can be heard. We stayed many hotels but first time receiving complaints that we are noisy at 10pm plus...

reviews.review_title: Book in-advance a month ahead and was assign a room with twin bed”
reviews.review_comment: I had book in advance about a month ahead, still was assign an twin bed join into one as a double bed which was not comfortable and keep drifting apart while sleeping making a gap in-between the 2 bed.

SummerView hotel is clean and well located. my only problem was the No Visitor ALLOWED mention after you check in. and it is right there in the lobby. on top of that every time you come in you will have to write your name, room number, temperaturea and sign before allowed to go up to your room. a little inconvenient
The hotel’s location is good, close to Rochor and Bencoolen MRT. Breakfast menu is limited, though. But good enough to statt the day.
Clean & nice Nice for staycation

i booked this hotel for the location but turns out it wasn’t that convenient either! quite a long walk to reach bugis but at least there’s a 7-11 opposite. i booked the deluxe family room (room 313), it was huge - came with 2 queen sized beds, 2 chairs, a big bathroom and a lot of space (can fit a pool table or smth). it was rather clean! everytime you go out, you have to scan your tracetogether app & temperature taking when you come back and record it on the book before heading up to your room, which is quite a hassle. extra visitors are not allowed - i booked a room for 4 and my friend wanted to come in the day (and not stay overnight) but was told that he had to pay $50 to come, quite ridiculous… i requested for extra chairs, hotel room slippers and they were prompted brought to our doorstep. you can bring your own HDMI cable to connect your computer to the tv but it is quite hard to connect it as there is little space between the wall and tv to fit the cable. coffee, tea, a water boiler, cups and more were provided as well and complimentary which was quite nice. there was no view at where my room was, and the aircon was not that strong either. overall, i’ll rate this hotel a 6/10! not bad but could be better.
Good value and good location to Bugis MRT and shopping. They nickel and dime for everything. The clean up of the room is on their schedule.

Summerview is located 3 mins stroll from Rochor Station (blue) and 5 mins stroll to Bugis Station (green). Cross over the road to the bus stop, can go Golden Mile for Thai cuisine, the little Thai area and the Chinatown or Orchard area. Can conveniently stroll to Little India too. The front office team is excel in their greeting and service. We come here to have our short break like up to 5D4N monthly. That's how we like this staycation.
Location good near town Staff melvin very friendly and helpful
Hotel Room is badly maintained, the bed is hard and has dirty stain on bedsheets
Clear room and friendly staff
Clean quiet environment. Staffs are very polite n helpful
Lower than expectation. Bed and pillow are terrible. Weak power of hair dryer. The only good thing is the bathroom and toilet. Not recommend.
Initially booked for 8 nights, then seeing the room and maintenance, extended another 8. You cannot complain anything here, worth the money you pay for.

The room was exactly same with the pictures, it was simple and clean. With the affordable low price provided, the room was just enough for us, bed was ok and at least it was clean. Reception i met was friendly and able to let me early check in 1 hour. Overall is acceptable.
Ever clean

We managed to get a room at a rare price and was delighted at how spacious it was. V clean and comfortable. Staff Mel who attended to us was v jovial and friendly. We didnt opt for breakfast but wish we did - it looked great!

I asked for an extra towel frm the operator over the phone and the response I got was “Huh? You want extra towel? U want extra towel u got down tell the counter. You must pay for the extra towel”. She said it in a unfriendly tone. All I asked for is an extra towel but I’m not sure why I must pay for it. You mean after paying for the extra towel, I can bring the towel home? This is the first time I’m hearing such things. Definitely would not go back to this hotel anymore.

Enjoying a wonderful Chinese New Year Holiday at Summer View! Thanks to the friendly and helpful staff that has been actively ensuring our safety and healthy living environment. Definitely will be back to Summer View soon! Best wishes, Ms. Wong.
Thanks to the friendly and helpful staff!
Alright service and cleanliness was good. We really liked our 'staycations'. Thank you Summer View.

Book this hotel for cny. Request for a high floor room but doesn’t get it even my booking is booked few months ago. Was told that higher floor room don’t have queen bed size. But I rmb last time I book they give me level 8 and corner room with queen bed. Anyway, is a good stay. Check in was fast n smooth. Room is clean and everything’s is fine and great. Hope they will maintain this. Will definitely come back again for another stay. 👏🏻 Thank you.

Room is clean. Space is enough to couples. But I booked the double bed, they applied us two single beds(combined together). The breakfast is set. Choices were less. Especially for long-terms people. We stayed the hotel for 10 days(breakfast included). Besides, the waitress(breakfast) was not friendly. Therefore, we had breakfast twice only. Finally, Small water bottles provided, asked for an extra one, got reply as "It is against hotel policies" If they can notice these details, I think the hotel will become superb.
Minimalist design; very clean; smooth check in, friendly staff, efficient service.
Its was a very short getaway staycation on our off days, we explored Bugis Street . It was wonderful stay.
The room is clean and tidy.

This is one of the best recommendation if you're looking for convenient in reaching Orchard, Golden mile Thai food, Chinatown for Chinese Food and Jalan Besar for local cuisine. The front office staff receives with wide smile, committed to serve and always know our needs. Thanks Mel and the superstar manager Emily to bring us back every month for our short break. The room is well maintained and simply feel like at home during the stay.
just nice for a night
Troublesome to record temperature whenever returned to hotel. Management need to send staff for customer service training.
Nice cozy room. Found a cockroach on the bed during this stay in the night. Staffs are very nice and friendlye, especially Emily at the Front Desk. Eateries are very close by.
Very basic room, bed is really not comfortable.
Never choose this hotel in Singapore. Poor customer services
Very helpful and caring staff.
Good
Very good location, environment, facility, I love it very much.

Very clean hotel and efficient staffs. Good service. The only thing is that the sound insulation within the walls are very poor. Our first 3 nights have been very uncomfortable, with the left and right rooms occupants coming back late at night and started talking loudly. I complained to the reception and immediately the security came and told them off. After the the 3rd night we couldn't take it anymore and requested to change room. We moved to a higher room and the rest of the stay was very pleasant.

Was forced to register whenever u enter with full details and temperature checks (despite temperature checks being phased out by sg govt from SEP 2021) have to write your full name contacts room no. Despite jus stepping out for a smoke. Total of 4 registration in one night. Rude manager who was unsympathetic . Male housekeeping jus comes in your room seeing u naked. Really bad management and intrusive hotel w no privacy.
Good location. Price reasonable. Newly renovated.
Great location
Simple and clean hotel, suitable for solo traveler.
Not the best! But can do for a short staycay. House keeping ends at 4pm so… it’s also a SHN hotel so..

reviews.review_title: Room is clean and small suitable for short stay”
reviews.review_comment: Overall ok but no hotel slipper and face tissue. Breakfast is good.
All good. It was a good stay.

reviews.review_title: Good location and very clean hotel. ”
reviews.review_comment: It’s a staycation for us. I feel it’s abit overpriced as there isn’t any facilities. Didn’t realise there is no car park in the hotel so not very convenient for us. However overall hotel is nice and clean, Scor and Emily are helpful.
Pro Cheaper pricing Clean Neutral Sound isolation -you could listen to the hallway but it’s not that apparent Cons Lack of facilities Bed is not that comfy

I have a GREAT Stay at Summer View Hotel. Location is GREAT & hotel staffs (esp Mel at front desk) are very friendly & helpful). Their housekeeping team did a great job at cleaning the room too. I have enjoyed my 3 nights stay :)

reviews.review_title: Excellent hotel in the heart of city”
reviews.review_comment: Close to shopping malls, MRT and many eateries around.

You get what you pay for. Small cosy room but it came with 2 single beds when queen bed was selected. Housekeeping also didn’t make up the room, and when we returned in the evening, we were told they were off duty (so nth they can do about it) and we had to collect our supplies from frontdesk.

Book a superior double room but being upgraded to deluxe room.. Frontdesk were nice and the safety measure in the hotel was good. Sound proof is good and we have a pleasant stay! Definitely will come again if there is a chance.
Except than location and staff behavior nothing is good
Good location between town and residential areas. Easy assess to Orchard or bugis. Depend how you plan
Small tiny room, and the lady at the front desk is so rude. There are so many other hotels nearby, so just avoid this place. Don’t let this place ruin your trip in Singapore.
Good location, big space and clean

Check-in process was cumbersome. Already called in advance to confirm a queen bed facing the back given my almost 2-week stay. Yet upon check-in, they said no such request was made. You have to bring your physical ID given the lack the capability to scan your virtual ID, even though its using Singpass. Literally stood half an hour just to get myself a room. The room was however very clean and location was good. Other than the check-in service staff, the rest are recommended.
always my first choice for staycaying
Situated very close to bugis street. Room is big for the price point. However, staff is inflexible with the covid rules, as no visitors are allowed, no swapping of stayers.

its at the heart of Bencoolen and very accessible to Bugis, Serangoon, Selegie rd all other areas. There is a 24Hrs Indian Muslim Restaurant which serves perfect and best Rice meals and paratta around the clock. The staff of the hotel are also polite and the rooms are maintained, cleaned and sanitised everyday. I would strongly recommend for staycation. Myself i enjoyed the staycation with my friend and hope to come again soon.
Easy access, bad network for the TV channel
nil
The mattress is so old that it sunk in when you lie on it. Severe backache the following day. Stayed the 3 times ..all the beds in the rooms are with the same worn out mattresses.
Helpful staff and perfect cleanliness.
Was a good staycation due to proximity to the city and cleanliness of the rooms. Would like to return!
The room is spacious and clean. The location is super convenient as there's 2-3 MRT stations within walking distance. Eateries are nearby as well, so you won't get hungry!

The room is big and cosy, The hotel staff was polite and helpful. The location is very near to MRT stations, me and my girlfriend are Vegetarian, So we have many choices of food nearby. Highly recommended!
Nice and clean
The room is small. if you are looking for a simple, clean, affordable and good location hotel. this is it
Clean n Nice
Very good
nothing to complain
Great service, clean room.
Not good
We booked a Superior Room with a window Cons Pros Great Location Clean bathroom
1. The exhaust system in the washroom not well and the window unable to open also. 2. There's uneven groud in the bathroom as the water unable to go smoothly to the drain.
This hotel is just opposite Bugis. Walking distance to Bugis where u find many eateries and Bugis Junction. Great convenient. Very clean hotel.
The room was very clean and looks very brand new. However, the staff was rude to us at the front desk ( a lady Indian security lady )
Always in my 1st choice, friendly Staff and comfortable room. Near by metro station and shopping mall.
They did not provide slippers for temporary use.

Amazing staff gave an upgrade to a room at the top floor of the hotel. Room was big and clean and obviously meant for a family. Shower pressure was amazing and I had a great night's sleep. There is a taxi stand right outside the hotel, however the closest MRT stations were quite a walk away. There is a 711 right across the street infront of the hotel. There is a local Indian restaurant nearby that opens till late. Hotel is located in between 2 rather city-like districts, Bugis and Bencoolen/Selegie which is close to Dhoby Ghaut. Both places require some around 15 minutes of walking.
Satisfied. Room is clean. Check-in is fast.
If you are the traveller who don need service then this the place for you as they provide 0 Star service with no knowledge

There is no parking available even though the lots were empty though out the night. Hotel personnel told us not to park at the facility and we could not get parking nearby, cost us $14 to park there and we checked out early in the morning
Simple, clean and near to everything you need.
Location was great, staff was friendly, rooms are simple but comfortable and Breakfast are alright. Recommended for people who wanted to have a short staycation.

reviews.review_title: everything nice except the rude receptionist”
reviews.review_comment: first the good points. was staying for over 4 nights and the location, availability of eating options nearby, the EXCELLENT BED(seriously, i had an amazing 4 nights of sleep)and cleanliness. the bad points. the rooms are rather tiny, as compared to what i saw on the photos. i was going to write a glowing review until the last hour of my stay. i requested some water, and the receptionist rudely responded that we would not be given water as we were checking out on that day. It amazes me how people who are supposed to be in the hospitality industry and for an industry that relies so much on word of mouth for its business ruin everything for something as trivial as water. anyway, i was already put off by this absurd interaction and promptly proceeded to check out. the lady at the reception(who was wearing black suit) didn't say anything and let her hand out as if expecting me to hand over something to her. i asked what she wanted, and she couldn't understand me. she could have said what she wanted (the access card) instead of the dehumanising gesture she made. an absolutely appalling end to what would have been a great stay. there were no words exchanged as I handed her the cards and walked out after staying from the 28th august to 1 sep. advice to the management: politeness is a very strong currency and gives rich dividends in the long run.
Room is very clean. Check in check out is fast

The walls are thin so like you can hear every single big movement from the room next door (it's not too loud) but overall its good!! All the staffs are super friendly and kind! It's super near to bugis streets soo double point for me!
Hotel staff all are very friendly and helpful, always like to step in location is very good near shopping mall.
No coming

reviews.review_title: No tissue box, i use toilet roll to use after eating..the staff quite rude, ”
reviews.review_comment: Staff quite rude 🙄I only open mask after get out from lift, walking to my room just few step, nobody there just me & my husband, then suddenly got call from staff warned me to put the mask properly 😣😣. bed can feel the spring 🙄🙄 however they got standby extra pillow inside the drawer, no cup at toilet, but overall satisfied the cleanliness.. comeback? Maybe.
We have enjoyed our 5 days staycation in the Hotel. Nice location and very good staff.
Good location ,nice hotel valuable for money happy wit tat stay
Everything is good only the tv don’t have channels.. happy and satisfied staying in this hotel. Thanks Summerview ❤️Hope to stay again there this October 😅
Pretty decent place. Just that the room is a little small. But overall worth the price !
good location, around got coffee shop and convenient store. Room is clean with normal necessities. If you are lucky, might even get a quieter room. Recommend to bring own shower gel.

*Feedback for Summer View Hotel's Staff* Hotel reception staff are very efficient, friendly and welcoming during check in and out processes. They even provide us a free upgrade to a larger room during National Day! *Feedback on Room and Amenities* Our room in Summer View Hotel is quite clean with rather new furnishing. Their shower amenities are great - the shower's water pressure is strong and could easier change between hot and cold water which you could prefer which is very useful fir shower. However, it would be recommendable for Summer View Hotel to provide a box of tissues or packets of tissues in each hotel room so hotel guests need not use the toliet papers instead... The flat pillows in the bed would be advisable to change to fluffier ones or double up the flat pillows to prevent the hotel's guests from having a sore neck or shoulder aches from sleeping on it. Likewise, the sound proofing between rooms and walls (facing the street roads) could be improved via adding foam walls to prevent hearing noises from neighbouring rooms (especially when our neighbours are having a birthday party) or the motorcycles on the road speeding past at night, for hotel guests to acquire a more pleasant sleeping and resting experiences. *Feedback on Hotel's Location* Location wise is good, as food and shopping could be easily found and done with lots of convenient stores, hawker centres and local small malls around. Overall rating: Summer View Hotel is reommended and price-friendly (valuable) for a short-term stays.
It's basic for a night stay.

hotels.name: Royal Plaza on Scotts Hotel
hotels.address: 25 Scotts Road, Orchard, Singapore, Singapore, 228220

reviews.review_comment: Hotel location is superb. It is next to Orchard MRT station. The bed is comfortable. The room size is decent. The price in regards of the room size and location is way much cheaper than all the other hotels in the area. The internet is fast. Buffet choice is OK, it is halal and you won't find any pork in the menu. We initially plan to stay here for 2 nights and extend it to 5 nights now. However, it seem the breakfast will be the same for the 5 days. The hotel also won't clean the room everyday which is fine with us. Overall, I enjoyed my stay here and highly recommend this hotel

The facilities can't be judged by me as they were under renovation s and thus unavailable to me during my stay. However it must be stressed that the staff was amazingly attentive and respectful and helpful. The in house restaurant food is very good and the covid cross contamination protcalls are good (and I'm VERY cross contamination aware). I would recommend this hotel without hesitation.

reviews.review_title: Too crowded and not worth it ”
reviews.review_comment: Only few local channels, the tv variety is bad, not even a tv box provided!
Bed and pillows are great. Room was very clean. Air is fresh. Had a good time in the hotel with bfast included
Very worth it because i got disc a lot at agoda. And the room is big. Very comfort.

Booking through agoda they give the room facing the parking building and the breakfast standard. The hotel also give the room same floor with covid isolation so feel not safe. For the price better go to other 5 star hotel
Pool n gym closed, cleaning service not everyday . Room has musty smell . Breakfast is not as good as it used to be. Luggage self service.

reviews.review_title: Best location, room r clean , staffs are helpful.”
reviews.review_comment: Stayed here for 2 nights, love the clean room the only trouble was the toilet door it is so heavy n hard to slight.

Can reach anywhere in Singapore easily as there's a bus stop right in front of the hotel, and it's within walking range to Orchard MRT station. Room is very spacious and clean. Staffs were very helpful when I asked for more mineral water. Would definitely come back again in the future
Staff were super friendly and the room was super clean.

You have good, friendly staff at the breakfast location Carousel. Perhaps, can add prata in the menu next time. Gym and swimming pool were closed - quite disappointed. Room was not cleaned after first night stay as hotel said, there will be no room cleaning for 2 nights stay.
Awesome stay. Staffs were very friendly and had a smooth experience throughout. Tv channels limited.

Hotel standard is different now, not as lush or luxurious as before. It has dropped significantly after it's been used for COVID-19 patients' stay. Bed is not as comfortable as before. Breakfast doesn't have the time slot given. Hence, long queue waiting for seats. Should split to few timings. Check-in process was also long.
Very friendly staff
Should reduce price for executive suite expensive. Food are delicious.

reviews.review_title: Good location but breakfast not much choice and room no facilities is normal without bath tub”
reviews.review_comment: Good location but breakfast not much choice and room no facilities is normal without bath tub

So happy with the stay here as hotel as prepared the room beforehand and manage to grant the request of early check in and personal room preference. Breakfast was amazing. Fuss free experience with complimentary parking too makes Royal Scotts the desired hotel for any traveller or locals to explore the abundance of shopping malls and eateries. Great experience and thank you once again.
Hotel is super clean n staffs very efficient. Location great for shopping

The staff was really helpful and check in was easy. Children over 3 had to pay for breakfast buffet, which was disappointing, considering how much food really a 5 year old could consume at breakfast. Whilst the room was decent and clean, i was disappointed that the gym and pool were unavailable. They also discontinued providing mini bar and only supplied instant coffee. Breakfast buffet spread wasn’t what it used to be. Food was edible but nothing amazing and quite lacking in variety.
Very clean room. Bed and pillows comfortable. Worth the money
Best place to stay with friendly and helpful staffs
Breakfast was lousy

Hotel itself was alright, unfortunately amenities were closed during my stay. The room was nice, cozy but tv set seemed old and didn't give the best viewing option. Location was amazing, walking distance to all the malls in Orchard road and easily accessible by public transportation. Would stay again!
Disappointed with the breakfast. Frustrated with the television in the room. The TV visual always goes missing with audio playing. Need to change the channel to get the visual back
We had a wonderful experience with the hotel. From checking in, staff was great n helpful. Hotel is clean and breakfast was the best! Definitely will be back again. Thumbs up👍👍🤗

My birthday staycation, requested for high floor, bathtub, early chk in and late chk out. Not even A little surprise or arrangement for my birthday and husband birthday. All this not even one has done so. Long q and crowded when chk in. Slow service. Very disappointed on my stay. Worst is no facilities in the hotel as the gym and swimming closure for upgrading.

The location is good. But other than that… Room housekeeping every other day. Gym, pool were all unavailable during the 6 day stay. No mini bar anymore. No coffee machine. Just your instant nescafe powder. Breakfast spread every morning was minimal and not a lot of variety.

Location are very convenient. Despite we check in on line yet still need to queue to check in at site. The plus point - queue super long but at least they open up all counter and clear fast rather than some hotel totally leave guests to stand and wait. But still, since on line check in with IC photo done, the management should allow express check in(grab key and go) service instead of registration again, else, why on line?

Room was spacious with separated living room and bedroom. There is a bathtub too with a separate shower. Bought it with breakfast too. Sadly pool was under renovation the time when i was staying so didnt manage to get to swim. Overall: It was a good stay.

We had booked the deluxe room during the school march holidays. When you enter the hotel, there no bell boys. You have to bring your own luggage to the lobby. Reasonable waiting time to check in. There is no bath tub for the deluxe room. Room was on 6th floor and was facing a wall so no view when open the window. Room clean but during this time, there will be no room cleaning service. But you can always asked for more linens and towels. No swimming pool as it was closed due to upgrading i guess. Breakfast included in the booking but food selection was just ok. Nothing fancy. Some of it too salty (eg fried rice and the vermicilli). Good location of the hotel as many eateries nearby.
room great, staff friendly, location the best but breakfast bad, swimming and gym closed 🤕 maybe due to covid.
Comfortable room and good location

I will not recommend this hotel if you need your room clean up. They didn’t even clear the rubbish which I am totally disappointed. The conditions of the towels are terrible with lose fur coming off and stuck on the clothes and hair. More comfortable staying at home then hotel. Not a 5 star hotel. Pools and gyms closed and they should better manage the stay since already nothing for the guest . Don’t waste money. Stay at home better. Limited buffet choices but the staff are helpful and friendly. I know now is saving environment but cleaning up the room and clearing the rubbish is the basic . Totally disappointed.
The parking soo far from hotel lobby.. The parking slot not many as it was full..
It’s one of the rare hotels that provide an all halal menu for breakfast. A lil bummed that the pool & gym are closed. Otherwise a nice place to stay with a good location too.
Good if you just want to shop in Orchard Road.
Staffs are professional. Hotel cleaniness tiptop. Walking distance for high end shopping malls

Very unfortunate to see such standards from a hotel with long standing reputation. Decor is a little dated. The plumbing was an issue in the room. It was choked multiple times throughout our stay. The staff didn’t offer any change of rooms, perhaps due to high occupancy. They sent the maintenance team multiple times to rectify. We just had to live with it. The in room dining option is not extensive.

reviews.review_title: Great amenities, friendly staffs & clean hotel”
reviews.review_comment: The hotel was clean, the staffs were friendly. Only minus the pool which was under maintenance. Lucky took a room with bathtub. Great place, great location to walk ard & find food too. The breakfast buffet spread was not that sumptuous thou. The staff at the restaurant (from the nasi lemak side) was kinda cold , maybe overwhelming of visitors. Thank you for making our stay a pleasant one.

No gym and swimming pool facility with the cost of $360 plus, not very worth to be honest. And when request for utensils, payment of $5 is needed. Stated 2 guest staying in the room but room amentities not top up. Not sure if the room was really cleaned up properly or not since amentities did not top up fully. Breakfast quite disappointed, 3 stars hotel has even more selection tasty
Have always wanted to stay here. Was great sxcept that the pool was closed. Also, wish that the carpark height limit was higher so we could drive here. Other than that, everything was quite awesome
Nice n clean area, friendly staff
Clean & big room with bath tub but a bummer as pool & gym under renovation till Jul 2022
