5 star for the staff services, room and bed is great. Only downside was average breakfast

1. No utensils in the room 2. The tea provided in the hotel room was awful 3. No complimentary drinks inside fridge (not like any other hotel) 4. Breakfast choice was limited and the hasbrowns and waffles were hard and cold. Used to love the stay in this hotel but this visit just too disappointing.

reviews.review_title: Understanding staff,clean and value for money”
reviews.review_comment: I booked a deluxe room and opted for a king bed for my family of 4 (9,4) because I know it could fit us all but didn’t realised that room occupancy is for max 3. As no amendments could be made on Agoda’s side,a kind staff by the name of Dragon heard my predicament and he personally helped me to do an upgrade to the deluxe plus. It had 2 double bed,room was spacious and breakfast was delish. Value for money and definitely coming back next time,hopefully the pool renovation will be completed.

No Bell porters - you have to carry your own luggage to your room and bring it down while leaving. Rooms are very small. Bathroom is smaller..... Cleaning in the room happens once in 3 days. You have to ask for towels, soap, etc Car Parking is far...far away...... Breakfast is extremely limited.
Really enjoyed our staycation! The breakfast was good! Awesome environment. Value for money too Good staycation place for family with children!

Was supposed to celebrate my friend birthday staycation but sadly they don’t allow visitors in their rooms. Very very disappointing. They should told us in advance of their “special” SMM. Lesson learned, call the hotel if they allow visitors before making any booking

The deluxe room was spacious and the service was good! Check in was a bit slow even though there were multiple counters open. The walk from the car park to the hotel is quite a distance. And the staff who are at the SafeEntry counter didn't let me into the hotel because I'm not a guest and also because I wasn't dining at Carousel. Very strange encounter. They have to let me in before I can check in as a guest right?
Friendly staff coupled with very clean room and bath tub. The only lacking is the service from the staff at the restaurant. but otherwise it’s a great stay!
Just a walking distance to Nearby shoppings and lots of eating places to choose from. Currently pools and gym are closed due to covid. Morning breakfast are acceptable.

Though this hotel sits on orchard road...its really a basic hotel for a staycation. Swimming pool and gym was out of service...not much variety for breakfast...nasi lemak doesn't come with chicken or even the side cucumbers...no roti prata...and egg Station is only scrambled and sunny side up... No salad station and hard toasted bread is being served .. No daily make up room and no nespresso machine even in the Premier room!!! The staff upsell the room by saying the additional bath tub.. Premier lounge...no drinks and no biscuits avail... Plus point: aircon is strong Will I be back??only time will tell...
It was an awesome stay wf my kids as its meant for birthday girl. Super happy staying over.. Rooms obviously clean, staffs were helpful, location...don't mention very convenient in town.
Hotel was good, if only the carpark was sheltered to the lobby. Otherwise all met expecatations.
Not quite like what it used to be. Covid restrictions dampened the premium lounge experience.
Great location

Not the most pleasant of stay. We booked a couple of rooms at Royal Plaza as we had an event to attend to last weekend. Despite the staggered check in times, it took forever to sort out checking in. Super long queue & slow. Although all of us had filled in & submitted all our personal details & documents, reception still took our id/passports upon checking in. Defeats the purpose of filling up the forms isn’t it? The rooms lack amenities. Facilities like gym & pool were closed. One of our rooms had maggot/worm crawling on the bedsheet. When we notified the hotel staff, all they can say was - “we apologise, perhaps the windows were opened earlier”. Nothing else was offered to make up for the maggot incident! Long queue for breakfast too. Service staff at the restaurant were mostly rude. Given that the crowd was overwhelming, Royal Plaza’s standard has dropped tremendously. Maybe the pandemic has put many service industry staff in slumber but with business going back to normal, there is a need to do more to attract customers.
The breakfast is so so but lunch and dinner is good..

reviews.review_title: Birthday staycation & Ms Seri's hospitality rocks;)”
reviews.review_comment: I understand that I've booked the stay when the hotel has just reopened for all since it's 2 years closure for SHN only. The price was value for money thus was able to book for a staycay here:) The check in time that I've selected was 2pm but the queue to check in was super long. We waited for 30 minutes before it was our turn. The Q lines behind us was extremely long by then. However our tiredness & frustration was overcome with the sincere apologies and awesome hospitality of the receptionist, Ms Seri. This made our stay awesome! She gave us tips abt breakfast and greeted us the next morning when she saw us and had a chat. Our room 835 was so spacious and clean. Breakfast at Carousel was nice too. Hospitality & service are important to me and Ms Seri definitely made our staycay here an awesome experience.

Stay include breakfast not much variety for food also the Q for breakfast is ridiculous. Go breakfast at 8am the Q from the lift entrance! And if u do ur booking thru Agoda or third party they not able to help u if anything wrong wif u booking. So disspointed!

reviews.review_title: Disappointment for a 5 star rating hotel.”
reviews.review_comment: Heard of this great hotel. Looks magnificent from the photos on agoda and their website. Give it a try eventhough pool & gym under maintenance and here I am queuing for an hour to check in. Fail from the start of the service process. Breakfast at Carousel, service at the omelette and pancakes station was unsatisfactory (27th Feb Sun morning). And long queue again. Very disappointed and upsetting. 1) The management should look into the process of handling high volume of occupants on every weekends (set up a monile check in counter etc). 2) Service should also be improve, perhaps a proper training. 3) They should not panicked when serving high volume of people. 4) The fruit station staff told me to WAIT while he finish his chores of mixing some fruit mix yoghurt (i dont know whats the stuff he is Overall, the food was alright but the service here does not justify for the price we pay for the hotel. Compare to my previous pleasant visit, i must say this worse. Even my japanese colleague was taken aback. And lastly, the operator says they DO NOT have housekeeping service due to surge in omicron cases. I can request for change of towels and they will send it to me. I stayed for 2 days. I can’t imagine if I stay for a week and there is NO housekeeping. After so many years of staying in a hotel, this is my first time experiencing such a service. I am not asking for anything more than just a basic hotel needs. After reading this review, i believed you can feel my frustration. Just so glad that tomorrow is checking out day. My nightmare is over. Speechless.

The best hotel and most probably going to be my next . Hotel staff , receptionist all are very professional , friendly. Checking in was fast . can’t argue with the price because the experience, the facilities , room , cleanliness is well done . Don’t mind paying if the experience is like this . The breakfast buffet at Carousel was amazing , the food is a must to have , the staff was very attentive and also very helpful , very well dress , cleanliness is tip-top. Nothing to not like about everything. Location is the best . Thank you for making my stay a pleasant experience and most memorable one and thank you to all the working staff . good job and please stay safe 👍🏼
The best hotel location in orchard. Highly recommended!
good rooms good breakfast i would return
we loved it and we are excited to be there again soon!
The electric in our room got shortcut during the middle of the night. After calling the recpetionist, they fixed it very quickly.
Excellent in all areas...Service, Staff and the hotel itself!
Amazing location!!
Good location
Very comfortable. will stay again
Always a good stay at RPoS... Staffs are always friendly and will try to do as much for you as possible. Excellent location. My hotel of choice and home from home in Singapore.
Very good hotel located on orchard and is one of the cheapest on orchard road. value for money

Good hotel . Staff not very helpful and fake face . They are polite from a script but if you have special request ignore you . Not helpful to include anything for the guest like late check out or room change . Great location and decent standard of accommodation
Good value for short stay.
value for money and great location
Good option in the middle of the city
Nice Hotel, with Good services
Very nice hotel, with good breakfast. Near shopping area. Highly recommended
Very well placed, right int he middle of everything. Rooms are clean, no fuzz service, overall nice place to stay.
Spent 3 nights and had a wonderful stay. Good location and easy to go about. Definitely recommend people on choosing to stay here.
Hotel do really kept well
Royal Plaza do really impressed me
halal food
Halal food
We were not able to stay this time due Covit19. However we have stayed in this hotel since the 70's. I thoroughly recommend it to anyone. Great location staff and facilities.
The best
the staff are friendly and the atmosphere is good

Excellent breakfast spread. Nice swimming pool however, pool was closed due to COVID-19 outbreak. Staff were friendly. Carousel buffet dinner was great. Beautiful performance by staff. A memoriable staycation for us as we celebrate our anniversary and hubby's birthday on the same date.
Breakfast not enough too crowded. Late top up. Super long queue. Room equivalent to 3*. Only paying for location.

Long queue at check in during our weekend stay-cation. It was almost 1/2hr of standing and waiting. It will be great if hotel could provide welcome drink while we are at the queue. However, the staff welcomely attended to our check in smoothly. Thumbs up for allowing a late checkout at 2pm. Thank you!
Great location and accessibility to many areas such as supermarkets, cinemas, shopping malls, eateries and entertainments!

The staycatiion deal was too good to be true. Booked 3 deluxe rooms for the weekend stay to celebrate my birthday with family. Clean and friendly staff. Despite the measures taken for social distancing, staff made guests feel welcome . As usual the food is great.

reviews.review_title: Just okay-ish hotel with decent staff”
reviews.review_comment: Royal Plaza on Scotts is surely not a 5 star hotel, the pool is really *small* and rooms are just standard size. Check-in process is efficient even though there is big weekend crowd. Likewise, another long queue for breakfast over weekend, but the staff managed this crowd well. For those with young children and especially thinking of staycation - the swimming pool size would be big disappointment. Also, there are NO KIDS CHANNELS on TV and NO other amenities like Children play rooms etc. Few other letdowns are the stains on bedsheets, much-hyped 'free bar' that comes with 2 bottles of water and 2 small cups of juice, no towels near pool, gym with half of the equipment under maintenance. The room given to us doesn't have any view, but the hotel is in city centre - so can't complain much. Positives are hotel's central location, reasonable price, good breakfast spread and superb staff in restaurant .
Great Place

You will enjoy the room a lot as the space is a lot bigger compare to other hotel in Sg. They have free coffee. Location is good especially for family travel because you can walk 8 mins to ion without any worry on rainy days.
Good Location near Ion, Tang's etc. Bfast was good but need to change dishes after staying 5 days there.
Fantastic!
Nice place to stay was lovely n plc is convenient

reviews.review_title: Not bad for a seasoned hotel”
reviews.review_comment: Hotel was well located and had friendly staff and a great in-house restaurant. Room however looked dated and the complimentary mini bar was just filled with bottled water and two packs of juice. These items are standard room items for many hotels so that was a disappointment. Didn’t have a great view out the window but one can close both eyes to that.

hotels.name: Pan Pacific Serviced Suites Beach Road, Singapore (SG Clean Certified)
hotels.address: 7500B Beach Road, City Hall, Singapore, Singapore, 199592

reviews.review_comment: my second time here and definitely not my last! love how spacious it is and the cleanliness and friendly staff! location is top notch! near to arab street so why not right?
Staff was super nice and friendly. Really helpful. Hotel was clean. Awesome stay
Nice service apartment and clean facilities. Nice swimming pool view
Value for money. Conveniently located to many eateries and malls. Love the view!
The room was very nice & really love it !
Experience was great.. though there were some slight delay during checking in but overall is good.. keep up the good work
The place is nice and clean, rooms are huge, only problem is they are not v flexible on a slightly later check-out timing
Excellent stay and so spacious!

We booked for 2 nights. Room was spacious and clean. Fully equipped kitchen! Service staff was also helpful. Eg when we were checking out there was a queue at counter for check in, staff quickly approached us, helped with check out and proceeded to pass us the parking coupon. Alls good and definitely going back again!

Spacious room with complete facilities. Only downside is cleaner didnt come to make up the room after we asked for it. First time they came after we came back from outside, my husband told them to come when we’re out but they didnt.

reviews.review_title: SERVICED APARTMENT IS ALWAYS THE CHOICE”
reviews.review_comment: Firstly I’d like to recommend this serviced apartments as all the amenities are superb! It’s useful when there is a washing machine in built with a dryer as well which reduces alot of the worrying of your used clothes!
The cleanliness of the room were poor compared to my last stay.. when i opened the door.. the smell of the unwashed sofa or carpet smell is so strong. Also the pillow has some odour too.

Concierge initially assigned us to a seafacing room. But she didn’t fulfil promise of seafacing unit. We were really disappointed. Facilities were really poor - no dine in available. Had to walk out. On one night it was raining badly. We will not book with Pan pacific again.
Good Stay. will come back another time

Over my experiences and expectations. The room was bigger than I thought. Come with cooking facilities and cosy home feeling. Love it very much. Great scenery. It makes our anniversary a memorable one. Thanks.

The room is clean and value for money. Totally would recommend this to brides getting ready in hotel. The check out was a breeze too. But I must say the check in was hectic and disorganised. The front desk staff said smth different from the security guard and that made everything look messy at the start. The staff also was giving faces when we were unhappy about the unorganised way, which was wrong for them to do so as a cso. They can work on the check in and the safe entry for a better experience. Other than that, all is good!
2nd time visiting, 1st was better. during this visit we were given a room that wasn't properly clean, highlighted to the customer service they changed our room around evening. thank you!
great location walking distance to bugis and suntec. comes with kitchen if you love to cook

Great location. Stone throw from all the food heaven in Arab St. The studio suite apartment is clean with everything working well. Had the Arab St view and high floor which is amazing. But the executive room does not come with a bathtub. But you will get the full amenities in it. Fridge, oven, cooking area and a washing machine! Lovely isn’t it. We did pop in our laundry the night prior to check out. The swimming pool view is awesome too!

everything here was good but only that i ask for a habour view room but i got the lowest room facing the habour but couldn’t see much because the room was on a lower level. And also food here is “No pork no lard” to me is considered NOT HALAL, but thats just a small issue as here its just a walking distance to arab street so many varieties so its easier to grab any food

I know some request are subject to hotel's availability. But i request for high floor, i was allocated to 7th floor. Lowest of the suites level. They mentioned i requested for twin bed room and whole hotel only have 1 twin room available. Well... The view of the hotel facing a big construction site. Since i was at the 7th floor , there's no view but facing a big construction site. Breakfast order, i couldnt choose any. Was told that everyone in the hotel will be having the same breakfast order we were only offered to choose the juice but when we went to collect the breakfast we heard someone else saying they chose scrambled eggs which we did not have any scrambled eggs at all. So there were choices but we werent told any. Went down to collect apparently there's some mixing up of the breakfast orders and we waited for awhile for our breakfast. Lastly, i mentioned i booked the room to celebrate my friend's birthday, there were nothing at all. Of course i understand that compliments were subject to hotel's availability again isnt it? But this is the only hotel i been to where i mentioned about celebrating someone's birthday and nothing is done. Amazing. When we want to book the pool timing. We werent told that we need to go front office to get the key pass. I mean some information should be told at the reception and probably talk abt the breakfast order too isnt it? Luckily the room was clean. Yeap. That's my honest review for the hotel.
Good option for those travelling in big groups as the space is huge.
Excellent accommodations and clean

Overall my stay was pleasant only during the check in there was a delay. It would be nice if the staff handling the guests, would keep an update while asking the guests to wait while they doing transaction. I was made to wait half an hour, without any update while waiting for my room. Until i have to go up to the counter and asked when or is there any update about my room. Im not unreasonable kind of guest, i can wait but half an hour without any update to me its unfair. Already checking in time is 3pm...by the time half hour, i can do lots of things. At least if there's a delay, do update the guest by the time its 15min of waiting. There's a few guests stranded waiting to check in at the lobby. On good side, the amenities were good.
My 3rd in this hotel. Strategic location with Amqzing Food Choices just at few steps away. Best part is, with all equipped facilities, all u need is just bring a set of clean clothes and, voila!

Really nice and cosy rooms with a full kitchen for u to use if either one of u can cook. Managed to get an executive one bedroom suite at a steal. Do watch out for this property if u would like an enjoyable staycay with your partner.
Didn't expect it to be pretty run down. Head board, cupboard and wall are covered in dust. And I only got to know this service apartment is catered to SHN and isolation personnel.

We don’t have early check in, at 3pm the staff told us not ready yet, it’s because upgrade our deluxe room to executive, 3:30pm we get the key, We saw the room NOTHING DIFFERENT compared to the deluxe room.. And the pillow it too flat!! Whole night can’t sleep well, make your neck painful!!

reviews.review_title: Our Stay Pan Pac Service Suites”
reviews.review_comment: Overall, pleasant stay. Room was clean, spacious. Bed and linen was very comfortable allowing for good night's sleep. Only check-in took a while longer than expected. Very easy parking.

Overall the place is very spacious & has all the equipment (eg pots and pans, oven, coffee machine, washing machine) within the room. Though we didn’t use most of it, it’s very useful to have them around. As for reception wise, no one seems to pick up the phone at anytime (tried calling 3x at different timing, you will hear advertisements throughout), good luck.. During check in, receptionist gave us instructions on how to do self collection of breakfast in the morning. Next morning when we are down, was told no breakfast on Sunday.. hmm.. Also, was given set of instructions to log into hotel WiFi, no surprise, the password don’t work, feels like reception not the most professional though.. Room wise, would appreciate if speaker could allow connectivity to Bluetooth, it is still the kind of manual connector for iPhone 4 series? Also TV is still connected to DVD player, not the most user friendly. Overall decent room for the price we pay. Just don’t expect any response from anyone after check in.

reviews.review_title: A cocoon of calm in the city centre ”
reviews.review_comment: The property is close to the bustle of Bugis and right next to the Arab Street area, yet all you sense is a calm while witnessing the buzz around you. It made my stay thoroughly relaxing and enjoyable. Staff were pretty nice too so bonus points for that.
The room is clean, neat and tidy...Breakfast is good and have a good view of Singapore Flyers and the domes at the swimming pool...Worth the price and wont regret
Good for families and travellers staying for a week or two.
Nice room , clean and good bed to sleep on.
Big room, comfy design, good location, easy access to bugis, Suntec and many food and bars around.
The breakfast was very very disappointing. The cleanliness of the room was also way below expectation.
The toilet (shower area) was smelly. Room was dusty. To top it off, upon being on the bed & sofa respectively, felt itchy. Bed sheet & sofa not clean.
Great hospitality with warmth feelings. Accessible to many local attractions and malls.

But is good to have kitchen /washing machine to do own laundry.. After usage of swimming pool, the cleaniness and dry cleaning of the washing machine is 9-1 washing purpose. No bathtub as advertised in agonda.. all upgrading is based on required topup of prices

reviews.review_title: Nice Serviced suite, great for couple”
reviews.review_comment: Had enjoyable staycaytion there. Other than the check-in being rather slow (took about an hour plus), there were no other complaints about the place. My darling and I loved the experience, and we made dinner together. Bought a couple package, was given champagne, and late check out. We managed to use the pool as well, too bad the jacuzzi function was not in service due to COVID-19, else, it would be even better experience.
Location is good Staff are friendly Property is slightly old and need touching up like replacing dirty shower heads, toilet door and loose towel racks. Not very clean overall.

I left my kids medicine in the fridge and called to inform them to help. Called once and was told that he will check and get back to me if they found it. No call till the next day and another receptionist told me that they will call IF they found it. I assume by her saying that, it means the medicine have been thrown by housekeeping staff. It's medicines (syrup-5 bottles) in a white plastic and it doesnt contain any foods were thrown? I hope there is someone from the Pan Pacific can contact me regards to this. Thank you

Pros: Clean and spacious room, great view at swimming pool, good location - can walk to various eateries and malls easily Cons: Check-in process could be more systematic. We don't mind waiting (45 min), but people who arrived after us were attended to first. When asked, the person attending to us said she had called us to say the key was ready, but I did not answer the call. I checked my call log and there was no missed call from them. When I showed her my call log, she said 'anyway, never mind'.
The room that i received was very dusty and i keep on sneezing a lot when i enter the room. I had to wipe the tables and chair by myself. Chairs are covered with brown stain.
Spacious , complete facilities . Friendly staff.

reviews.review_title: Clean and modern. Near cultural attraction.”
reviews.review_comment: Everything's perfect, just that they strictly adhere to the 3pm chek-in and 12pm check-out. Room didn't have a tub despite requesting for it and booking way in advance.
A marvellous place to stay.. staff are friendly, room are very clean and the view are good.. could see sunrise and sunset from my room.. will confirm return to this place again! Thumbs up!

Had a staycation at Pan pacific sercive suite. I booked the suite with bath tub however they upgarded my room without my knowledge and the room came with a shower instead. The towels was torn at the edges so as the bedsheets with holes on it. I am a super light sleeper and had a terrible night sleeping as the FCU was radiating a super low frequency which is amplified at the bedhead level. I had to sleep in 90deg orientation from the bedhead in order not to hear the low humming noise from the living room to the bedroom. Overall a very bad night for me as the low humming noise interrupted a supposedly a good night rest for me. Nonetheless the bed and pillows were good. The hotel should check on the FCU. i doubt it actually complies to pan pacific of indoor noise criteria.
Greatly accessible

reviews.review_title: Second stay in a span of 3 months!”
reviews.review_comment: We loved our first stay here back in August so we decided to book another right after for my birthday. We probably expected better if not the same service and experience but it was rather... meh. I mean, it wasn't bad. Their customer service was still great! However, being a repeat guest, we had expectations. It was my birthday, the day we checked-in, but I don't know if they were too busy (?) to have noticed. They did take our ICs for documentation so yeah. I mean, not even a birthday greeting. Hahaha so I was really disappointed because I decided to celebrate my birthday there and they did not go "the extra mile". I didn't want that to ruin my stay so I just tried to forget about it. Probably do better next time. Also, the room wasn't in good condition - one of the freezer's drawers was broken; we found plastics in the dining area cabinet (probably from previous guests); appliances are really slow. Probably needs maintenance or an upgrade. Thank you!
Just a short 3 minute walk to Arab Street which is full with halal food and shopping as well.

The staff were awesome. They are very helpful and the housekeeping people were great in cleaning the the rooms and the kitchen. The swimming pool access however is very limited, once a day for 1 hour only. Probably could increase it to twice a day. The night view is superb. Location wise is good for sightseeing and food. Would definitely go again.
clean and modern hotel
All the item in the suites is well care. I cooked my own breakfast and wash my shirt, everything work fine. So far everything meet my expectation. There is mini mart downstairs as well.
Highly recommended

There are smells on the sofa, and quite an amount of dust on the sliding door to the bedroom. There is no aircon in the bedroom, hence need to leave the door open the whole time. Other than that, everything is fine
Great location, friendly staff, clean! Did some cooking as well, to get away from the stress of daily environment.
overall are good

reviews.review_title: Good choice for work from hotel or having friends over”
reviews.review_comment: I booked a 2 night staycay deal not realizing that there was no breakfast included because as a serviced apartment property they did not have a f&b permit to carry on with food service under the current safe management measures. The apartment was very generously sized, with a big sitting room and decently sized kitchen for long stays. The pool access was restricted to 1 hour per guest, up to 8max at a time. I generally had the pool to myself or shared with 2 to 4 others. The water is quite chilly maybe because it's a rooftop pool. The amenities provided were good. There was some wear and tear on the furnishings, but otherwise the room was fine.

Location is good. Few minutes ride to major shopping mall and hawker centre. The kitchen is fully equipped. You only need to bring condiments and ingredients if you decided to cook. As I am staying at the premium one bedroom aparment, the bedroom air con is quite weak even it is already at the coldest temperature we could set. Other than that, this staycation is one of the best that I had stayed.
the view is magnificent... The room is very cosy.. location is good too..
The room is clean. The hotel is well located and have easy access to public transport & food in the vicinity. The only disappointment is the toilet do not have a bidet.
Thumbs up! Nice and clean place! enjoyed the cooking facilities there!
I like the hotel room, is very big. the bed is soft and the environment is good.
Good location, near to the hippy Streets where many eateries and restaurants are located. Within good walking distance to gardens and parks and city center.
Rooms is amazing. My boyfriend loved it!
enjoy our stay.
Back on the 2nd stay. Value for money with great location.

Location is good. But we bad exprience during check in as we need to wait nearly for 2.5 hours for the room to be ready. We managed to check in at 5:30 pm on that day. Carpark is supposedly free but we were told by the front office that they limit to give only 2 free coupon per day. Not many facilities. I dont think I want to stay in this apartment again coz everything they want to charge extra...
a convenient area with alot of comfort. great kitchen and living room area.

An excellent staycay! Totally forgotten abt the sch holidays, so hotel was closed to fully booked. Best service provided by Michael, he has helped to get our room sorted out as well as the booking for pool. Will come back again! Thank u guys!

reviews.review_title: Decent hotel but check in system and service need improvement ”
reviews.review_comment: Had to q outside hotel for 1 hour with many other families with small children. Waited more than 1 and half hours to get key. Staff should at least reassure families and offer drinks and seats to pregnant ladies and families with babies.

reviews.review_title: Our kids love the hotel but customer service from the staff was unpleasant. ”
reviews.review_comment: Hotel staff was not helpful and unfriendly. They need more coaching. They sound quite rude and not motivated.

Got a room with a tub as requested. Managed to get a side view of the Singapore flyer & catch the fireworks during the National Day Parade, from the comfort of our room. It was a great unplanned surprise. Swimming pool area was cold at night as it was outdoors & not heated. But it came with a great view. Interaction with hotel staff was all good. Room was clean with comfy bed! Would stay again, definitely.
A nice hotel with good views
A very clean and good location for family get away.

We were very lucky to have check in earlier as the room was ready! Room and toilet was clean. Only lack is the cloth for kitchen coz when you washed the plates, no cloth to wipe. What we requested were Fulfilled
Even though the dine in is closed on Sundays, you can still order in food from their sister hotel (Parkroyal). Or else there are lots of makan places just outside the hotel.
No comment. Just a No for future bookinhlg
Great room, great service, great location !

reviews.review_title: Beats hotel stays. Great views, clean, value for money”
reviews.review_comment: We were very happy with our choice of choosing this over a hotel. 1stly, the service suite was huge in comparison to any hotel rooms. The entire apartment including the kitchenettes and fridge is very clean. the kitchen is fully stocked with utensils and equipments in good condition + clean. Good full sized fridge and freezer. The views from the living room, bedroom and pool is amazing! Their service was impeccable too. We very very impressed from start to end of the staycay and are still reminiscing on the experience. Wanted to need our stay to an additional night but they were fully booked out. This is now our new go to place when we are craving for a staycay. Not to miss us the price point which makes it lesser than hotel yet so much more to offer. Thanks for the unforgettable experience @panpacfic serviced suites Beach Road.
Room was very huge and clean!! Pool view was great!! Within walking distance to Haji Lane!! Love it!!
Had a great stay & the staffs were really friendly and helpful. The amenities are 💯/ 💯 would definitely visit again!
The city view is beautiful at night

They combined 2 bed into 1, which clearly gave us a body ache because of the dent in the middle. I specifically confirmed that I wanted a king bed and they acknowledged it over the counter. The room was a little dusty and had a musky smell, but overall the facilities were great!
Can highly recommend Pan Pacific. Excellent accommodation, kept beautifully clean. Very kind and helpful staff.

Room was spacious and especially love this so our toddler can explore around the room freely. The bathroom however was gross. Toilet bowl, bath tub and floor was so dirty/mouldy. It could use a good scrub.
great
My 2nd time here. Just love staying here.
Clean, big and comfortable room. 10 mins walk to Bugis MRT. Good. I will be back.
Room was big, has a living room area with kitchen, dining table and 2 TV in the room. Overall worth it. But hygiene could be improved.
Stayed for 3D2N for our honeymoon we got upgraded to the executive suite. Room was clean and spacious. Kitchen tools and equipments were in perfect condition too. 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
value for money and convenient!

reviews.review_title: Bad Customer Service. Not Worth It!”
reviews.review_comment: The customer service was very bad. We did not even feel the warmth of their service or the sincerity in them. The whole time was like they just care about you as the paying guest and their own way of service - if you can call it that. They DO NOT care about their guests. Even the way they talk to us and how they communicate are so insincerely and arrogantly inappropriate. So disappointed. I regretted booking in this hotel.
Brilliant choice for short getaways. Love the pool and the scenic view!
Great location which is near to everywhere!!
It My First Time Here..For Birthday Treats. Clean Room, Good Service By The Front Desk, Always Welcome The Guest In. Appreciate A Lot By Good Service. Thumbs Up 5 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
With promotion price it really worthy, they upgrade me to heritage view facing kampong arab , not sure why it counts as upgrading cos view marina bay seems better
Best for family staycations Breakfast is nice.
together with my family, we greatly enjoyed the stay at the serviced appartment, the entire staff is very customer centric! thank you!

hotels.name: Holiday Inn Express Singapore Clarke Quay (SG Clean Certified)
hotels.address: 2 Magazine Road, Clarke Quay, Singapore, Singapore, 59573

reviews.review_comment: Had a very very nice staycation and their staffs are very helpful and friendly, rooms are very well furnished and clean!

I've book 2 day 1 night stayca with the hotel and they allow me for late check out until 2pm. After check out me & my boyfriend leisure at their Cafe to work awhile. Good ambience and quiet. The staff is very welcoming and polite too.
We stayed there for 3D and 2N. It we could say that it was awesome. From the staff to the facilities. Definitely we will be coming back and will recommend it to our friends.
well arrangment done for us when no room for happen, assist us transfer to another hotel.
Good location and breakfast, economic by Singapore standards. Limited amenities, VERY, VERY small rooms. No good for family. Good for single or couple occupancy.
It is a bit slippery as there is lacking of anti slippery materials on the bathroom tiles. But overall is good.

Great location near Clarke Quay, within walking distance of a number of things to see. Good breakfast, very pleasant staff. Sadly the pool was out of commission when we stayed, which we were not informed of at the time of booking. Although the rooms are comfortable, they are small with little storage; functional.
Very good location. Very good breakfast. Super friendly staff. I recommend.
Very nice hotel staff.. room was on the small side, but adequate for us.
Very very good from the checking in ! Super friendly staff and good location. I’m def coming back.

Small room, tiny bathroom, breakfast was very ordinary at best.....I noticed they never cleaned the breakfast trays until 2:00 pm all the leftovers sitting there for hours!!! fridge in the is not the coldest and doesn’t possess a freezer hence I couldn’t freeze my gel packs which are needed to transport my medication, I gave the gel packs to the staff to freeze and when I collected them 24 hours later they were only cold and not even close to being frozen. Staff organisations skills are lacking and I found there attitude to be quite bland and lacking interest in the clientele. We will definitely stay at another hotel the next time we are in Singapore.

reviews.review_title: Quiet area and great rooms , great staff and friendly”
reviews.review_comment: Quiet area and great rooms , great staff and friendly

reviews.review_title: Hotel fine, staff fine, good breakfast, not a bad location but...”
reviews.review_comment: Everything about the hotel is OK. Rooms are small, as to expected for a hotel in Singapore. Cleaning is OK, but not brilliant. But, when they took my credit card for "a incidentals charge of $500 SGD", to which I agreed, they also charged me $2,068 SGD (£1,179.39 plus £32.43 in CC charges!) for the room - which I had already paid for and I wasn't informed that they were charging this nor was I given a receipt! We have been home now for over 4 weeks and still trying to get this error sorted! BE CAREFUL WHEN HANDING OVER YOU CREDIT CARD! Make sure you are cerain what they are going to charge against it.
Its a good place for a staycation for its location but can be quite costly in price.

reviews.review_title: Truly superior location at good price”
reviews.review_comment: The location is actually much better than I expected. Very easy walk to Ft. Canning Metro and just beyond Chinatown. The breakfast is no muffin and watery juice; it is a an expansive selection of Asian and American dishes. No sooner is a glass or plate finished than it is whisked away.. The place has a new feel, although there is some evidence of wear/.
Pros: Comfortable bed, good choices for breakfast, courteous staff on Reception, decent location for Clarke Quay. Cons: Room was small with little storage space, same comment for bathroom.
Excellent position to food shops and only 15 min walk to marina bay . Great roof top pool and sun area

reviews.review_title: Profession Service, Great for Solo Travelers ”
reviews.review_comment: My Booking was very late , as a replacement to another booking. The Hotel staff was very professional, informative and friendly. Location is excellent If you require easy access to night spots. Rooms are clean if small but very well equipped and very comfortable. Breakfast provided is excellent with ample seating provided. This was a very pleasant stay and is recommended.

reviews.review_title: Depends on what price you pay”
reviews.review_comment: Everything ok. Breakfast has limited variety but change day to day. If the price above SGD200 mind as well book others hotel.
Small room and bed. Ok for overnight stay.

What does a Holiday Inn Express sound like to you? Quick, easy, average, functional? Not this one. The building was great, the staff were very good, the room was very nice and a good bathroom too. Good TV, Wi-Fi, and the roof top pool was wonderful. (Did I mention the spa pool too?) There was also a roof-top gym with good facilities. The roof top gardens were attractice and the views of the city of Singapore were great. The location was good, just a short walk to Clark Quay and the river. Oh, and the downside? I can't think of one thing!
Beautiful!

Value for money 100%! room was pristinely clean, staff were accomodating in any way possible, they even leant me $10 for a taxi I had forgot to get cash out for. Breakfast is lovely. Gym and pool facilities also stunning. Would definitely stay there again in future.
great breakfast buffet and swimming pool recommended to all👍🏾👍🏾
We were very happy with our stay and would definitely stay again.
Great location
Location is great, near Boat Queay and Chinatown.
I needed to adjust my schedule and there was no flexibility
We enjoyed our stay. Would definitely recommend to other families. It was also strategically located. very accessible.
everything is good enough
room is clean, and reasonably spacious.

The location of the hotel was superb. You are walking distance from Chinatown and Clarke Quay. The housekeeping staff was both efficient and friendly to cater to your needs. The frontdesk made sure that they were able to properly resolve my booking concern. Overall, I loved the place and would like to go back next year.
It was a great stay at the beautiful hotel! We love the room and the breakfast too!

reviews.review_title: Small rooms, but everything else is very good”
reviews.review_comment: Yes, the rooms are small, but adequate. The rest of the hotel is a lot better then I would expect from a Holiday Inn Express. The rooftop pool and jacuzzi are wonderful. The gym is basic, mainly CV machines. The location was excellent. Walking distance to 3 MRT stations. The breakfast was comprehensive and of a good quality. The hotel was very clean. I would 100% stay there again.

reviews.review_title: Perfect place for a couple of days in Singapore ”
reviews.review_comment: Very good location in a calm area though excellently connected through 3 different MRT stations in walking distance. Although the room is not that big (remind we're in Singapore ), it's big enough and well furbished. Good breakfast. It must be mentioned that the breakfast area and buffet has been build too small for the size of this hotel. However their "traffic light " system seems to offer a decent solution to overcome the issue.

reviews.review_title: Very impressed with the hotel especially staff”
reviews.review_comment: Staff were amazing went above and beyond from front desk to room attendants; breakfast and security staff

reviews.review_title: Great hotel, nice location, pool and jacuzzi with view”
reviews.review_comment: Great hotel with a beautiful pool and jacuzzi with view in a nice location! The room was a little bit small!
It was good but breakfast can be improved as well not enough sun beds by the pool
Great hotel, smallish rooms but clean, tidy and have everything you need. Terrific location in terms of bus and MRT. Would .gladly stay again

This hotel was close to where I was going for a meeting the next day. The breakfast was decent but a little crowded. There was no one to help you be seated. Staff were attentive to my need of a forgotten toothbrush and comb. A nice view from the rooftop overlooking the bay and SG skyline and a most interesting pool. Will come back again.
The most cozy laidback hotel we've been, i could literally doze off for days in their very relaxing bed and pillow!

Lovely hotel, clean with friendly staff . Great breakfast. Rooms a bit on the small side as was the bathroom. Beware if your quite large as bathroom would be a tight squeeze. It was great for my purpose. Great black out blinds. Pool was fabulous. McReynolds friendly place and hot talking to lots of travellers. Very central to most places. Walk to Clarke key in a couple of minutes.

The hotel looks newly opened and is very clean. The breakfast is very simple, but not bad. The staffs at the reception always try to serve and respond to guests as quickly as possible. One thing I feel disappointed at is the hotel has no service to take care of sending small package by air courier. When I asked a hotel staff for help, he flatly declined my request and just told me to go to a nearby post office in a very unpleasant attitude. It seemed to me that he was not interested to take care of anything which exceed his regular service. This attitude is totally different from that of 4 or 5 stars class hotels. So my evaluation is "good for the price I paid." Nothing more and Nothing less.
Nice hotel, good location, very good breakfast, typical business class! Highly recommend!

Close to amenities, attractions. Different modes of transport are available. Found difficult to use the MRT to attractions, as too many connections and bus rides required. Easier to just catch a taxi that is fairly cheap.

reviews.review_title: Typical good American services in Asia”
reviews.review_comment: Great hospitality, functional and friendly service, just they don’t have, slippers, shampoo, conditioner, tooth brush and others amenities which normal Asian hotels influenced by Japanese hotel services, it’s as the same as in the US.
‘Will definitely stay here again when I go vack to SG 🇸🇬

I stayed here as a solo traveler and it was perfect. The room was clean and cozy, the big window was amazing and the people were super kind and helpful. The roof top pool was by far the best thing about staying here. It was such a lovely place to watch the sunset and you can even see a little bit of the light show from the marina bay sands at night. I would definitely recommend this hotel and I would stay here again! I found the pricing to be appropriate with the location and comparable to the amenities and prices of other hotels nearby, I have no complaints!
Conveniently located at Clark Quay, close to the Marina Bay area and near local hawker centres. The hotel itself is pretty neat and modern. Good value!
Good hotel, more a hotel for 1 night business people, In-Out, nothing special but OK

reviews.review_title: Clean and modern hotel at clarke”
reviews.review_comment: Clean and modern hotel at clarke

reviews.review_title: Clean and modern hotel at clarke”
reviews.review_comment: Clean and modern hotel at clarke

reviews.review_title: Clean and modern hotel at clarke”
reviews.review_comment: Clean and modern hotel at clarke

reviews.review_title: Clean and modern hotel at clarke”
reviews.review_comment: Clean and modern hotel at clarke
Except for food ,everything was nice

Exceptionally well presented but tiny rooms for 250 $ a night. Full at the weekend... consequently breakfast was overwhelmed and hotel had no management on the floor to smooth things out. Location great for the Clarke Quay complex which was buzzing at night. China Town just around the corner was much better value for great food.

reviews.review_title: Great place however lacking in massage facility ”
reviews.review_comment: Place was great walking distance to cafes shops
Basic but good.

reviews.review_title: Little gem....so pleased we stayed here”
reviews.review_comment: Initially there was a mix up...the hotel said they did not get my request from Agoda....I requested rooms next door to one another one to be a double the other a twin as we were travelling with our teenage children. We were given two doubles so for the first night I shared with my daughter my husband with our son, not really a big issue they were unable to move us as the hotel was full but the next day they were able to accommodate our request for the remainder of our stay. The hotel was very clean, staff were extremely helpful couldn't do enough for us, breakfast was varied and plentiful. The rooftop area was an added bonus, they allowed us to use the showers up there as we had to check out at noon but wasn't flying until the evening so we showered and changed Before leaving for the airport. This hotel is very good value for money and see little point in paying top price for hotels when this one is so excellent. Thank you for making our stay so enjoyable we loved Singapore too!
Very quiet and relax
Excellent value for Singapore - great breakfast that appeals to Westerners, perfect central location. Don't hesitate to book this property!
This hotel was an excellent choice to stay in Singapore, the hotel has everything to make a nice stay.
They offer breakfast. It was very fresh and good. If I go to Singapore again, I will definitely go to this hotel!
Rooms are small but it's clean and in a great location with 3 train stops within walking distance to the hotel. The breakfast is amazing and they have a fantastic pool

The hotel was my idea of spartan luxury. The staff very very helpful and courteous. Special shout out to Ashiq from the front desk for being very polite and helpful and helping us book a cab. The hotel has a vending machine which is a godsend for people having the late night munchies. The view from the top is to die for. The swimming pool on the roof is awesome too. The location is perfect as it is 2 mins walk to the mrt and the cabs come to the hotel doorstep.

For the price - rooms too small hence congested - no room service - not even the tiny complimentary bottle of moisturiser (did not carry any as ALL hotels provide so was very inconvenienced) - No bell boy service - very very basic food/restaurant VERY VERY DISAPPOINTING. WILL NOT BOOK AGAIN. We travel frequently and have stayed from 5 star to 3 star - Shangri-La, four point Sheraton, ibis and many others but was not disappointed at all.
Location was stop-on and within easy reach of all attractions. Hotel was very clear and quiet. Two MRT stations close to hotel so the rest of the city is quick and easy to reach.
was a great hotel with good facilities but wasn't anything special just your typical holiday in which is to be except. good breakfast, good cafe and pool are and fantastic location
i hope the service will improve, because of the lack of assistance in the luggage area .and also i hope they will double check the booking of the client . in online booking using agoda system .
Good location. Car park fee is not complimentary.

Stayed here for a few days while visiting Singapore. Great location, nice room with a big window, very nice rooftop pool, and a good breakfast buffet. Staff were friendly and professional. Only gripe is charging $8 for a load of DIY laundry and another $8 for drying.
Price could be a little cheaper but breakfast was better than expected, not fantastic. Location is 15 minutes away from Clarke Quay or Chinatown MRT.
Breakfast is really bad and staff is unfriendly.

reviews.review_title: All great, soundproofing can be improved”
reviews.review_comment: Location, staff, room are all great! The thing can be improved is the soundproofing, I can hear the people talking outside from the hotel room.

reviews.review_title: Clean room, great location, helpful and friendly staff”
reviews.review_comment: Stayed for 3 nights, even without asking we were offered room with external view, and a late check out. Receptionist also suggested local attractions and how to get there.

reviews.review_title: You know what you're going to get”
reviews.review_comment: Holiday Inn Express is the safe, McDonald's choice among hotels. You know what you'll get - a comfortable level of facilities, service and cleanliness. That's what you get with this hotel too. Everything is good, nothing is terribly exciting. It's probably one of the cheaper hotels in this general location but it's slightly further away from the dining options and MRT at the Quay, Chinatown and the Fort. Not a big deal if you don't mind walking and have an extra 5 - 10 mins. For my personal travel I'd rather a quirky boutique in Little India at this price point, but for business it's pretty perfect.
Lovely hotel close to Clarke Quay. Staff were all very helpful. Breakfast could be better.
Pool is fabulkous,, rooms are tiny. There are better hotels nearby

reviews.review_title: Small room with poor view. Very poor BF. reasonable location. ”
reviews.review_comment: Located near Riverside Point. No recommendation.
It's a good hotel with excellent service. The staff was very helpful in providing all our needs.

This is my first time staying with Holiday Inn Express and I find it convenient and suitable hotel to stay. Location is excellent as it is situated in city area. Walking distance to Chinatown and Clark Quay. If you are hungry in the night, no worries a lot of eateries open till wee hours. The room is clean but too small in size.

reviews.review_title: Great experience. Great Staff, very helpful. Amazing location. Awesome facilities. Will come back ”
reviews.review_comment: Staff is very willing to help, proactive and courteous
Good location to look around Clarke Quay and walk to China Town. Bedrooms are very small though
Great Location Over priced Small bedrooms Average breakfast

reviews.review_title: The hotel is in a great location. Great value for money. ”
reviews.review_comment: The hotel staff is very nice & very professional. The room is always kept clean & smelling great! The hotel itself is clean. Breakfast has a great variety of food! The hotel is very accessible & is close to RiverPoint; Subway; SevenEleven & even to a HopOn HopOff Bus Stop! I would stay there again if I would go back with my kids!
Good location. Close to river for hour cruise. Good breakfast. Large rooms for Asia.
This hotel is clean, new, modern, fresh, friendly, helpful, close to everything, easy access, great swimming pool.

Really appreciated the location close to subway Chinatown and Clark quay, away from all the tall buildings. Great pool for doing laps. Short on chairs a bit during hot mid afternoon. Excellent variety in breakfast choices, western and Asian. Comfortable bed, nice to have the laundry facilities on site and the Handy device that gives you internet access and local and some international phoning ability was indeed very handy and new to me. Lost my swim dress and it was picked up by the pool man and given to the service desk so was able to recover it. Good service and nice staff.
Perfect in every way
Hotel not bad but we got a diferent room that ordered on line. Breakfast was poor. Small rooms for couples why price a bit too high. Nice pool area on the roof.
Good location, great swimming,helpfull staff.
Breakfast was good. Pool not exciting.
Staff very good, helped me through agoda to change booking date free of charge.
Excellent facilities and services, especially breakfast. Strongly recommend to stay if not hesitate to walk, even with luggage.

The hotel is clean & modern . Even the room is small but with the high ceiling, it looks very spacious and comfortable. Consider no extra cost for breakfast, serve simple foods with many different varieties... like rice, congee, noodle, dim sum, breads, cereal, pastries, pancake, eggs/bacon .... etc. Breakfast is great! Good location ! For the price I paid, I definitely come back next time ! Highly recommended !
The hotel is clean, modern and economic.The location is nice.
hotel is clean, staffs are nice

This hotel was wonderful the staff breakfast the pool the cafe couldn't fault location close to everything the size of the room is small but we came as tourist and spent very little time sitting in a room great holiday

Hotel is decent and clean, it is suitable for those need a place to sleep and rest. Facilities overall in good condition and well maintained. Only thing I'm a bit disappointed is the breakfast buffet are all carb and no meat at all. not even sausage or egg being served.
Great place to stay right near Clarke Quay the heart of Singapore.

hotels.name: YOTEL Singapore Orchard Road (SG Clean Certified)
hotels.address: 366 Orchard Road, Orchard, Singapore, Singapore, 238904

reviews.review_comment: Booked for 3D2N with balcony, the experience is amazing, room design is great and location is very centralised. Good choice for a short staycay
not bad
Took the balcony room with queen bed. Great view, room is well spaced out.
Good location, clean & comfortable. I love the adorable robot

I was at Yotel Singapore only for two nights. Room was very efficient made, just right as your outside most of the time anyway. I saw I nice mixture in the age of the guests. Guys like me, families and young people. Especially for the young people it is convenient that the hotel is real 2022 ! For me, 64 yrs, when I had some questions all the staff was great with their assistance. Also the IT man (senior) that helped me out with my mobile charge problems. All in all compliments ! Well done all.
Used the room for a birthday celebration & to use the pool! Quite cosy. Just nice for 4 pax. We didn’t stayover though. Convenient location!
Design is smart, bed is smart. There's robot for stuff delivering

reviews.review_title: Dated hotel in a good location ”
reviews.review_comment: The beds were too soft and the air conditioning could be colder. The lights and air conditioning would switch off because of the motion sensor, so it becomes a problem when you are sitting at the toilet bowl a little longer then usual.
It was a great weekend getaway. I just love the view from the room.
Location is very good.. But the BED is realyyyyy bad...veryyyyy uncomfortable...i cannot sleep because the bed..i think they use cheap BED...i will never ever stay in this hotel again

reviews.review_title: Best Value Central Orchard Road Hotel”
reviews.review_comment: Yotel is centrally located and reasonably priced for Orchard Road - convenient for everything
very small room, stressful stay
room is for solo or couple only
Room is small. If you’re looking for a solo staycation to rest your mind and charge yourself, this hotel will great for you!
very clean 👍
Nice! Good job.
convience to orchard shopping areas, easy access to MRT. polite and helpful crews.

Yotel is the benchmark for hotels. Ever since my first stay on 31 Dec last year, I’ve never considered any other hotels. It’s been my to-go place for my past two staycations. I’ve already booked my third one and can’t wait to return! Yotel is clean, tidy and has fabulous staff. The hotel feels just like my second home. It feels welcoming and comfortable to stay there. Give Yotel a try! (Or many :P)

Pros: Nicely furnished room with adjustable bed. Body wash, shampoo, conditioner, moisturizer and toothpaste/toothbrush provided. Vanity kit is available upon request. There is also Iron in the room which comes in handy for business traveler. Nice view out the window. International tv channels. AI robot helps to deliver extra bottled waters or towel which is interesting to see. Cons: Room is small. Bathroom floods each time you take a shower. Has self-check in kiosk but not very dummy proof (staff is prompt to jump in and help though).
Clean room, with fantastic location at the heart of Orchard Road. Only thing about the room is that it is very small, door opens right to the bed.
Good location to orchard shopping centres, easy to access subway. helpful crews.
Room is really tiny but hotel is conveniently located near all the huge malls. Within walking distance
Is too small
Neat
Good size compact space of a room. Splendid view from room/balcony. Location is very very good, walking distance to shaw movie theatre, shopping malls and food places.
Sinking in your bed.
Nil
Great location... Clean rooms... Downside.. Rooms service only once in 4 days

The location is good, close to everywhere. However the bed is too soft for comfort, it will sink when we sleep on it, and the room is too damp. I hang a jeans, it felt cold and damp when I wore it the next day.

I would highly recommend this hotel for short staycations. My overall stay was near perfection except for the fact that the housekeeping staff was making so much noise in the early morning around 7-8AM, when most guests are still sleeping. Despite calling the front desk and letting them know about this issue, the noises still persisted the next morning. I am very disappointed with this experience. I'm not talking about any noise, it's those noises where staff were laughing and shouting at the top of their lungs. I hope you can tell your staff to be more considerate for the guests in the future. All in all, I would still come back to stay at this hotel.

reviews.review_title: A Gem in the Heart of Town”
reviews.review_comment: Stayed here twice and the standard has been great and consistent. The staff are nice and friendly and above all professional in helping you no matter how busy they are. The room is small but its comfortable and clean. Price is afforadable for a place located at the buzz of town. Love the view from the room. Will not hesitate to come back again.
Room was small but cozy. Second time staying at Yotel and service and cleanliness was great. Plenty of food around the area as well

reviews.review_title: Great location for Orchard Road shoppers”
reviews.review_comment: A very smart and stylish hotel. I had a great view from the ceiling to floor windows in my room. Loved the cute robots who did room service.

reviews.review_title: Value for money but bed wasn’t the best ”
reviews.review_comment: Good deal for a hotel in the heart of Orchard. Small room but cozy enough. Bed was weird, not sure if it’s the mechanics of the smart bed but partner and I felt like we were sinking in, and if too close to the edge it feels like the bed is pushing you off. May stay again for the convenient location, but not ideal if you’re looking for a good night’s rest.
Great Hotel...
Room is quite small but the incline bed makes a different. Staff was nice and efficient. Location was perfect.
Not too bad! Clean.

Pros: clean. Has all basic amenities. Fantastic location Con: Stayed in the premium room. Had the worst sleep among all the hotels ive stayed in my entire life. The bed was sinking.. also since the bed was able to go up and down, i can feel the bend on the bed ard the area that was able to lift up. I thot only one side was sinking... the whole bed was sinking when i sat around to find a comfortable position. Its was a horrible night sleep. The pillow was alrite. My biggest issue is the bed. A hotel is for u to rest. If u are not fussy about a sinking bed and is ok waking up with a backache, by all means this hotel is for u, otherwise, look elsewhere.
Nope

Thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Yotel. The view was great from the 27th floor, and although the room is not as big as what you’d get from other hotels, Yotel made sure that it was a good use of space, and every part of the room was well thought out. The facilities/amenities provided were good (including the free welcome Cocktail), and the only gripe I had was the fact that the bath and the room itself is only separated by a glass panel, and water did leak out to the room itself, it’d have been nice if there was a small slope or step from the shower to the room so that it doesn’t happen though. But otherwise, a fantastic place to stay in, and Orchard Road is just a stone’s throw away. Great location. Will definitely come again!
not recommended
Thank you for wishing me happy birthday!thanks for the macarons and birthday cards! Mel,jac and the other guy!
good location and modern hotel
Needs some twin bed for some cases

reviews.review_title: Great locations with modern hotel concept ”
reviews.review_comment: Great locations has making differentiation to this hotel, and support with modern concept especially great bathroom designs able to feel the sun and connected to Orchard. The skin urban lotions, shampoo and etc fm Australia is so nice and upgrade the standard of this hotel. Will definitely staying in this hotel for future visits in Singapore orchard.
Situated in the heart of Orchad Road - strategic location, value for money, love the view (if you're on high floor).
Our stay was comfortable…although its small its really very clean the toilet has bidet the view is fantastic! the location is superb will come back again!
Room is not spacious but has all the necessary facilities and location is great to go to ION orchard wheellock place ets
Best location and affordable prices
I love that the room was really clean and well maintained. It feels really cosy too. No regret booking the room with balcony as the view was beautiful in the evening!

Like the cleanliness and location. Swimming pool is quite small, surprise they don't provide bath robe in room. The space for queen room is only able to fit 2 pax at max. Overall recommended for short staycation.
Hotel room is very clean and compact. Value for money and hotel staff is very friendly.
room though small, has space saving features. i like the feature that allows bed to be propped up. only grasp was the tv that was so bad at connecting to my samsung phone.
Nice cosy room for 1. Has smart tv which is a plus point. Most importantly, it is located in the heart of orchard.
Love the ambience. Staff are warm and friendly. Love the service with a smile. Walking distance to mrt and shopping malls
Small room but very clean and very convenient location. Staff are very friendly n helpful I wish I knew that I had to book for the swimming pool
Most convenient staycation venue in Singapore. Quality staff and efficient check-in process.

reviews.review_title: Great central location and value for money”
reviews.review_comment: Cleanliness and location wise is excellent. Not recommended during if going for swimming. No slots after check in, but no one was at the pool. Dissapointed abt this issue. Hopefully reservation for pool can be improve.

reviews.review_title: Nice albeit small room and great location”
reviews.review_comment: Very good service from housekeeping but unprofessional front desk officer (a woman with long hair). She was too harried and harsh towards guests.
Stayed for a night and enjoyed it very much. Room is small but clean and neat. Though the bed is just besides the door, i hardly hear any noise outside. Good location with many amenities nearby
good and nice for a escape
Room was clean when we checked in. It’s located at a good area and provided a lot of useful necessities
While the location is strategic, the bed is quite small for 2 ppl. We have stayed for 3D2N, but the staff never clean the room at all. Not even changing the dustbin. Disappointed.
Best thing is the location. But the room is smsll.
Very good location with awesome staff who are courteous and efficient, room was lovely with clean facilities and comfy bed!

This is my 1st time book with Yotel. My room lock have issue and after informed staff, they fast response to help chg new room for us even ald at the midnight. And give us a free drink to redeem on lvl10. This is professional. The pool is clean ,after swim won't feel uncomfortable. Will come back again.
The smart tv could not connect using ios.
The room is very cozy and nice 😍 2 people is just nice 👌🏻 The location is very convenient as well!

went for 2 days staycay. loved the room , small but compact and very modern! the pillows were really comfy and great to sleep in. Staff were all helpful since the beginning cause I made a wrong double booking and they help me out sort the problem out. Highly recommended and will be back to staycay again!
Friendly and Caring staff and surprising wishes for me with bday card & delicious macaroons. Like 👍🏼
Small room vs great location.
Super comfy bed and pillows. Great location as well.
The bed and pillow are super comfortable. Once u lie down, u wont feel like waking up again
The room and the view is AMAZING!!

Had a great stay! Booked the room with the balcony. The hotel accommodated our request for a high floor and gave us a room on the highest floor. The view was amazing! The service at the restaurant is excellent. Kudos to Matthew who went the extra mile for us. Not to mention the food as well -it was tasty and certainly value for money!
Bed can incline like hospital bed, pillows are good, many places to hang your stuff. Had a good view from the toilet

The staffs are attentive and gave a small gift token n birthday card on my birthday (though I didnt make any special request). the room is clean and had a great view overlook the city. Will definite go back again
Room is clean. Only the bed could have been better. Follows the weight so not really firm and stable.
delayed flight, does not wish to modify the stay, even with a supplement

Stayed there for 4 night. Superb location as its close to all amenities. Best place to walk around all the Malls in Orchard. I arrived earlier, the staff was very accomodating by allowing me to do early check-in. The in house cafe have good varieties of food & beverage selection. Only sad back, the bed is very small & not so comfortable. Was having back pain. Apart from that it was a perfect stay
staff was friendly and gave my boyfriend free snacks as it was his birthday. The room was clean. I especially loved the bed.
Your nice is so nice but your room is too small

Yotel's rooms are extremely small. It is really not worth the money. Queen bed doesn't feel like queen sized. Very small, even for 2 normal sized adults. Check in time is late at 3pm, check out time is early at 11am. Do not come here. There are other cheaper hotel deals you can get on carou-sell even. Do not come here. Rooms are not worth it.
Best hotel for a short getaway
Good for solo staycation! Not able to use miracast for my netflix shows but if you bring your own hdmi cable, that’ll be good! Bluetooth connection works for spotify. Overall it was a pleasant stay!
Bedding is sad
Very convenient near orchard.Hotel is nice,received the corner top room with a cityview.Love the bed super comfortable.
The room is rather small but the layout is cleverly designed to optimise the use of the limited space. One suggestion - a shower curtain will help to prevent the whole toilet being wet
There are 6 lifts in the hotel, but the waiting time for lift is still very long!
This is my 2nd visit to Yotel, first king room with Balcony is definitely worth the money, the room is super clean and the views are great!
You’ve got to be here & feel the cozy & nice view of either SG sun rise or Sun rise….
Thr bed was really comfortable and the hotel took note that we were there for our anniversary, and gave us a surprise gift. Really thankful of that. Will visit again.

Its a nice hotel even tho its a bit small but the soap and shampoo smells so nice on top of that theres lotion as well. The bed is the best part which is adjustable and super comfy!! And dont even get me started with the channels there was so many channels on the tv like astro and korean channels. Overall was a super pleasant stay i would definitely come again
Will repeat again !
Good value for money.... The city view at night was nice. The bed is very comfortable....If they have smart tv mean great.

It's a cute futuristic hotel that had a view in the toilet. Stayed there for 4 days 2 nights. The pool is quite nice. The restaurant also has good food. The room looks like in a futuristic set up. They call it a cabin. It's kinda tight for a queen sized bed. For travelers who have a back problem like me... The bed is quite soft for support. I guess it's built that way so that it can be bent. There is also no proper table which made it hard for me to do some desk top work. I used the foldable thing built below the tv which also works but not for longer hours. So if u plan to stay there and so some work, it's not a good place. I love the view from the toilet tho! Dint have the chance to experience Yoshi and Yolanda but I guess you guys should check it out! They're cute robots! 😍
Good choice if you want to feel like you're in the future! :)
This will be my Go To Hotel from now on! I love the service and I’m grateful that the staff accommodated my early check in request! Thank you Yotel Orchard! I will definitely come back!
Can be better
A nice place and comfortable environment

hotels.name: Grand Copthorne Waterfront Hotel
hotels.address: 392 Havelock Road , Clarke Quay, Singapore, Singapore, 169663

reviews.review_comment: Fridge was not really working and it was slightly dirty. Overall stay was good.
Is a very nice 5 star hotel very clean

Spacious and clean tidy up room. Breakfast spread is good, able to walk around get yourself finally slowly walking out of Covid social measure loosening rules. Location not near train, but future Havelock Mrt will be around the lobby front, so future travellers can benefits then

Cups are chipped, food served mostly processed food. Noodle station taste is not palatable. Very mass food, worst then hawker food. Not recommending having meals at the lobby restaurant. Eggs & pastries station just alright. Restaurant is too under staffed hence staff are not forthcoming.
Lounge was one of the best experience we have had. Value for money. Room's old, but for the lounge and evening cocktails, it's worth it.

The room was clean, but the facilities are quite outdated. Still has an 80s vibe. Rooms and lift lobbies lack ventilation and light. Food options are limited in room service. No spa. Staff friendly and room service on time.
The beds were super big and comfortable. Clean rooms…and many restaurants in the hotel itself. Staff were welcoming. Overall a good experience 😀
All was OK. Flooring was carpet. Bathtub was dirty. Have to wash few times before using it.
The bed is not hard enough and there is no taxi around, only Grab taxi. the hotel is located in the middle of now-where and there is no toilet bidet too. Overall is ok
Room so Spacious, Surrounded by Buildings and Nice at night. Definitely will Return.
Rundown hotel, no effort to upgrade furnishings, wallpaper peeling off, items are old. Housekeeper don’t clean the rooms properly. And waited 40 mins when request for mineral water in the room

Location is great. 5mins walk to Great World City mall! Many bars nearby. The deluxe room facing the city is boring and old looking so I upgraded my room to river view and it’s so much better!! Bathroom for both rooms are HUGE, I love it. Great water pressure! I think this is the best hotel I’ve stayed that has super friendly front desk staff. She was very happy to serve whenever she received my call! Consistent level of great service. Enjoyed my stay because of service staff! Totally recommended to get river view room

The swimming pool and jacuzzi are functioning well. The kids love it! The rooms are clean and everything was working well. I love that there are many channels and even Malaysian TV3! Awesome! It would be great if there are convenience store at the building though.
Nothing to said
Club manager with excellent customer service

Massive thanks to the GCW team for making my mini getaway memorable. Very warm welcome from Claudia during check in and huge thanks to Siva, Vincent and Afendi for helping with my parking coupon issue upon check out. 10/10 would come back!
TV was an old model , not smart . Besides that , everything is splendid!
Thank you Grand Copthorne Waterfront Hotel for the late check out and free cake you have given us. The room are huge. We really had a good night sleep in the room and we enjoy the pool.

reviews.review_title: Old TV with not much channels. ”
reviews.review_comment: Stayed in this hotel for 3 days 2 nights. I thought this was 1 of d high class hotel but im dissapointed to hv an old type of tv in my family room (club room level). No good channels. Can’t access to netflix/youtube. No much entertainment in d room. No bathrobes. Hotel shampoo & body wash smells like cheap products. But I like d breakfast and club lounge though. Not much varieties but not that bad to my likings. Swimming pool was nice.

Fast and hassle free check-in. However, room is rather small. There is no bum gun to wash myself after toileting. The shower room and shower head is pathetic. Tv is small with multiple issues of poor or no signal. Pillows were utterly flat. So much for a 5-star hotel.

Executive Suite was very old and had a very dusty and woody smell throughout the room. Fully carpeted however, was not cleaned as there were hairs and dust on my child's hands when she was crawling around. Aircon system needs upgrading. Living area was fine however, bedroom was very warm. Had to call the Facilities team twice to check on it. After checking they mentioned it's the design flaw of the room. TVs in both living room and bedroom was very old, no smart TV and just normal cable channels. The toilet was superb, modern and great looking. Staffs were very polite and helpful.

I booked 2 rooms and requested for connecting rooms. I had to pay extra for the deluxe room which was fine, but it came with a dirty bathroom with a long bath that was yellow and stained really badly. We requested for a change of room but they told us that it was full and we could not switch rooms. Not to mentioned that one of the rooms had a strong mouldy smell. Will never come back for a staycay at this hotel. The food however at the restaurant was really good. The staff were friendly and helpful as well.
Nice clean and big room for deluxe

hotel is located at nice place, breakfast is okay quite a lot varieties to choose, staffs are friendly and attend my request to change room immediately upon finding out the the room given to us was so hot due to heat transfer to room from afternoon sun. the room transfered was with beautiful scenary view to river side. very good to dine at riverside restaurants and jog along the river....beautiful neighbourhood. the hotel is old and some renovation required for bath room, water didnt flow properly when we flush out the water from bath tub. overall i must say great hotel with great staff.had good time staying there for a week.
I had the most amazing stay in this hotel. Comfy huge bed, Had a wonderful staycation
Room was old and constantly reeked of smoke smell not sure coming from where.

reviews.review_title: Doesn't look like a upper-tiered hotel.”
reviews.review_comment: To be fair, if this hotel were to be judged from an upper-tiered expectations, i would say it needs a lot of improvements especially on the cleanliness and room facilities. Just my thoughts based on my experiences.
The overall still good to stay, their staff friendly and helpful. Just that, their facilities a bit too old. Desk Phone spoilt, iron spoilt, basin looks quite old with some mold on it 😅

Found a toothbrush under the sink when we check in. Check out is too early at 11am. Breakfast is limited and not variety options to choose. Booking of swimming pool is not flexible to amendments. If you have set an itinerary during your stay, it should be fine since you only need to have a shelter over your head after your day plans are done.
for a five star hotel the breakfast was below standards that i have had in 3 star hotels

I was pleasantly surprised at how warm and welcoming the staff at Grand Copthorne was from reception to housekeeping. Redzuan was particularly friendly and helpful. Bed was very comfortable and room was clean. Food options were not in abundance however you could order online from Grab or Deliveroo. If there was just one thing I'd say needs improvements, it would be the online room service order platform. It could be a bit more user friendly and include more options. I would recommend this hotel for solo or business travellers. Thanks Grand Copthorne for a great stay!
