Pros: staffs were really kind and patient with serving the guests. Cons: Had to change rooms twice because the toilet was not cleaned at all. There were sticky stains, hairs, dust on the floor and some were just swept and hid behind the toilet doors. The first 2 rooms we got had this carpet smell. The cleanliness and condition of the room is definitely not up to a 5 star hotel standard. A 4 star hotel has way better room. Requested for late check-out but staff told me that they can’t grant me with late checkout as they are fully booked the next day. But when I had problems with my room, they can suddenly offer late checkout by 1 hour for compensation. It is difficult to get foods at night after 10 as there are no halal restaurants nearby.

It’s quite bad. The room produces vibrating sounds. Not sure if there is an aircon aircon issue but there is this constant vibrating sound coming out from the aircon ducts. Also the toilet door is so squeaky! Definitely a noisy room to avoid
Old 5 star hotel that is still comfortable to stay in. Nice buffet dinner and breakfast

The room was dusty and old. The tv cabinet was dusty. When I took out the cup to use the cup was super dusty. No housekeeping when I am out in the morning and back in the afternoon. I need to call for housekeeping. After housekeeping, my cup was not wash and coffee still inside. Kettle was not place back to location. Whole room don’t seem to disinfectant.
Great location...great staff and affordable rate, will definitely recommend nor comeback here :)
Value for money. Enjoyed the stay
Old and not attractive environment

reviews.review_title: Who gave this hotel for 5 stars?”
reviews.review_comment: I d i o t
Everything was okay. But still need improve it. The breakfast not many choices!! A bit disappointed.
Will be more convenient if with bidei at toilet

Well-trained staff providing excellent service. Special compliments to Verone (front desk) and Wai Yan (restaurant). Both delivered outstanding service. Housekeeping was immaculate and facilities were well-kept too. Room was spacious and well-stocked with amenities. Thumbs up!

Room was very small, twin bed was small, everything was old and very dusty, there’s an obvious cracks on the walls, toilet shower head broken water splashes everywhere, there’s a moulds on the toilet floor, Can’t flush the toilet bowl properly, most disgusting the next day there’s an extremely horrible drain smell comes out from the toilet. It’s unbearable. Very hard to request for room change, excuse that they give is the room capacity is high and also they won’t give you late check out, swimming slot is only available at 11am and end at 12pm at that time when I book, they die2 won’t allow for late check out, very unreasonable, very stingy, very calculative, they don’t try to accommodate to your needs. When open the cupboard there’s a very strong smelly smell comes out of it. Breakfast in the morning, at the restaurant floor there’s a lizard which was still alive and moving. We can’t enjoy our breakfast. Definitely not gonna bring my family nor will I recommend this hotel to anyone else, it’s really not worth it. There’s more nicer hotel in Singapore that we can enjoy with our family. That’s all.

Great hotel. Booked a 1bedrm apartment for the family. The room is spacious and complete with all the necessary home appliances. Location is great.. hotel is by the river. Good for qn evening stroll with the kids or early morning jog. Hotel is also near bars and restaurants. Great place to chill and unwind. Will definitely book this hotel again.
the staff was very nice! the hotel is very big and there is a good restaurant.

Like the spaciousness of its bedroom and toilet. However, its facilities need to be upgraded urgently - very small non-HD TV (approx 20”), slow boiling kettle, warm fridge, lack of power plug. An over rated hotel.

Front desk staff wasnt friendly. However, i was on the phone with one of the assistant on '1'. She was very kind and were willing to help me out with my 'sudden positive test kit'. Would definitely return here.
bed already sink down , should have change already not suitable to sleep ,very uncomfortable to sleep at night.
Air conditioning was not as cold during the night
Worst services at concirge
Breakfast selection was not that great. But staff were friendly and very accommodating. Room had a great view too. Overall, we enjoyed the staycation.

Hotel stay was pleasant but service at the front desk upon check-in was rude. I was obviously on the line with no que behind me at I checked-in at about 3ish or 4pm but the service staff just ignore my call and proceeded to speak loudly to me repeatedly to request for my Nric for check-in (like rushing me for my ID). They should have waited patiently for me to end my call. When I arrived at my hotel room, I was horrified as the entire room was So Dusty. I understand that due to covid, the rooms might have been vacant for quite some time but the hotel did not even bother to clean-up the room first before allowing new guest to stay & check-in. It was really disappointing and as a result, I had sensitive nose thru out my stay as I was allergic to dust. I have evidence on how dusty the room is everywhere if you need the evidence as proof.

Went for my birthday. Gavin the receptionist checked us in early and gave us late check out. Thank you Gavin. The hotel looks old. When we enter the room, there’d stains on the carpet. The bathtub is small. There’s a musty odor in the room maybe due the carpet.
Best so far, from cleanliness to staff to facilities to view. Definitely value for money.
Got some stain in the toliet/bathtub Customer Service not 5 stars hotel standard

Checked in with my aged parents and kids. I already did request for an adjoining room but they gave me side by side when they confirmed it was an adjoining at the reception. Waiting for 15mins no one came till husband had to go down to get it down. Rooms had an old musky smell. Other then that the location was ok . Could have had a better stay if all were done properly.
Aircond was off automatically during the night and we were end up sweating.
Rooms are very dusty and pillow cases seems to have a strange lingering smell.
Very nice and kind staff. Nice breakfast.
During the stay i have to wait for 4 hours to check in. I arrived at the hotel at around 4:40pm and waited till 8:50pm to checked it due to the queue.

reviews.review_title: Not up to expectations for a 4* hotel”
reviews.review_comment: Corners of the room were quite dusty, pillow covers has a smell for both rooms. We upgraded to a deluxe, didn’t even enjoy the bathtub because water was dripping from the light above the bathtub. The tissue box near the sink was a used one, with dried tissue that was wet before. Expected better from a reputable hotel.
Great services from the hotel staffs
It was a great stay even though there were some hiccups for room service for my boyfriend’s birthday surprise, they did an immediate service recovery! Very much appreciated
It’s an older hotel, look bit dated but still relatively comfortable and clean. Toilet smaller but ok. Great experience overall 😊
Great staffs and great services!!

For the price, you can stay in better/newer hotels with better service. (Told them it was my mom’s birthday multiple times, and they didn’t offer anything. Staff were not very accommodating in general)
For 1 day
My family and I enjoyed our stay in the hotel! And the hotel rooms were spacious and clean! The staff were accommodating to our requests as well.
Our room at floor 14, its look old. Not so clean on all the furniture and floor.

reviews.review_title: staycation for the end of year.”
reviews.review_comment: Checkin for us was seamless as we have booked the time slot before hand and there was rooms available for us to checkin immediately at 12pm. the room decor is dated and there is no USB port for charging so you will have to bring your own wall plug with USB to charge your phone. our first room was right beside the elevator shaft which was very very noisy as you can literally hear the lift moving every 20-30 sec. We called to request to change our room and was quite fortunate that they did the room change for us. The new room was the same as the previous room just that the TV was quite small for a 5 star hotel. The bed was good and pillow was one of the best that i have slept on across all my visits to the hotels in Singapore. The breakfast is worth a skip as the western corner scrambled eggs was hard, hash brown was hard and oily, croissant is not crispy only the asian selection of fried bee hoon with seemingly CP chicken drumlets was not bad. overall for the price paid, i could have gone to somewhere else instead.

During our stay we were so worried as the hotel has no proper segregation of staycation and VTL guests. We were assigned on the floor full of VTL guests. I asked the manager but they told me that they don't have designated floors for VTL, it's mixed. It's not very pleasant stay as I have kids and I was so paranoid so I have to keep on spraying disinfectant in the room and all the surfaces. I hope hotels should at least designated floors for VTLs. The feeling was not so good when you came out the room and what you are seeing were all rooms next to you have pack of foods hanging on their door knobs. Actually, it was really all rooms on that floor I guess at least all those I can see.

reviews.review_title: Thanks Grand Copthorne for a memorable stay!”
reviews.review_comment: First time travelling with a young infant was already stressful for us, and reading recent reviews of the check-in experience at this hotel did nothing to assuage our fears. Our fears were fortunately unfounded! Something must have happened behind the scenes because the check-in experience for us was really smooth! The room itself was comfortable and the provided cot was invaluable in making sure our lil' one doesn't hurt herself for when we need our hands free to do stuff. I want to also make special mention of The Capital dinner crew that was on shift in the evening of the 28th of Dec. My wife and I felt at home because some of the crew (I remember the bartender who came by and spoke with us which was nice) was very attentive to our needs (providing high chair, picking up stuff dropped on the floor by the baby e.g.). The only slight drawback for us is that there wasn't any convenience store nearby and we were out of snacks. The places around here to grab a bite ain't cheap!
Breakfast buffet needs improvement. More staffs in each food service area to avoid long queue . Should have more choices especially for kids
Staff are very responsive to help with queries.
Will stay again if I want to be away from the hustle and bustle of shopping areas. Located right next to a river with lots of nice restaurants :)

reviews.review_title: Wonderful stay, clean rooms, great service ”
reviews.review_comment: Got requested high floor and enjoyed the great service and clean room. No issue on the room at all. Buffet breakfast at Food Capital should be improved. Limited choices, subpar standard and food are not hot (sausage boiled instead of grilled, no standard bacon, eggs are pre-cooked, cups ran out halfway so couldn’t get coffee etc.)

The hotel and rooms are pretty old and you can see old stains on tiles, carpets, chair, etc. TV is also old (p/s: not a Smart TV). Basin area was quite small too. Very basic. But the room size was good. Staff service could be improved. Carparking is expensive, but good thing guests have complimentary daily parking.

This hotel offers an amazing view of the Singapore River and the city. The hotel is conveniently located near Robertson Quay and Great World City. The bed is comfortable but the pillow is too firm to my liking. The shower is spacious and has a high water pressure. The room is sound-proof and I can hear nothing from the adjacent rooms.
It was a nice stay for a night.. good food and good room.. except that there's no bidet..🤭
Excellent stay. Manage to get an upgrade. Family friendly hotel.

Room was not clean properly, table and chair were dirty. Communicated to have utensils but staff at the counter was rude, had to reask for the utensils from another staff. After a good 10 mins upon returning back to the room after collecting our food, another staff came to give the utensils. The neighbour opp our room had lots of meals and it was all outside, some lasting an entire day uncovered. Also told them that it’s our anniversary and they did vip.
Affordable club lounge. Everything is great except for the swimming pool.

I enjoy our stay in the Hotel. Very Neae to Clarke and Robertson Quay which have many restaurants and bar. The pool is cold for children and the cable TV is unwatachable if you are going to watch movies in cable. Need to improve the signal. The breakfast food is great which is standard for this type of hotel. The scenery at Nigh along the river is great

From checking in to booking of facilities to housekeeping. All great experience. Stayed 3 days 2 nights with 2 connecting rooms. Great buffet dinner with festive spread plus in-house guest discount. Wonderful experiences and all under one roof *ThumbsUp*
The room was fine as it faces the River. But the toilet needs more cleaning. They were able to provide us with wine glasses when we requested.
VTL Pasenggers need to que 1.5 hours at lobby. Request make up room at morning, only coming on 9:00PM and do not clean up everything. Just change towel and throw rubbish in dusbin. Thats all!

Only managed to get checked-in at 5+PM, next day check-out was by 11.30AM. Breakfast was good, check-in waiting area with complimentary coffee/tea helped, process of checking-in could have been smoother. We expected a better room after staying at various 5-star hotels in Singapore, the property is somewhat dated.
We were in a 2 bedded apt suite, was lovely and spacious with own patio to chill. Definitely returning there if we are in spore!

reviews.review_title: waited long hours to check in while in wedding dress”
reviews.review_comment: On 18 Dec, we went to the hotel for our "honeymoon" after our wedding reception. We have a total of 4 rooms and my family went to the hotel at 4.30pm but the lobby was full and there was a long queue. The hotel staff told them that the check in process will take about 2hrs and they were told to go to go up for a drink in the function room. At about 4.30pm, I and husband arrived in our wedding outfit. At 5pm, we get to register at the reception but the rooms were not ready and we were told to go up again for a drink as our rooms will be ready in about 2 hrs. At around 7pm we went to the reception again and the lobby was still full. We approach the counter to ask about our rooms but no rooms were available because there was shortage of linens. We asked to meet the manager. The receptionist approaches us and told us that the manager will see us in a while but the manager DID NOT meet us at all. We were practically begging them to give us 1 room for me (the bride) to change out of my heavy wedding dress so that we can go out for dinner. Fortunately, at about 8pm we manage to get help from Claudia she offered us 1 room for us to change. After changing out of my wedding dress (wore the dress for 12hrs was a nightmare) we went out for dinner. At around 10pm, on the way back, I called the hotel to ask if our rooms were ready and I was put on hold for so long and guess what? 1 room was still not ready and by that time, I was already so tired and frustrated. When we came back to the hotel, we were greeted again by Claudia. She was very apologetic and she managed to get all our rooms ready. She apologized and upgrades us (the wedding couple) to the club floor. We were told that a honeymoon arrangement was waiting for us but when we enter the room, we were disappointed again. Nothing was prepared but we were fine as we are already so tired. Room was very dated and dusty. There’s also lots of trash on the corridor and it was not cleared for 3 days. We stayed 3 days and 2 night
Not convenient if your are not driving. Mrt is also far away.

reviews.review_title: Not recommended; don't waste your money”
reviews.review_comment: Check in starts at 3pm. We arrived around 4:30pm to a short queue. Imagine our surprise (and horror) when we're told that our room is not available yet! Told that we were #15 in queue and it'd take 1.5 hour for our room to be ready. We were given the option of late check out (which we can't utilise as we have elsewhere to be) or a welcome drink each (we sure didn't feel welcomed with the check-in process). The check-in staff we dealt with was polite and apologetic, but it didn't help that we were shortchanged of 3 hours of our stay, as our room was indeed only ready around 6pm. This staycay was for my boyfriend's birthday, but we had to wait around wasting time and he napped on the chair by the reception while I read Google reviews about similar or worse waiting times at this hotel (just look at the latest Google reviews; those abt their recent stays were all 1-star reviews due to the check-in wait). It is not worth the amount we paid and certainly we could have spent our time better had we known prior to arrival that our room was not ready. It is unbefitting a 5-star hotel to provide such service. If the hotel doesn't have enough housekeeping manpower, it should have just accepted fewer bookings! Room: Spacious and comes with a bathtub, but really need a renovation as the bath fittings look outdated and worn. Water drained from both taps very slowly. Lighting in the main area by the bed was too dim. Wardrobe door kept opening by itself which triggered the sensor light inside and had to try many times to make it stay closed. Corridor to rooms very dated. Facilities: Didn't even get to use the swimming pool as we can only book when we are assigned a room number, but as mentioned, we only got our room at 6pm and the pool closes at 7pm! We called a few times to try to secure a slot but not surprisingly, it was fully booked. We can only view the pool from our room. The pool opening hours could have extended to late at night to accommodate the number of pool users sinc
Spacious room. Good bargain for group travellers
Goods
We arrived at 3pm and it took over 1 hour for us to check in. They still did not allow late check out.
Register at 1500hrs, got room at 1945hrs

Merry Christmas!!!! 😒 I booked a room for 24 Dec to 25 Dec 21. First, my room doesn’t have slippers and I had to ask them for it. Second, their phone is not working 🥺 and I had to call their landline just to request for slippers. My room had stains all over the cabinets, walls and on the window class. The carpet also feels like I’m not in a 5 star hotel, it’s quite cheap and it’s so dirty. I feel like someone just check out and they didn’t even bother to vacuum the floor (not sure if they even change the sheets) LOL Anyways, this is by far the worst experience. Thanks

Booked a night on Christmas Eve, check in was nightmare. Waited more than 2 hours before we were finally checked in. The guy checking us in were not apologetic for the long waiting time, no form of compensation was given, he flatly said check out was at 11am the next day and he said long waiting check in queue was out of his control. 5* hotel with poorer service than a 3* boutique hotel to be honest. After finally checking in, first step into the room was welcomed with a moldy smell, room was very dim, we on all the lights but they were dim orange lights and felt only half of the room was lit. Toilet seat was stained with urine from previous guest. Eww? Dust was collecting on the counters above the bathtub. There was a mini fridge, and a bottle of half drank soft drink from the previous guest was still left inside it. What can I say? Apparently cleanliness and hygiene definitely not 5* standard. We gave up using the mini fridge which wasn’t even cold anyways. We booked the deluxe king room for 2 pax, but amenities were for 1 pax? There was only 1 bathrobe, 0 room slippers, missing shampoo. Had to call room service to request for missing items. Mind u, we waited for more than 30mins only to have to call again cause nothing was delivered. We ordered GrabFood for dinner and there were no disposable cutlery given, (although not the hotel fault), we tried calling room service if they could provide us with cutlery, and again we waited this time at least 45mins before calling AGAIN to see if it was instead possible to collect the cutlery at the counter ourselves cause we gave up waiting. 5* service? Haha. Also, since we booked the room with breakfast, the check in guy told us last order at the buffet breakfast place at level 1 was 9.30AM and cancelled the 10.30AM written on the check in slip, so we went down around 9AM the next morning, only to see people still streaming in at 9.30-10AM AND the buffet counters were still opened. What??? Misinformed or what? U decide for y

reviews.review_title: Great price and nice that it’s near Robertson Quay”
reviews.review_comment: Enjoyed the price for two nights at the hotel. However, the hotel was too fully booked. Checking into the hotel required queueing and an hour of wait. Despite repeated request to clean our room, our room wasn’t cleaned the next day. They did bring us new towels when I requested. Also it’s not possible to book the pool on the day of check in, I was quite disappointed by that as my kid loves swimming. I’m glad the breakfast was ok and that there are close by cafes. If there were playgrounds and other kids facilities nearby the hotel would have been a better family destination.

The waiting time to check in takes too long. Almost 1 hr. And the menu in the room not working. Called operator for housekeeping but never came to clear the rubbish for both nights. Need to improve on cleanliness and also when clearing rubbish.

reviews.review_title: Nice hotel with very friendly staff”
reviews.review_comment: Stayed here with my family for staycation. Overall a very good hotel and staff planned the check in etc procedure very well. Nice.

hotels.name: Marina Bay Sands (SG Clean Certified)
hotels.address: 10 Bayfront Avenue, Marina Bay, Singapore, Singapore, 018956

reviews.review_comment: Always a good stay

Still one of the best hotel I’ve stayed because it’s at the prime location where there are food, shopping and relaxation (massage). Staffs are friendly and accommodating to my requests. Cleanliness still needs to improve slightly for the bedsheets and towel as I saw some stains. Otherwise everything is still good.

reviews.review_title: Room with the view of the sea”
reviews.review_comment: The view of the harbour/sea is amazing and the size of the room is definitely worth it for the price. You should definitely stay here to experience the infinity pool. I would highly recommend getting the room with the view of the sea and the gardens.
I was there one night with my family and would say it provided very good service from the hotel staff and overall very fun experiences for the kids

We are VTL traveller. The hotel do help us for quick check in. However the hotel is very tedious for facilities booking, attend to our needs and treat us like a fault as we booked the hotel through agoda.

reviews.review_title: love it and worth the money”
reviews.review_comment: The experience is just so amazing. Stayed at MBS to celebrate husband's birthday and we never regret it at all. Absolutely clean room. Beautiful neat comfortable. Nothing can go wrong. Room came with a very romantic balcony facing the gardens by the bay such a beautiful view in the evening and in the morning. Reception is well organise having the queue number so its not overcrowding. And everyone is just so friendly. Love it and definitely coming back!

Due to covid, can only book 1 hour slot at pool. Unfortunately, even when checking the pool bookings earlier than the advised 24hour period, there was only one time slot left....11pm. However, staff are very kind and accommodating, giving surprise treats for belated birthday and sent up baths salts when requested.
Very friendly staff at the check in counter.

Stay was good, except we did not know that we still had to get a queue number to check in when we arrived at the check in time, which is 3pm. Our queue number only allowed us to start checking in at 5pm. We hope the hotel will increase its efficiency on the check in process. By the time we got the room, it was already after 5pm.

Stayed in MBS on 3 Dec to 6 Dec as a means of getting away from home. Generally, MBS is good except for the below:- 1) Pillow too soft 2) Shower head is fixed (I am used to a shower head that I can hold on to) 3) The day before my checkout (5 Dec), there were loud noises ("pom") like explosion coming from the ceiling (noon time) for about 30mins to an hour. I thought sound proofing in hotels were good but it is proven wrong. As it stopped, I did not call for assistance. 4) Too many people at the lobby waiting to check-in or checking-in. I think the check-in system is great. We can book for a slot and get a number. I got an upgrade and got a room with a great view. It was great! The staff who helped me with the check-in was great too.

reviews.review_title: Not suitable if you're looking for a quiet/cosy place”
reviews.review_comment: It is not a hotel with a proper lobby... If u wan a private cosy hotel, this is definitely not the place. There's no actual lobby. The ground floor lobby where the check~in counter and concierge is more like a public thorough fare where all kind of people are there ie, those visiting the casino, those visiting the linked sandy Bay mall, tourists and local alike who just wanna drop in to see the place. Not sure if it is due to current pandemic, it is such a pain that each time to take the lift to go up the room u need to announce your room number and all the occupants names for the "gatekeeper" to register into his laptop and likewise when you exit the lift... What a pain!!
Not the cheapest, but has a great time enjoying central location.

reviews.review_title: Central location, nice skyline and garden view from ”
reviews.review_comment: Central location with lots of good restaurants within hotel and shoppes. A quick getaway staycation.
Fantastic Hotel! 10/10
Very friendly staff .. helpful . Would coming back again n recommend for my family n friends ..
Great
I was the older child and it was a great place for a staycay to celebrate my dad's birthday, being in a great location with good food and views and facilities
Ambience awesome, nice place to recharge, relax and chill
Nice pool view

reviews.review_title: One of the best staycay ever”
reviews.review_comment: I was super impressed by MBS standard of service. From the valet to the staff at the Express Service to even the lifeguards at the Infinity Pool, all gave top-notch service. We got a Premier city view at Tower 1 and remained at this tower even at the Infinity Pool. Best sunset view ever and not crowded (unlike at Tower 3, not sure why). There was an option to use the jacuzzi but we opted out of it just cos we were to enamoured by the city view the whole 1hr15min time we were there.
Both of us enjoyed our 1 night we at MBS. We loved waking up to see the magnificent city view from our bed.
Booked the garden view, I’ll be coming back for it in the near future. Absolutely nice view! Worth it! 😊
Too pricy for room size and quality. Ritz Carlton provides better value for money.
Great hotel with great views and facilities!
Much better than we expected. Great weekend helped immensely by the free room upgrade. Thanks to all the staff!
The staff are all efficient and of course the room are spacious and infinity pool is the best!
Managed to get good upgrade of room
Finally we get to stay here! I love the infinity pool! It’s not too crowded due to covid so it’s really nice to take photo. Room is big and clean. Staff are friendly. Thank you.

reviews.review_title: Literally, the Top of the World”
reviews.review_comment: Staying at Marina Bay Sands was the highlight of our COVID years. We thought, perhaps once in a lifetime we'll try this hotel and pamper ourselves. The view, the pool, the hospitality and the food, we thought we knew MBS as we've been visiting here so many times for various occasions, we were wrong. The experience was beyond our expectations we're considering to stay again soon!

We would like to shout out to Dyana Din, the amazing front desk staff who checked us in. She kindly attended to our request and gave us an amazing room. She really made our first anniversary extra special! Thanks Dyana!!!

I specially booked a room for marriage proposal as the environment and scenery is pretty. Although my proposal failed, I still want to say thanks to the front office for their excellent hospitality. Many thanks and I appreciate it very much

reviews.review_title: Definitely one of the best hotels in Singapore”
reviews.review_comment: We were given a free upgrade to a suite! My sons were over the moon when they saw the room. V beautiful and clean. Only thing agoda package does not come with free breakfast and complimentary valet parking.
Stunning place to get away for awhile
Ive been there for hollidays... good hotel.. good staff..
near the attractions, great foods,

reviews.review_title: The Best Staycation Ever in Singapore”
reviews.review_comment: You could expect the finest services from this well-known hotel. It could be due to off-peak, my wife and I had a complimentary upgrade to premium room at level 38 with the stunning view of Garden By The Bay & ocean. The room came with Nespresso machine with 4 signature capsules. We had also ordered In-room dining for dinner (Marinara Spaghetti & Fish and Chips) & breakfast (Baker's Basket), the foods were absolutely great. Overall it was the best experience so far for our staycation!

Marina Bay stands by their standards! Always giving me the best service without fail. Vathya from Check-In counter was the cherry on top in this staycation. She gave me an awesome upgrade. On point gave us our anniversary cake! All the staff are helpful and cheerful. Connected with the Marina Bay sands mall this hotel gives you everything that you need when in vacation. 100% world class.

There is no 24hrs convenience shop for customers staying at the hotel to buy small items. The only 1 closed at 11pm. Mbs claims to be one of the best hotel yet, cannot even get to buy simple things after 11pm.
good
good
Best Stay

Good registration system with mobile queue number and the staff Dyana served me well. Upgrade my room from Deluxe to Premier for my occasion. Room with superb view! Valet parking with multiple entry. Hassle free!
Best shopping area

MBS is a really great place to stay for a staycation. The room is clean, spacious and have all the required amenities. The Infinity Pool was amazing, and breathtaking. The only issue we encountered during our stay is the rude staff (and provided us wrong information about the booking system for the Infinity Pool) that was monitoring the entrance to the Infinity Pool on our first day. But the hotel staff made it up with an extended check out timing. Shout out to Devi, the staff that help us with the check-in. Amazing service from her. 10/10 would recommend it here.

reviews.review_title: I dont like the rigid ambassadors at the lift lobby”
reviews.review_comment: one of my staycay that I dont quite like
Love staying at Marina Bay Sand . Love the ambiance , the hospitality and the pleasant and ever helpful staff . Make your staycation memorable
Excellent and convenient place to be for short staycation
not bad

We booked 2 rooms to celebrate my dad's birthday. Service is consistently good, be it at the reception, the room service, the rise restaurant, the pool or the staff stationed outside our lift lobby. Our rooms were facing the beautiful Gardens by the bay. The morning sun rise was a treat. We also enjoyed ourselves tremendously at the pool, though the water was icy cold. Within short walking distance to attractions like Gardens by the bay and Art science museum. Will definitely love to stay there again!

Book it to celebrate my hubby’s birthday. Not only was there a Birthday Cake delivered to the room, we got a free upgrade too! Fantastic view of the harbour and the staff were super friendly. My little boy’s need is well looked after as most of the restaurant and facilities are kids friendly. Definitely recommend anyone looking for somewhere chill and relax in SG!
NORMAL 3 STARS
very good
nice hotel...will come again
The hotel room was nice and clean, staff was accomodating however one of the main attractions which was the infinity pool was fully booked during our stay..
Check in was a hassle. Otherwise it is a perfect experience for the family.
Totally best. Unbelievable view 👍👍👍👍

Book directly from hotel may have better advantage as hotel will send you the SMS for check-in time, and the link to book the infiniti pool - which you may wait longer at the hotel and may not get any slot for the swimming if wait till check-in.

The room is very spacious and it's located at Tower 2, Club King City View. The kids luv it. Only during this period you need to pre-book the swimming pool. We are so lucky there is a slot available at the very last minute. You need to keep on trying to see the web-link. Upon check in, we also received the complimentary box of cholate and the drinks in the fridge & snacks in the cabinets are free too. The bathub is huge. Only they the toilet do not have any bidet. They should have one. Thanks.
Love the stay there. Would have loved the tv to be less outdated. Otherwise, sky park and Infiniti pool was nice! The room is big and spacious!
Checkin takes more than one hour.There was no waiting area .People with kids and old people were standing despite paying such high charges per night
Good staycation in MBS with Family room. Spacious and clean . 👍👍👍

My family tremendously enjoyed our stay at the MBS. Thank you to the caring and efficient staff. You guys made it really worthwhile. Hotel was crowded and booked but each and every staff gave their personal touch to their client’s individual concerns. Thank you for your quality service!
There is only one Halal dining place that is at the Shoppes - Beanstro.

First time to MBS, we are greeted with welcoming staff and everything was top notch! We love the infinity pool as well! As we are celebrating our wedding anniversary, we have a complimentary cake to celebrate our special day too! We had a wonderful staycation at MBS!
Overall quite satisfied. Great location. Breakfast buffet is too pricey. Perhaps can consider to offer free parking for guests based on their stay?
IT'S A REALLY NICE HOTEL

We had a great time. However, check in process took us about an hour. You might want to get queue number before reach the hotel to avoid long waiting time. Swimming pool session also need to book due to self distancing measure.
Our family had a great stay, hotel is impressive
Booked the hotel as a birthday surprise for the fiancee. Perfect view, perfect environment.
Hotel location very convenient and staffs all very friendly . Highly recommend must stay here if you travel in Singapore.
I was expecting that you will arrange honeymoon amenity to be sent to our room after check in.... When we book we never recieve notice that the infinity pool is by booking.
Staff were friendly and the check in and check process was smooth and fast. the room view was amazing and the cleaniness was great. just that they did not have in room dining
Thank you for making my mom's birthday a memorable one, Marina Bay Sands! <3

For people who are for staycation, there are plenty of stuff you can do, from eating, shopping, entertainment, sightseeing can be all done under one roof. So do not need to do any planning. Will come again to stay another day!
Overall a good experience but just that the time allocated for using the pool at just 1hr a day per room is not really enough.

Booked MBS for our wedding anniversary.Told them to decorate but i didnt proceed with it but they automatically left us a cake when we left the room for the pool. The staff are very professional. The infinity pool was the best experience. The view from our room was spectacular
must have seen/been infinity pool

reviews.review_title: Marina Bay Sands garden suites views”
reviews.review_comment: Garden suite room view awesome, looking out to the gardens by the bay and sea view
Our first time in Marina Bay Sands was really great. The staff are all so friendly and helpful. The room view was nice, not bad.

MBS does not disappoint - even with the pandemic, the booking system for the facilities is fuss free. We had free flow snacks and the staff topped up the complimentary mineral water bottles very generously after cleaning our room. Staff are polite - from the valet all the way to the cleaning staff and it was definitely an excellent experience at MBS! Definitely worth the money too.

reviews.review_title: Bland. Uninspiring. Without its infinity pool”
reviews.review_comment: Staff were exceptionally courteous and helpful despite being inundated with typical demanding guests. Although a visit to the concierge failed to materialise a housekeeping request. A premium booking with what I believed had accompanying premium perks, failed to realise a visit to its top floor infinity pool. No doubt due to some poorly managed poorly strategised ‘Q’ system. Leaving ones only impression limited to its bland accommodations, tasteless in-room dining and scratchy bathroom linen. Final say; Not coming back.
Really had a wonderful experience during my stay at MBS. check-in & out was smooth. Clean hotel room. and good customer services

Had a 3D2N stay at MBS. While the view from the room was spectacular (granted that you book rooms at the higher level), there is room for improvement for the staff service. The staff service was rather inconsistent, with a small handful of hotel staff providing excellent service and majority of the hotel staff providing mediocre service. The only memorable service received was when the receptionist managed to squeeze us in for a slot for the infinity pool. We had a not so good experience when we were given inconsistent message regarding utensils request. At first they told us it was chargeable if we request for more than a dozen of utensils. When we clarified with the receptionist during our check-out, she said that requesting for utensils is not chargeable at all, regardless of number of utensils requested. Quite inconsistent in the message given... Most of the staff there were also quite unenthusiastic, not the kind of service level I was expecting from MBS. Perhaps it is because of the high volume of Singaporeans doing staycation there?

Swimming is a rush during the covid period. But it's not the hotel's fault. In fact, they are making it as pleasant as possible. I wish there was food options from room service. Other than that, we had a very satisfying stay.

No doubt, the price per night is quite costly for an average Singaporean like myself. But it was our honeymoon night and even though we could not travel for our honeymoon, we are really glad we chose to stay at MBS. We had such an amazing time at MBS. From the moment we stepped out of the car, until the moment that we checked out - the service was extremely top notch from the staff at MBS. Shoutout to Firdaus from the Sky Park and his team, as well as Pauline from the receptions team, for the highly commendable service. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone.
Tip: Be sure to SMS 'Q' for the infinity pool once you get your confirmation code for your booking. It is likely to be fully booked if you decide to queue for the pool on check-in day in COVID times.

From the beginning all the way till the end - they treated us very well. It was my birthday so my friends left a cake at reception, they kindly located the package and sent it over my room. They helped us book restaurants as well! For the pool - you must book a 1 hour slot during the day. It was a busy weekend so there were no more slots available in the booking website. They kindly found us a slot at 11pm - just nice for a midnight swim. It was actually a better option, nice view of the night lights. The rooms weren't anything special, but the view and the service is stellar!

reviews.review_title: Hotel with good location and exceptional view”
reviews.review_comment: Hotel location is very ideal as it in the heart of the city. The shoppes (mall) connected to the hotel added to its convenience. There’s a lot of restaurants to choose from and a food court too. MRT is just right there too. The infinity pool is the cherry on the top however, due to covid-19, it’s access is limited to an hour and you have to book it in advance. You are force to vacate after the given slot as they clean the facilities (sunbeds, tables, etc) and prepare it for the next slot. It feels restricting but gives you security as well that everything has been cleaned and safe. In room food is quite pricey but delish!

PROS.. Hotel is located at the heart of Singapore. Has a great view over looking the CBD on 1 side and Gardens By the Bay on the other. The infinity pool was great. Free minibar. Staffs are friendly too. CONS.. Too expensive. Room was so-so for a Luxury Hotel Resort. Using of pool and gym requires booking the night before and system a bit lagging. No free parking provided. Check in at 1500hr, Check Out at 1100hr.
The staff at the pool was very kind and friendly.
The view from our hotel is fantastic. Staff is friendly. Definitely a good staycation.

reviews.review_title: It depends on your travelling experience”
reviews.review_comment: To those who cant read long reviews, if youve stayed in hotels like the Hilton in Tokyo, MBS is strictly okay only. But if you don't travel and only stay locally, MBS is slightly above average. Location, convenient enough since it's right next to the bayfront mrt and walking distance to the attractions such as gardens by the bay,shopping malls etc. Facilities were okay, shower head was a little rusty but it was plastic, not sure what's happening there. The table beside the bed was dusty AF, just happened to drop my child's milk bottle behind it and dust was literally flying everywhere. Balcony facing the gardens by the bay was nice but floor was dirty and took the grand out of the view a little. Skypark was the worse. View was mediocre at best. Maps that were printed in multiple languages at the viewing areas were peeling off, signs were faded due to rain or sun. Apparently maintenance took a day off here. Value for money? I paid around 600 for one night, quite affordable for a hotel of this calibre but I definitely would not consider it value for money. If it was heavily discounted, I might recommend MBS, other than that, you're better off elsewhere. Unless you're filthy rich and have no concept of money. Staff fortunately was the saving grace for this entire endeavour. Pleasant, polite and helpful.

reviews.review_title: Horrible service and not value for money at all”
reviews.review_comment: Service was horrible. Front desk staffs were arrogant. Queues forever building up checking in took so long. Opened up so many rooms for stay yet only allow a max of 200 ppl at the pool. As a result you either you either have to go wake up Super early to try your luck with their lousy Q system or wait until late before you can even know if you can come up to swim. No complimentary parking for hotel guests. Ridiculous check out timing at 1100hrs. Staffs were not accommodating in any way. Seems like they only pay attention to their VIPs and disregard everyone else. All in all, MBS is nice to look at but not the best to stay in if you’re in Singapore. Never coming back and wasting my money.
great view, nice pool

Due to COVID-19, my partner and I could not travel overseas to celebrate our first anniversary. After much thoughts, we decided to plan a staycation over at MBS. This was our very first stay in MBS and we had an amazingly fabulous time, all thanks to the great hospitality provided by MBS. Knowing we were celebrating our first anniversary, MBS was so sweet to prepare us a cake. We were very surprised and felt so thankful. We would also like to express our heartfelt thanks to the front desk staff, Mary Jane, for assisting us in our check-in. Her attitude was really good. She made an effort to explain the terms and conditions by MBS and also the different kinds of facilities that MBS provides. Thank you Mary Jane, thank you MBS.

reviews.review_title: If you arent wealthy and rich this review is for you”
reviews.review_comment: If you want to experience infinity pool on floor 57 which and awesome buffet food and great view this is for you. Its expensive and I stayed for one night and it was worth it. But 1 night was enough to me to get the experience. If I want some luxury in my life maybe then I'll visit again. Staff was nice., Rooms we're nice and location. But the location is a bit isolated if tou want to stroll around. Probably need taxi for that or I just didnt find my way out of the hotel : ) Try to get the room as high floor as possible. I was at 47 and view was nice.
Really friendy staff at the reception, at the luggage store even in the restaurant.

You pay for the sky bar, pool, view and architecture, worth doing, however after you’ve experienced it there are other luxury hotels that are less crowded. The housing keeping is excellent, rooms r extremely well cleaned.

Hello there, We have already made a call to cancel the Business trip due to the employee is unfit to go travel. Appreciate it if you could give us feedback on whether the Hotel can be refunded or not. Thank you.
Couldn't get better than this. AMAZING!!!

hotels.name: Hotel Grand Central (SG Clean, Staycation Approved)
hotels.address: 22 Cavenagh Road/Orchard Road, Orchard, Singapore, Singapore, 229617

reviews.review_comment: Location good

reviews.review_title: Golden location, valuable. Breakfast is pack delivery to room ”
reviews.review_comment: Clean ! Comfortable! Well maintained Old hotel. Breakfast is sent to room with one container, not worth to pay any dollars to get that breakfast. ☹️ Taste awful
Nice breakfast, quiet stay in middle of town.
Very good
Lazy housekeeping, Chinese auntie wont clean your room Miserable reception.
Poor AC. Small room. No room service.

reviews.review_title: Ok for a clean bed with no luxury.”
reviews.review_comment: Bed was comfortable a and clean. WiFi was slow and television restricted w I th no access in movie channel.

Besides location this hotel offers nothing. Either short staff or pure laziness , entire 4 days stay was without cleaning/housekeeping despite informing the chinese lady housekeeping required. Just dirty! Reception unfriendly and look miserable.
I paid extra for breakfast. Yet the breakfast is just a packet of bee Hoon hang at the door of our room with a kids pack orange juice and cup of yogurt.
Very accessible to MRT (400m away) and bus station (200m away). Taxi stand across the street.
Great stay,

Great location. Fairly clean with outdated decor. Has hyflux water filter but the cold option isnt cold at all. The pool does has a great view but they need to do better landscaping. The ferns are overwhelmed and dried too. Breakfast is totally not recommeded. Sent up tasteless, soggy fried maggie with 2 halfsie hotdogs for the first morning, and fried tasteless pasta for the 2nd ones. Location has loads of eateries, fret not.
Good

Jot what I want . I actually request for a beautiful view. But what I get is a dark and super inside room. Totally not a good place for staycation. And the service is suck . I ask whether can change the room type and the staff who on duty did not answer my request.
Respectful and helpful staff especiallu the two concierge and April, the Filipina manning the front desk.

reviews.review_title: Very dirty hotel room with many defective items/fixtures ”
reviews.review_comment: Very dirty bathroom, room, hallway, etc. Bathroom has mold, shampoo bottle and shower gel bottle were still left open by the bathtub from previous guest. Many items in the room were defective, including missing bedside table, broken bathroom door, broken towel rack, etc etc.

Daytime woman at the desk so so. Night time desk man fantastic. Went way out of his way to get copies printed of documents the Philippines wanted for quarantine free return entry. A real gem in these covid days
good. worth for money. excellent location
Staff was utterly rude worse customer service
Due to COVID, the hotel had closed restaurant and hence there was lot of challenges for food.

Stayed in triple room, suitable for 3 adults and 1 kid. Suprisingly there is a bathup even though the toilet is quite small. Rooftop swimming pool, with pool for kids. Location is very near to sommerset station and all the shopping malls.

The intention was to have bathtub and the bathtub is not very big but acceptable. Check in and check out is fast. Easily accessible. What's more where you are located near to Don Don Donki which is 24 hours.
Basic hotel no frills, good bed. Super small bathroom
Great!!
I am really disappointed by the marketing strategy adopted by this hotel, it serves pathetic breakfast , staff is really bad.

Aircond is ok. Not super cooling yet can accomodate singapore hot weather. Location is gd. Reach out to nearest bus stop and mrt station Shower and bathtub, water pressure flow is strong and hot enough Water dispenser, my favourites. Easy to reach out for hot coffee and tea Bedding is fine. Comfy and cosy Sound proof of the room, able to hear kids crying in midnight. Nothing can be expect Cleaner, housekeeping. very nice person, would greet you hello, gd morning and friendly The wifi, can be disconnected sometimes but mostly quite stable for me while work from hotel. Overall, i would choose to stay again.

Hotel very well located near somerset mrt. Nearby hv 24 hrs indian muslim food, laundry service and bar. Price was decent for long stay. Fridge arent that cooling. Aircond is not that freezing but able to hold up Singapore hot weather. Water flow is big when showering. What i like the most is the water hot dispenser. Not need boil water and u get hot water instantly.
Excellent. I will give u 7 stars if there is an option to it. Great!!!

This is our second time to be in this hotel abd again we have had an amazing time. The only thing that we did not like is the breakfast. While booking it was never mentioned that breakfast is pre-packed. The breakfast was non edible and mostly stone cold when delivered at our door. So we ended giving the majority of our breakfast packs away or throwing them in the rubbish bin. It was really a waste of money. So do not pay for their breakfast! We tried it this time because the website says that cafeteria is now available and we did not realize that breakfast is pre-packed! It was really disappointing! There is also very limited viewing channel thats why this time around we brought our apple device to be able to watch decent films :) Other than the horrible pre packed breakfast and limited viewing option, we actually enjoyed the location, the staff and the hotel itself. That’s why we came back and stayed even longer this time.

The receptionist that chinese lady. She is so rude!! Your technician that came and fix my tv. 好像我欠你们很多钱这样。不想做工就不要做啦。don't show your guest one kind of bullshit face! To the management ifyou wish to know further details , feel free to contact me!

reviews.review_title: Avoid the breakfast if possible unless you can’t go out ”
reviews.review_comment: The breakfast was really a let down. No coffee was provided with the breakfast set. Called the reception and asking if have coffee, answer is just “sorry there is no coffee” … if I was served the coffee with the bread and potato salad & orange juice, I might be rather contented ( not still, not worth the 15$ Per set) .. you can get better breakfast set for just 5-6$ near to the hotel. Stay was not bad, quite clean as things are new.. but I won’t stay there again as my experience was not so positive as I waited more than 1 hour for check in that day due to school holiday period

Hotel check in system was horrible. Waited for almost 30 mins before I was served at the counter and waited another 20 mins just to be checked in. After checking in, I had to wait for another 15 mins just to take the lift up to my room as there was a fire alarm testing going on and ended climbing the stairs to my room. Room in real life looks very different from what was pictured. Was a little disappointed with the outcome. Asked for Late Check out and was told to check out anytime before 1pm. Received a call from front desk at 12.15pm asking me to check out immediately. Very disappointed by the rude service by the Front Desk. When checking out, I still have to wait 5 to 10 mins to check out. Overall, it was a disappointing experience and will never consider coming back..
Small room however for the cheap price its worth it.

Most unfriendly and rude staff! Upon asking to change room to double bed as requested during booking. Reception airs name Beni. Lied on face that no one checking out for 3 week and girl fully book for 3 week so can not change room. And same day I check Agoda it was doing available room for coming days. Bad experience.

Check-in took us about half an hour, while there are two receptionists but only 3 groups in front of us. Also, have requested king size bed for couple, but the lady receptionist said that left with 2 single beds, understand that requests subject to availability but expect they at least combine the 2 single beds for us. This is the first time for us to stay in this hotel and also the only time.

reviews.review_title: 1 HOUR TO QUEUE at least TO Check IN”
reviews.review_comment: Ridiculously long queue to check in. Had been travelling and staying in so many hotels in so many countries. Never in my life had I ever thought a hotel in my own home town (Singapore) to be providing this kind of service. I don't believe you would choose to blame your below standard service on the Covid situation. Come on, definitely an hour at least just to Check in? I had paid for my stay, yes I understand that the usual procedure needs to be done, but you are severely under staffed. Well. i just left, that's it. Definitely won't be returning. So guys if you are reading this review, do think twice unless they can offer you cancellation if you didn't manage to check in. Well just too bad i had to forfeit my stay.
Very good

reviews.review_title: Best hotel for location with an affordable price.”
reviews.review_comment: Hotel Grand Central has the best location in SG right at the heart of Orchard road with the most affordable price and cozy room.
Nothing memorable in particular but respected that the hotel has decent customer service. Did not give me any problem and it is near to town so that is a plus point. Thanks

The hotel is conveniently located just 5 mins walking away from Orchard Central. Don’t need to worry about food and entertainment as they are all within walking distance. The room is of a decent size and relatively clean although it showed sign of old age.

At the price offered, I would say is value for money this location. Overall was fine since it is quite near to shoppongs, coffee shop and cafe. Toilet is clean but small. Room facilities is alright a bit old. Ok for short stay.

reviews.review_title: Good location and value for money”
reviews.review_comment: The quality of breakfast has room for improvement.
It was great experience

The Hotel was very clean and the comfortable. But the service wasn't that of what I expected . I was too tired I overslept one hour past the chk out and already there was a big commotion . Until the8 actually use Mastercard to open the door to ask my wife wake us up as my wife too was locked out cos we overslept when she went out to buy food . I was doing my night shift earlier before checking in. My wife offered to pay for another extension since she knew I was knocked out too tired but next moment she knew they already open the room which I felt theres no privacy. If they think something might have happen my wife is downstairs at their lobby to settle things. So it was a bad experience for me .
Nice room

I choose this hotel because of the pool. I tried to reserve a slot for the pool via email but I can only do it upon check-in. I checked in at about 3:50 pm but wasn't able to reserve a spot. The room is clean and the receptionist are kind.
We requst large room during our reservation but we can't get the room. Beside that, next to our room all in quarantine they did not seperate staycation customer and those whose in quarantine.

I think everything is fair enough. Didn’t get to use swimming pool as it was raining. Breakfast was PATHETIC. For one day breakfast, additional $30. We were served a halal meal which consist of 2 pcs prata and a few potatoes with curry. There’s small orange juice with a yoghurt. It’s really not worth it at all.
Location is superb for a staycay and affordable. Room and facilities are clean and service staff are welcoming. My only setback is my toilet has no bidet spray. Good to install one

reviews.review_title: Basic hotel in a centralise area”
reviews.review_comment: Overall its a ok stay, nothing much to comment about a hotel Very simple and basic hotel. However the location is great if you want a cheap hotel just right outside the shopping zone of orchard.
I like it as it's quiet!
Never come back again!

all requests were ignored. booked a king bed and got twin beds pushed together which were very easily separated. the beds were extremely itchy (I have sensitive skin, he does not). the counter staff were not very friendly either. location wise is pretty good and easy to locate. the hotel provides bath towels, shampoo, body shampoo and toothbrushes. soundproofing isn’t the best. overall, quite disappointing. they had a pretty cool water dispenser in the room though.
It’s very convenient ! Near MRT and Orchard shopping malls. Will try it again!
Bathroom size was pathetic.. aircon wasnt cold .. needless to mention, breakfast provided wasnt up to par.

Front office name Daphne was trully sucks. From the first time I approach her for registration, she don't even greet, smile n acknowledge my presence. Gv me a kind of look, e slowest registration I'm going thru at the counter. For formality sake just telling me no large bed n keep on telling me it's upon availability.. Eventhough I do made a remark in booking n payment 1 month in advance. What matters is not about the bed, but it's about her attitude. She don't deserve to be in the frontline.
Close to Orchard Road shopping area. Close to bars and restaurants. Room just big enough to be comfortable.
Hard Bed sheet, spoiled door with loud noise, broken glass , the top of the curtain is spoiled.
stinky room. chargeable for ice.
Nice location. Nice pool. Good ambience.

The room was just nice for 2 person's with a nice view as we got the 10th floor. However, the check in time was very slow. The facilities like swimming pool had restrictions (we could not go just to see as we have to request for the staff to escort us). The room had a lot of facilities. Worth the money paid.

reviews.review_title: You get what you paid for”
reviews.review_comment: Hotel cleanliness is atrocious. Limited TV channels available and fridge is not even cold. Staff is cold and not polite at all. They claimed to have a gym on site but its just a room with 2 equipment. On top of that, pool water is dirty and the bathtub in the room has a cracked on it. Highly not recommended but if you're to waste money, by all means
Not the best and not the worst. Location is great though
The room carpet got funny smell
I dun believe ur breakfast to ur guests some as SHN person or QO person.. We not SHN or Qo at ur hotel..but as guests for staycation The breakfast so bed.. not value of money
Got a good deal for $97 for one night. Got a nice room with a view, However, the bathtub had a crack in it that needs to be fixed.
All i can say its the best staycation so far....staff is super friendly...
Might come again

Terrible first impression I have for Hotel Grand Central by female staff Rosni dyring checking in. Even the housekeeping is friendly and polite than there front counter staffs. And the gym has only 1 equipment. Next time please do not advertise that you have a gym when there is only an equipment that we can use. Return to stay: NEVER!
the locations is good. Some of the staffs at the reception are not so friendly. the swimming pools is closed
Poor service, standard sucks, manager like hooligoon dun allow me to shorten my stay. food sucks. Hotel & toilet size so small not meant for human stay. Food oso not meant for human consumption!
This is our last minute plan but it turn out to be good. We had a nice stay.
Location of the hotel is near to Somerset MRT station. A lot of good choices to shop around Orchard. Good restaurant as well
Good and helpful Staff...
Location is not too good, water boiler is not working, otherwise is good value for money

reviews.review_title: Very very long check in queue and very mouldy smell”
reviews.review_comment: Almost 5 and check in queue was extremely long and slow staff. Room very musky and air con smell of mould. Cigarette smell in room also.
This hotel thou a bit dated, the staff are friendly and place are clean. Not expensive given the great location.
it's okayyyy
Food provided during SHN is so lousy. Chicken curry is very smelly. Staff don’t understand about customer service and easy going. Ask for tooth paste and brush 3 times and never send to room.

reviews.review_title: Read all the reviews B4 U book this hotel”
reviews.review_comment: Encountered a rude malay receptionist (speccy guy) on 1st day of CNY. He is a shame to those working in service industry. Got the worst room view, facing directly to 3 neighbouring rooms. Have to keep my curtains on at all times for privacy. Small dirty swimming pool full of hairs & dirt. Stay here unless you have low budget.......
Had a great time Highly recommended!
Very accessible, near by orchard central, 313 and plaza sing

room abit small but still good. fridge was not cold. great location! hotel should put a notice in the room, about booking of slot usage for facilities eg. swimming pool, etc. staff at check-in counter was polite and accomodating. Appreciated his help!!
Very good location. Rooms are small but clean and decently nice. Value for money. Overall, satisfied with my stay and its a good 3 star hotel.
They can better the room on water heater for drinking not hot and toiletries item some are not place.
Nice location with very clean room. And good house keeper

The hotel is no where close to a good value for money. They did not highlight that they will be providing a bento box for breakfast, even though I paid a premium for a breakfast inclusive rate. Also, there were only 6 channels on TV...so nothing much one could watch. The daily housekeeping was basic. All in all, I wouldnt recommend this hotel to anyone to stay
Nice and clean environment. Very convenient too.
It’s Certainly the best bed and pillows I’ve ever slept in the hotels, And the location is really good, very close to orchard road and the MRT station.
Strict follow of SOP - Which is what I liked stay here in the midst of Pandemic! Professional Security Staff Professional Reception Staff All very helpful
Easy Walk to Plaza Singapurra
Easy Access to amenities
Room quite small, cheap in the area, near shopping center, 10-15 mins to sommerset mrt st. Not recommend if you have big luggages
Plus great staff! For business or pleasure- very centrally located. Worth the money in Singapore! Manager Benny is fantastic and runs a great team of staff!
Awesome hotel for aolo travelers or couples who are not fussy. Clean and value for money. Good central city location

reviews.review_title: Overall we are satisfied and enjoyed our stay”
reviews.review_comment: We enjoyed our stay. Friendly staff, accommodation is good. We were on high flr corner room and its quiet. Clean bed and sheets. Complete TV, wifi, aircon, iron and iron board, vault, hairdryer in bathroom, rainshower head and handheld shower, hot and cold water dispenser is a plus to this hotel. (anytime available). Free slippers, shower gel and shampoo nice smell, toothbrush and toothpaste freshen breath, toiletries complete. Breakfast is more than enough. Usage of swimming pool safe by booking so its kinda exclusive an hr of usage . Overall satisfied stay at affordable price. Recommended. Worth it.
- very close to all classic landmarks Great & friendly staff -Safe and Secure place -Close to MRT
Excellent location.The staff had my room upgraded.
Nothings is good. And more than that if you have car you must pay for parking. I did call before I booked the hotel staff said yes there’s parking included in my package

hotels.name: Carlton Hotel Singapore - SG Clean Certified
hotels.address: 76 Bras Basah Road, City Hall, Singapore, Singapore, 189558

reviews.review_title: Great Location, Great Location and Great Location!”
reviews.review_comment: This is my second time to stay in this hotel. Everything is on your doorstep and the room is big as well. Next time will choose this hotel again.

Wanted to have a soak in the bathtub but the water is too dirty and is yellowish. Tried cleaning the whole tub with Dettol and sponge but the result still the same. Suspect the pipe is rusty. Did not feedback to the hotel as it was late and we do not wish to change room etc. The water kettle is dirty too even after a few washes and boiling. One more thing, the breakfast at cafe was quite disappointed. The food (except the omelette) is not even warm when served. Nice view, nice hotel but not a wonderful experience.
One of the best hotels in Sg. Value for money . Good location. Excellent service. Overall satisfied.
Nice place and relaxing
Somewhat expensive when compared to similar 4.5 star hotels I've stayed in. Location is good. Staff are very helpful & very friendly.

The Front desk staff whom we interacted with were not very friendly. Unfortunately the room I was in faces the office building which made it inconvenient as the hotel window was not tinted thus I could not draw my curtains which made my stay unpleasant.

reviews.review_title: One of the worst staycation ever..”
reviews.review_comment: Staff unfriendly with no passion in their work, no usb plug in the room. Pls avoid
check in process was smooth and room was clean.

Booked at this hotel as its convenient for our solemnisation at ROM which was 5mins drive. But I wouldnt recommend the hotel for a relaxing stay. Requested for a twin bed, they claimed not to have any. Requested for a fruit basket or a cake to celebrate the occasion, it was subjected to availability - which is understandable. But they gave a very small cake with a "Happy anniversary" sign on top of it...my sister just got married. What anniversary? But appreciate the effort. It's an old hotel despite 5-star, I'd recommend this hotel if they've undergone renovations to upgrade their looks and facilities. Other than that, no major problem or anything fancy about our stay.

Stayed on a rainy / overcast Sunday for 1 night, so couldn’t use the pool which was disappointing, Overall a good stay nonetheless, though the room was nothing special and smelled a bit stale. Staff were polite and professional. Breakfast was acceptable but not something I’d order again. Would stay again and hopefully try the pool, as the location is fantastic and even for an older hotel, it’s well maintained and clean.
Hotel was well maintained, staff were very friendly and hospitable.
Smooth check-in and check out. 24 hrs room service. Complimentary parking. Plenty of malls and food options nearby. Available smoking rooms that has small windows (helps).
Not my first time doing staycation with Carlton Hotel. Idea location and price is reasonable.
Location is good. Very convenient to City Hall and many eateries. Hotel is big and we have enjoyed our stay. Will stay again.
Great
It will be good that your platform inform me that my booking was with king size bed with extra bed while I had chosen twin size bed for my booking.
A hotel with a good location, professional staff, well-equipped amenities:fascilities and cleanliness is 5 star too! If I may add, I personally love, love their room service seafood horfun.
Great stay at the Carlton. Very convenient for local shopping, restaurants and travel. Staff friendly and helpful. Will definitely stay again
Great location good coffee too in the room. Shopping food is nearby only
Highly recommended room for staycation with good facilities and very clean hotel. nearby to malls and train station.
We were upgraded to a room with a beautiful city view of Raffles hotel & MBS. Check in was swift. Room was clean and staffs were great.
It was not a good experience because the staff were rude , the room was so small and we paid $500 for it and it wasn’t even up to standard. Service was so bad . Pls improve !!
Great place with food and shopping as well as ambience
Premier room is value for money. Very worth it!

reviews.review_title: 2nd Year Anniversary and New Years Celebration”
reviews.review_comment: Absolutely amazing experience with Carlton Hotel. The staff were all so welcoming and helpful. The check in was fast and fuss-free! The room was huge and had a bathtub even though I didn’t book or requested for one. Amazing service! The hotel made our 2nd year anniversary an amazing one!!! They sent over a cake for our anniversary as well! I would really recommend the Carlton hotel. Even during New Year’s Eve - the most busiest time of the year - the staff made a pleasant experience for us. I would return to the establishment for a staycation or a celebration! Thank you Carlton!

Amazing service throughout our stay. Got a free upgrade as we were celebrating our anniversary. Good location, just across Raffles City. Premium Room came with a good sized bathtub - comfortable for 1. Would be glad to stay again!
The Hotel is centrally located to places of interest, and eateries. Some of which are within walking distance.

reviews.review_title: Excellent hotel in walking distance to everywhere in town”
reviews.review_comment: I never regretted booking Carlton for our one week staycay! We made full use of their gym and swimming pools facilities (gym was quite well equipped and swimming pool, although small, runs from 1.05m to 2m deep. There's a kids pool by the side). We only wished the gym opened to later than 7pm so we could exercise after our heavy meals. Our room was facing Marina Bay Sands and we woke up to good view every morning. The hotel is across the street from Chijmes and Raffles City, Suntec and Funan are just a couple minutes away. (No worry about food or lack of places for after meal walks or shopping!!) During our stay, we even did quiet morning walks to Chinatown and Telok Ayer! We didnt book breakfast with the hotel, but plenty of options and good food available everywhere. Bathroom was big with a bathtub. The hotel was also really sweet to offer us complimentary cake for our anniversary! It was a really great stay and we'll be back again for staycay in the future :)
Good
The hotel staff are accommodating,the hotel is absolutely clean and it's just around the city. Very convenient for all transport 😉 like it a lot and Worth it.

My family and I had a wonderful time at Carlton over the last 2 nights. The staff were friendly and helpful. The hotel is a stone throw away from the malls, museum and train station. Lovely place, friendly people! Will certainly come back some time.
Check Out Time Is Too Early, Cannot sleep longer. Not given by a very high Floor. Althought i book very early ago. No Free Upgrade given.

Booked 2 rooms for family of 5pax, no connecting rooms, rooms are spacious and clean. Good view of city landscape. Rooms come with spacious toilets, overhead shower head and bathtub. Bed and pillow a bit too soft. Overall good
Good location and value for money.

With the current pandemic, we were very satisfied with the measures that hotel has in terms of hygiene and cleanliness. A good location if you are considering the view, though some rooms may not have a nice view.
Very comfortable, nice staff and convenient area.

Location: Raffles City Shopping Mall is directly infront of the hotel. Very convinient to buy takeaway meals. SG tourist attractions are walking distance from the hotel. Service: Room service is good. Able to get my requested item within minutes. However, service at the counter can be improved (the man with darker coat, i assume who is the lead/ manager). He should smile more, use a nicer tone when speaking to customers & be approachable).

Initially we bought a normal non-smoking room but requested for one on Agoda. Upon arrival, they granted my request and gave me a smoking room without any additional charges. Staff are also friendly especially housekeeping as they were willing to clean the room at any requested time!

reviews.review_title: A very comfortable and pleasant stay”
reviews.review_comment: It was a wonderful stay. We received a complimentary upgrade to premium room and a slice of yummy cake. Room was clean and well maintained.
Staycation was beyond expectations. Services were great. Had a super relaxing stay.
The hotel room was clean and cozy. The staff were accomodating and they made my day special. Its on a very good location as well, and I can see MBS from my window. Value for money ✔
Accessible to nearby malls such as raffles city, bras pasar and dhoby. Value for money and great view. Free parking included. Will come back again
quite value for money. no point for the breakfast

The room facilities are not serviced. We had a shower that did not work and the room was musky. Although, the staff were very helpful, it did not solve the hassle of us having to change room at night. We had to repack and unpack in the middle of our stayca. If only the hotel had made the effort to upgrade and upkeep their facilities we would not have to be doing this. But we would like to thank the staff for their help.

From checking in to the room with a view to the bathtub, my kids and I enjoyed ourselves. The service is top notched., staff were quick to respond to a request for toiletries or ice. The location is convenient and could go museum hopping or marina area. However Swimming pool is a bit small for children and that it’s a pity that the poolside bar is not opened. Breakfast were limited in selection but enough to fulfil the tummies. Service staff Jasmine was kind to give yogurt and biscuits to my boys to make their day. Overall, we will return to stay again.

reviews.review_title: Centralized Location with Newly Renovated Hotel”
reviews.review_comment: A worthy place to try. Awesome location, next to Raffles City Mall. Booked the Premier Room. Spacious room with nice 'kinky' toilet setting, definitely not ideal for staycations with friends or relatives you're uncomfortable being seen naked.
The staff manning the gym/swimming facility was great and friendly. He also went out of his way by calling us when a slot became available.
It has the best view and the location was in the centre of most of the shopping malls. Facilities (e.g., swimming pools) were versatile and clean.
The chk in and out was smooth and friendly staff.
Nice view and clean hotel. Location is superb

The place is definately superb. Food is all ard the corner. There ar 2 pool. One for small kids and one for adults. The room is clean and was given a complimentary bday cake. Were given room upgrade. Staff are friendly. Carpar is free and quite big.
Opposite shopping mall

Next door neighbor laughing, stamping their feet & talking since 10pm, called front desk & concierge at 12.30am, no one picked up. Finally someone picked up & was not helpful. Called concierge at 2am. Couldn't sleep well that night. Waste of money.

Had a 2 night stay with my wife in Carlton. The staff are very friendly. Manage to hit the gym twice a day, Mike is so helpful in the gym, ensuring both of us use the equipment correctly and safely. The room is big, clean and view awesome! Anything and everything is nearby as in 3 mins walk away, Boat Quay, Clark Quay are also walking distance.

reviews.review_title: Not recommend to eat their breakfast”
reviews.review_comment: I would recommend to my friend if want to have a short vacation in Singapore. But is quite disappointed to their breakfast. Due to covid-19 they changed the breakfast buffet to breakfast set. It unable to know when booking online. For my husband and me, we strongly feel that the breakfast is not worth for the price. We're paid for the breakfast buffet price. Although it's able to unlimited order but is not worth for the price. The nasi lemak is not very nice. And the america breakfast's bacon super hard. And the breakfast set menu is not much of choice. For their staff service is quite good except the last day we stayed. We're waiting to order our breakfast for quite long. And called one of their staff he said one minute will come back to us. But end up I went to look for other staff to order my food. Except the breakfast others is good.
Worth the view from the hotel & love the design of the room! Great service for hotel staff!

Had a better view during my first stay cay here facing the raffles city shopping mall but this time round was facing the Carlton building which is kinda bored. Nevertheless i’m still enjoyed. Hope to come back for the 3rd time with a better view.
The hotel is nice, just that the bathroom shower hot water not very hot due to maintenance, location is great as it is easy to access to all the city area shopping malls
Nice and easy to get around.
Great location! very near raffles city and suntec city if u love shopping. very clean room too. however the breakfast is lousy and not that great. not much choices. better to book without breakfast.
good staycay 4 couple
good staycay 4 couple
good staycay 4 couple
Everything Good… From Check In To Check Out… Front Desk Staff Housekeeping And Lobby Security All Friendly Room Awesome Location Good
Room is clean and well organized.

Centrally located with the following bests: 1) view 2) value-for-money 3) awesome shopping & eating places @ Raffles City Shopping Centre 4) chill hangout places @ CHIJMES 5) SERVICE!! 5 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️Hotel indeed!!!

If you want a hotel near to shopping paradise like bugis, town then Carlton is a great choice. I booked the deluxe king, without bathtub but when checked in, got the one with bathtub instead. Nice! Room is clean, no complains whatsoever. Ironing board and iron available, convenient! But it would be great if the toilet is installed with the water spray gun next to the toilet bowl easier for us to clean up ourselves after taking a dump, instead of just providing tissue rolls. If not must wash ourselves in the shower lor lollllll
Comfy beds, fuss free staff

Check in on 3 nov at 1 pm, front desk very rude when request for high floor rm, reply in very sacarstic tone, was shock at the attitude, did not get the name but it was a young chinese guy without spec, after reading some of the comments it seems that others guest received same treatments too, hotel management should look into this, this fucker guys should be sack.
I like the clean and spacious bath room and bed. Near to MRT, mall and a host of eateries.
