Room came with free upgrade to premier room, high floor with great view and big space. A little disappointed on the breakfast as we can only order the set but understand that this is due to the government restrictions now
great hotel

On the 28th October 2021 at about 8pm, the front desk staff was very rude in communicating with me. There was no warm greetings from him and they way the staff answers to my queries was in a rude tone. He allocate me to a room which has no city view when it clearly states that in my bookings I have the city view. He did reallocate me to a new room which fits the description but previously mentioned that the hotel was already fully booked. For hotel management please refer to the date and time for the name of the staff. Thanks.

Location is strategic. Got a free room upgrade during my stay. However, the hotel is quite old and the room air condition is very dry caused me to have very bad sinus. The bed is not comfortable too. The reception Chinese staff is not friendly (must advise him to smile more 🙂, I know you are not smiling even you are with mask on), your tone of voice also very dull and serious. Otherwise, other staff all nice and helpful. Attempted to call concierge or reception for half an hour but couldn't reach through so I have to make a walk down to the reception to make a request. Overall not a pleasant stay. 😒
clean and comfy

The room was fantastic with nice view. especially during the night. The chromecast connection to the tv complete my staycay for a night. Kudos to Guest Service Dian who assisted me during the c/in, very good customer service.
The room was clean and so surprised it come with bathtub. Check in was smooth despite need to Q as there was guest checking in. Breakfast range was limited due to Covid.
Nice room and view, however for the price that I paid for I will not return. The breakfast was not up to a standard of a 5 star hotel.
worth the price

Hello everyone! To be honest, it isn’t that bad staying here. Easy to find food but what i don’t LIKE about this place is that they didn’t give us enough towel. 3 person is staying in the room but only gave us 2 towels. Aircon isn't that strong. We stayed for a good 4 days 3 night. On the last day, they cancel our wifi. Haha lol i mean you can cancel our wifi after we check out right? We had issues with the door too. We couldn’t scan the card on our door. So imagine after swimming i had to go back down to the counter and get the card issue fixed. That’s all! Thank you for reading 😃

make sure you confirm your room type when checking in, i booked the executive room but was given a way smaller room when entering. but nonetheless, all else was good apart from the room being different.
Room very clean..!!!! Sure will come back again

We booked a weekend staycation for a family celebration. The room is clean and the housekeeping services was prompt. For the pools, there is one kids sized pool and a deeper pool for adults. My kids enjoyed the pool a lot. The location of the hotel is superb with many eateries nearby. A big thank you to the hotel staff Dian and Adrian for accommodating to our requests!
recommended
Had a staycation with Carlton on my Birthday. Heart warming to received a small cake. Free upgrade was given and make the birthday girl happy.
Love the location and the hotel ambience. The staffs are friendly and helpful :)

Well designed and spacious room, I had 2 rooms (connecting) and both rooms had spacious bathrooms and bedroom sufficient for extra bed. Great city view. Breakfast had to be ala carte and restaurant service is good, they will ensure you have enough to eat. There's nothing bad to comment except if they can add in the bidet, that will make it perfect.

Worst staycation ever. Requested to fix mini refrigerator once we found out door not fully closed but ignored it twice. Also, Requested bottle opener..just ignored request. Also room not tidy and toilet got some smell. Please stay in other better hotel.
Great location and plenty of food choices nearby. Staff is helpful and friendly. Room is clean and spacious. Highly recommended to all.
Clean and spacious room. Great location. Cable tv with a lot of international channels. Basic amenities provided.

I booked premier room to get awesome view facing MBS and to sit by the window to admire the view. Day & night view is awesome. I read reviews that hazelnut cake at the cafe is good, yeah it was good!!!! Worth the try! I like the tub, but it would be better if toilet has bidet. The pool is small and looked lifeless. The lounge chair looked old and not clean. I wanted to use the sauna/steamroom, but it was closed, due to spike in covid infection.
Skip the breakfast in yr package, not worth it. Hotel forgot that it was my husband’s bday. That said, enjoyed the Premier King room. It was clean and housekeeping was prompt.
If you are planning for a memorable occasion, you may want to look for an alternative. I strongly believe any 5star hotel would definitely do better than carlton.

Location is near raffles shopping center. Cityhall mrt is just around the corner. Orchard shopping and bugis is few bustop away. Bring comb as it is not included in the toiletries. No bidet Food were good for breakfast. Bed and bed linen were crisp and white for a good nice sleep.
Good stay. Clean. Convenient location. Will recommend

reviews.review_title: Facilities are great, but the staffs are not friendly ”
reviews.review_comment: The hotel is clean, in nice location and worth for money, but I had a bad experience with the receptionists. We went for wedding anniversary and we checked in quite early. We requested a room with good view, but apparently the receptionist just ignored my request and gives me a room with a very poor view, until now I still don’t understand why he treated us like this. When my wife requested to change the room with another receptionist, that receptionist also replied in very angry and rude way. Furthermore, he told my wife that he don’t understand her English, that made us felt really bad. Fortunately, we eventually got help from a nice manager to change our room to a nicer one. I don’t think I will book this hotel for the next time.

Location was great easy access to MRT stations. Staff is friendly, the hotel management did a little surprise for our anniversary and birthday. Room service was fast everything is great. highly recommended. Cleanliness was 10/10
Big bathroom with bathtub. Location is great. Opposite Chijmes and Raffles city. Had Dinner at Wah Lok and it's delicious.
Carlton is not as good as before since many years back. Did not have a good experience this time round.. very disappointed.

My repeated stay as I have a good impression of Carlton. The executive room is clean and comfortable. The staff is friendly and helpful and the food at Café Mosaic and Wah Lok Restaurant is delicious. The location is great for shopping and public transportation is easily accessible. A great hotel to rest and relax in. Thanks to all who attended to me during my stays there. Stay safe and healthy and see you all again soon!

hotels.name: ibis budget Singapore Selegie (SG Clean, Staycation Approved)
hotels.address: 183 Selegie Road, Bugis, Singapore, Singapore, 188329

reviews.review_comment: The staff were friendly. My only complain is the toilet which is a bit dirty, would suggest to please scrub the toilet bowl. Overall stay is good.
clean n simple. location is good . surprisingly this hotel have swimming pool.

reviews.review_title: Good budget hotel with not too many expectations ”
reviews.review_comment: IBIS selegie is the best option for people who are on budget and don’t want to travel long distances for sightseeing in Singapore. The property itself is average - rooms on the second floor are not sound proof and I had a few guests next door who were making noice even at night without consideration to other guests. That is something to be worked upon. The actual room itself was very small.

The staff at ibis budget Singapore Selegie as well as staff at ibis head office Singapore were very considerate and helpful in helping me navigate a path through the Safe Travel regulations. It was a comfortable place to stay during my week of tests and movement restrictions.
My best tip would to always have a reservation to expedite the check in process. 5 stars

reviews.review_title: Great hotel value for money near fringe of ”
reviews.review_comment: Hotel is conveniently located at the city fringe, with nearby access to Train (within 400m), Bus transport. There are tons of restaurants, eateries and shopping malls/complexes in the Dhoby Ghaut and City Hall/Bugis centre, as well as Little India. Some improvement points about cleanliness can be raised, however they are not deal breaking and there are no smells coming from the room. Great value for money.
Best to pay 20-50 more for a better enviroment if within budget.

it was barely ok. it was somewhat clean but the body soap is like body+shampoo which is horrible n its in a HAND SOAP DISPENSER….windows also cannot be opened. and it was rly expensive. $200/night during NYE.
We booked for 2 days. We requested for housekeeping while we were out but they never did. So our rooms were messy as we left it.

Well hotel is located near Little India, Bugis and a short 5-7mins train ride to Orchard Road. You will find everything you need around, food, drinks, shopping. Unfortunately, the pool was out of service due to heavy thunderous day and night. Worth the price for 2 pax.

I booked 2 rooms for my family because I have 3 kids for New Year celebration. Although, this is not my first choice hotel but I was hoping the service is good and the facilities are available for the amount that I have paid for, its not worth it for budget hotel. We came here for the pool, but on the day of our check-in the agent told me the pool is not available. I email them in advance about it and the senior agent told me just advice the front desk officer when we do the check-in. Nobody told me or email me in advance that it wasn't available. If I only knew, I cancelled my booking. My kids are disappointed! This hotel is not family friendly, the room so small. The free breakfast is not even a breakfast. The food at the aircraft was better! 2 rooms, suppose to be 4 breakfast but they gave us 2 only. We have to call the frontdesk somemore for it. According to the hotel information the parking is free charge. They have only 2 parking space! My husband parked at the hdb infront and paid per hour! Never again for this hotel. Wasted my money! Not worth it!
Good

The check in time for our booking was 3:00pm. We check in a bit late because we couldnt fine the hotel. Around 4:35 pm yesterday we found the hotel and checked in. This morning at around 11:45am the receptionist called us saying that we need to go down and check out already. I told him that we checked in late yesterday and he said “even though, the check out timing is still 12:00pm”. Then I told him that we are going down even we still have 15mins left. NEVER AGAIN.
It’s just a bad stay. with bad staff attitude. much restriction even though we had abide to the safe distancing measures

Didn't realise the check in time was 3p.m. So we arrived earlier and after waiting for 30 mins manage to check in! Reception staff we're friendly, the card key is not working but the staff manage to update it for me during dinner time. The only thing I have to mention is on the day of checking out, 9a.m., when the cleaner is doing cleaning, he use his card key to open our door while we didn't request for any room service! We're shocked that the person doesn't know that this room is not available yet..... So only for this part maybe the hotel management need to take note...... It is very uncomfortable if things like that happened on female customers......
Bad experience. The room is extremely small and has no view at all(facing another building)!!! Probably the worst hotel I ever lived in. Size of a prison cell

My room was small and dirty. I was averse to staying in the room and went out as much as possible, by roaming around shopping and watching a movie. For doing that the hotel is in a great location, though.

my biggest complaint will be trying to get the staff to make up the room in the morning. 2 days in a row I pressed the make up room button and both occasions no one cleaned the room. Shower screens really need to be cleaned and wiped and as well. Other than that room is generally clean and comfortable.
Hotel staff are helpful. It's value for money, but the room sound proof is not good.
The location near little india mrt and also have a lot of food if ever u want try different food... hotel nice and clean and can go 10th floor for a bit time relaxing like swimming..

the worst hotel I've ever stayed. in one word, dirty. The floor was covered in hair from the previous occupant, there are stains on the sheets, the showerhead was covered in dirt, the table was covered with oil...

My mum was waiting for the COVID swab test results at the hotel. I ordered dinner for her. When the food arrived at the reception, the staff did not have the initiatives to deliver the food to my mum. When I made the phone call, the staff asked me" you want me to deliver the food to her?" I thought hotel staff are supposed to deliver to the customer who are under quarantine.
Great location. Room functional. Clean and quiet.
There is a nice little pool at the roof top. Great scenery. The location was good as it is near Little India and not far from Orchard road. Nice eateries nearby as well.
We love the place...The room is spacious and the toilet is huge compare to others..Plus a great value of money.Very clean and i dont feel itchy at all.Well recommended.
Good place for a simple staycation. Clean and simple.
Clane and nice location
Cleaning team is very noisy early in the morning, disruptig sleep until my husband has to shout for them to stop their loud chitter chatter noise
The counter staff is so friendly n polite

It was a one night stay in this hotel. Staffs were helpful. Room was clean, bed is comfy. Like: comfy bed, fast wifi, great location, powerful aircon. Dislike: It’s not sound proof (not at all) I can hear chit chatting next door and also you can probably guess what the other guests are doing when things dropped, moving things etc. thankfully at night was quiet.
The location was convenient if you're planning on getting public transportation. 5 min walk to the MRT station and the bus stop is right outside. The staff was friendly, the hotel also quite clean.

The rooms maybe small but I expected that already. I stayed here because of the location. It’s near Little India and the MRT station. In front of the hotel is a bus stop and a 7-11. Overall our stay here was pleasant

reviews.review_title: A truly "Budget Hotel" near MRT Station (Little India)”
reviews.review_comment: a) Preis-Leistung: Fair enough by Singapore's standard b) Lage: Bus-stop right in front of the hotel; 10 Minutes walk to MRT Station (Little India) and 20 Minutes to Orchard Rd. c) Sauberkeit: was alright.. (one has to switch "ON" the button for the room services d) Personal: Very friendly and helpful front-desk personals, thumb up! e) Einrichtungen: could be better...

A bit pricy compared to other budget options but great location. There’s a 7-11 and bus stop in front on the hotel. The rooms are very small so I suggest to get the superior rather than the standard for a little more space.

A bit pricy compared to other budget options but great location. There’s a 7-11 and bus stop in front on the hotel. The rooms are very small so I suggest to get the superior rather than the standard for a little more space.
I really enjoyed my holiday in this hotel
Not that worth to stay for the price.

Honestly have an unplanned Singapore overnight stay and have to quickly decide which hotel to stay last minute. Location is awesome, 2 mins walk from Little India MRT, also walking distance to Bencoolen and Rochor MRT. Staff are super nice, room is just what you need if you dont really care for the fancy smancy. Definitely gonna come back again for another singapore trip and will recommend to my friends and family
7 steps walk room. Too small room. No safety deposit. No drawer to keep item Bed is very small, noisy. You could find better hotel in other place. Overall is below expectation for hotel staying.
convenient location with subway

The hotel located near Rochor MRT (about 7-8 min walking distance). The room was clean and tidy but there was little to none sound proofing. I could hear other guests from two rooms away discussing stuffs. I could also hear staffs chatting when they were cleaning other rooms in the morning which was bothersome since we went to sleep late the night before. Other than that, great room conditions and location.

reviews.review_title: Location best but hotel name abit confuse”
reviews.review_comment: Location best, near to mrt only 3minutes walk. But I didn't been inform that hotel name changed to Ibis hotel instead of Fragrance hotel and we walk far away even pass by the hotel. After that, we open google map just realised that the hotel name is Ibis. Bcoz we totally can't find the Fragrance hotel name shown front if the lobby door. Hope this can be improved.
Very good value for money. Clean room & bath room. Staff very friendly. Good wifi network. Close to MRT Little India. To go to the hotel use Exit A.
Small room with basic amenities. Clean, 7 minutes walk to nearest mrt.
Good location and friendly staffs
Room is clean and new. A lot of restaurants nearby.

My booking was cancelled for this hotel and Agoda was so kind to transfer me to J8 hotel. At J8 hotel, my stay was very comfortable and people were very nice and accommodating. It was near the bus stops and a few minutes walk from Lavender MRT station.
I stayed there for 2 nights Friendly staffs and location was pretty good within walking distance u can find everything

reviews.review_title: Little India area, good food and access to transport”
reviews.review_comment: Food courts around, Little India and Newton. Great rooftop pool! Bus stop and train very close. Close to Orchard Road and National Museum. Really good location to get around by walking, bus or train. Expensive but all accomodation in Singapore is - the earlier you book the best price you will get.
The hotel is clean, a room keeper is friendly.. i will come to this hotel again if i go to singapore

Pros: Great location hotel and friendly staff. 711 is just beside the hotel and bus stop is outside the hotel entrance. Walking distance to Little india station. Cons: No bidet, thin walls (you can hear people talking outside the room)
Good location. Water heater doesn't work.
Too expensive, not value for money

reviews.review_title: The room 408 is super clean. Thank you. ”
reviews.review_comment: Nice n peaceful hotel room ha..
This hotel is ok if you go alone. But if you have family like me this hotel is not for you. Room is super small and compact. You still have better options out there in Singapore

reviews.review_title: The 2nd floor unit is w/o window, it is very stuffy, noise and smelly. kettle is oily, not worth $$$”
reviews.review_comment: Due to booking the agoda can't cancellation, we have feedback and top up value move to the level 9th , still smelly, the hotel ventilation is terribly, the whole aisle is very narrow. if the housing keep do the cleaning, you are not even can go through to the lift. It is very bad experience. not worth for the dollars.
when request for iron for my clothing, the hotel is unable to provide on time

reviews.review_title: Basic Hotel Close to Little India MRT & Central Area”
reviews.review_comment: For the price this is an ok budget hotel. Centrally located in Little India close to the MRT. The rooms are modern with a comfortable bed though there is noise from the other rooms. WIFI was good. Check in and out was easy. There is a pool on the top floor.
Staff was not friendly, and we were disturbed by noises in the corridor and road
Thanks Fragrance Hotel Million Holiday Travels & Tours Yangon,Myanmar.

reviews.review_title: Only if you're a really heavy sleeper”
reviews.review_comment: The walls are so thin I could hear the people next door clipping their nails! Did not get a good night's sleep as people were going in and out well past midnight and as early as 6 am. Rooms were not very clean - dusty tissue box, phone had some sticky residue. A/c worked well and wifi was very good. Location was very convenient and price was good. But would think twice to stay here again.

Near to Little India MRT, walking distance to Kwan Inn Temple. Room very clean, beds are comfy & smooth check in/out. Only complaint is no floor map in toilet, reply from receptionist is no more floor map available. No shower curtain in bathroom so bathroom floor is wet after shower and slippery. Please consider safety of your customer
Room is too small. Staff is friendly and helpful. Close to public transport, bus stop in front of the hotel and walking distance to the train station. Free Wifi but slow.
Other is good. Only things is the sound proofing. This need to enhanced.
Good value for money hotel. Friendly staff and good facilities.

The receptionists are very helpful and accommodating. They even helped us find places to go to buy souveniers. The hotel has free wifi. The rooms in 6th flr are big and cozy. You dont hear any noise. Better to get high flr rooms because the hotel is located in front of the main road and bus station so if you are staying on the 2nd flr you would hear the sound of the vehicles. In general, I can say that this is a good pick for travellers who want to go to attractions in SG because it is located in the middle of the city. Easy to book grab too from the hotel.
the room i got is smaller than my closet. staff are very nice and willing to help very close to Chinatown
Friendly staff, good location, clean room. Sufficient for short & budget stay.
Good hotel, helpful staff excellent location. Swimming pool and roof terrace a real bonus. If we use again, we would upgrade from the cabin as they are a little squashed
Good hotel
Good

reviews.review_title: DON'T USE IF YOU WANT TO SLEEP!! you have been warned! ”
reviews.review_comment: Noise in all 3 rooms I used on a 3 night stay you can not sleep it's like water torture!!!
Near City and Little India Mrt, Rochor Mrt
I like that it lived up to my standards when it comes to hotels. Also, staff are amazing and very accommodating. It's really great that it's close to shopping malls
Good location, friendly staff but only one problem that rooms are toooo small.
The location is really good! I missed a small fridge in the room. The room was a little bit small but everything was clean.
Close to Little India Metro Station. Nice staff but there were no available extra pillows. Rooms are small, just enough for one person. Overall stay was great and would still come back.

reviews.review_title: The staff were very helpful from the time we checked in even up to the time our grab picked us up.”
reviews.review_comment: It was a pleasant stay because of your staff who were very accomodating to our requests. They made sure of our convenience even before our check-in time, until our grab driver picked us up. The room was always tidied up whenever we came back for the day's trip. Little note -- where's the bathroom door lock? lol. Overall, we enjoyed our stay. Hoping to be back soon.
Staff need to be kindly and too slow while checking and cleaness must be increases
The hotel is newly renovated and very near to little india mrt station and rochor mrt station.
Room are small, but great location, the staff are very friendly. Can't check in when we reach there at 3pm, however, they offered us free breakfast as compliment after we back at 4pm++.
near mrt station little india exit A ( 5 minute walking distance). 15 minute walking to bugis junction.bus station in front of hotel

reviews.review_title: Awesome !! The hotel is really near with tekka MRT . Easy to travel . The hotel room very clean”
reviews.review_comment: The room very clean and nice . I really like it. I will come to same hotel in future. The staff is very friendly and helpful.
Our stay here was great. Will definitely recommend the place to friends. The employees were very nice and helpful. Thank you.
Economical for a holiday season . New and nice
Recently refurbished. Feel new and clean . Economical stay.
Hotel room is nice and basic

reviews.review_title: Room is smaller than expected but overall good stay”
reviews.review_comment: - Condition of the room: Smaller than expected but simple and clean. - Transport: Near to Little India station, only 3 mins walk away. - Facilities: You have everything you needed except wardrobe, which is fine without it. You have hanger on the wall as alternative. Plenty of switch available in the room, no need to use wire extension. - Service: Staff is friendly and efficient. - Store nearby: There is a 7-11 right outside hotel entrance. Many indian boutiques nearby. If you need to find food at night, there is mamak store behind the hotel.

reviews.review_title: A bit far from Rochor MRT”
reviews.review_comment: The hotel is a bit far from Rochor MRT which is around 15minutes walk under hot weather. And nothing much food around as well. But it is value for money for budget traveller. The decoration of the room is great. There is swimming pool but i dont get time to swim.
Good location, near public transportation like bus and SMRT. Nice staff & clean hotel. Double beb room and toilet are quite small.
Overall the quite nice and clean hotel.

Pros: ✅ location : 3-5 minutes walk to MRT (Little India Station). There’s a bus stop in front of the hotel too. ✅ neighborhood : quiet, with a number of food stalls nearby. Cons: ⭕️ very small room. My husband and I had difficulty moving around the room. It was very small. We cannot even open both of our small luggages at the same time. We also booked for a double room but was given twin room. Saying that there’s no available double room when we checked in. ⭕️very limited TV channels. Nothing interesting on their chosen channels. ⭕️ toilet is very small too. No bidet!! ⭕️staffs were not helpful enough when you need or request something. Good for 1 night stay only, max 2 nights if needed. Recommended for solo travelers only.

Only issue was we ran out of toilet paper twice in 6 days they were replacing the rolls with already started paper so it didn’t last and the last day we went and got our own, other than the TP situation it’s a ideal place to stay
staff look grumpy..the ladies were better. tiny but clean, and the pool is not too small. need to be clean up. the rest is ok

reviews.review_title: Clean/Good location but price too high”
reviews.review_comment: Good location/ Clean The others are simple. The price is too high compared only good location. Price should be usd 60 max
Value for money, you get what you pay for. Overall, comfortable and good stay.

Really friendly and helpful staff, good location that makes it easy to get around the city, but you get what you pay for in Singapore. Small room. Initial problems with the electrics (had to move rooms). Noisy service lift that beeps whenever in use. Its a budget hotel, can't really say anymore.
Very good location. Felt comfortable walking around at all time. Handy 7/11 shop just next door. Hotel can book taxis for you! Staff were lovely.
Tiny room, but it is very close to MRT station. The hotel is new and good for people who only need to sleep and shower.
The soundproofing of the room is really bad. You can hear people talking outside just right outside your room.

hotels.name: Hilton Garden Inn Singapore Serangoon
hotels.address: 3 Belilios Road, Little India, Singapore, Singapore, 219924

reviews.review_title: Perfect location, Friendly staff and Quick response for customer request. ”
reviews.review_comment: Location is quite strategic to go to the famous malls as the malls are just 1 to 2 stops away from Little India MRT Stations. Friendly staffs especially the housekeeping staffs that are genuine and friendly to provide heartwarming services. The only imperfect point for my stay was the centralised air conditioning which disturb my sleep with low and high pitch sounds. I am a light sleeper whom cant sleep well with any sound while the 1st room that I stayed encountered motor failure and gratefully the service team changed another room for me within 30 mins.
The facility and quality of the hotel are excellent. The services from some of the front-desk staff can be improved. The breakfast is good. But some people may not like the neighborhood.
All is good! Except the thin walls and low water pressure.

reviews.review_title: Great location and value for money ”
reviews.review_comment: Love the location and also the room. It was clean and comfy and even has a bidet spray. Also love how its a mere walking distance to eateries. 10/10
very good
very good
Average

reviews.review_title: Great location for food but could be better”
reviews.review_comment: Was complimented with a late checkout after we were told to wait till 430pm for checkin. Checked in to see that we were given a king bed with a connecting door to the room beside. The wall definitely felt pretty thin at night bcus we can hear murmurings and sounds around . The bed sheets felt rough too. Looking at the bright side, the staff were friendly and it was great spot to explore food around the hotel.

reviews.review_title: Facilities is fine but overall stay experience not satisfy”
reviews.review_comment: Facilities look news, but sound isolation is bad. Can hear noise from next room and corridor. Super long check in time even just 5-6 group of ppl. Torqure guest standing one hour for the check in.
Comfy room
clean and comfortable
Standard facilities - nothing to complain. Housekeeping does a neat job - reception could use friendlier people. Check in Check out was quick.
Very Good Location.
Very friendly staff that made the stay better
Everything about this hotel is just wonderful. I am also amazed and thankful for how courteous and helpful the staff are. I would definitely come back again.

reviews.review_title: was disappointed the last day when check out. cause of the front disk staff of talking attitude ”
reviews.review_comment: Was there for my anniversary but at the end of it... ur staff never really check thing out n jus call n talk to me in the very rude manner... n rush me to check out... n never even say sry for that... spoil my mood... a not bad hotel with 4 star had this kind of staff with this attitude... even 5 star also no use
Had a good time and location super
Decent stay, the front desk had pretty long queues during check in and checkout times. car park was slightly troublesome.

Staff were very friendly! Rooms were clean. Our room was on the other side of the building from the temple and was very quiet. Good selection of food for breakfast. Would happily stay here again. Not far to walk to the MRT to get everywhere.

reviews.review_title: Very good tourist hotel nice small rooftop pool area ”
reviews.review_comment: Only a short walk to Little India MRT E exit

One of the best hotel i’ve ever stayed in Singapore. Very clean, tidy and well maintained. Walking distance around 5-600m to Little India MRT. A corner 7-11 is right next door which can quench your daily demands in drink and snacks. Thumb up!

Located right in middle of Little India with typical sights & sounds, a stone's throw away from City and major highways. Room is ok-sized for Singapore hotels and clean. Has a door that leads to car park directly on L4, convenient for those driving.

Overall pleasant stay, rooms are very clean and bright and facilities are fine. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Double bed room felt a bit small, but it is Singapore so it's not too much of a surprise. Placement of shower was a bit awkward as there was no door closing half of the shower.

When the name is Hilton we get carried away, but the truth of the matter is the name is not good enough it is much more required than that. We had our daughter travelling with us & they had given us seperate beds after we had requested for king bed. The experience with the staff also was not upto the mark. First time after booking with agoda we are not happy with the experience

yes the room was a little small. and located in a different wing where we had to walk a little further. but everything else was perfect. room was comfy and clean. extremely cozy. perfect location for us. and everyone was so friendly!

reviews.review_title: HGI Singapore: Unethical customer service in pursuit of ethical policy intentions.”
reviews.review_comment: Both my friend and I are below 21 y/o and we made full payment for a room at HGI via Agoda for NYE staycay. Since HGI’s ad on Agoda did not mention any minimum age requirements for check-in, we perceived HGI as OK. Upon arrival, I was denied checking-in due to the misinformation on Agoda (either one of us had to be at least 21 y/o). Waited for three hours there! I called Agoda, regarding this matter but HGI stood firm on its policy even after Agoda intervened. Later on, HGI CANCELLED my reservation without my acknowledgement. Another appalling thing was that the front desk personnel called Nick, told me that I needed a companion who’s 21 y/o & above to check-in with me and even suggested that I ask a random stranger to check-in with me. The horror! HGI Singapore should do better.
The best hotel in Singapore, think Singapore think Hilton Garden Inn!!!

reviews.review_title: Excellent hotel but away from main tourist spots. Not many European restaurants in area. ”
reviews.review_comment: Good breakfast , comfortable beds. Had to use MRT or Taxis to get around.

reviews.review_title: Next to a very loud temple - Avoid if you want to sleep past 6am in the morning””
reviews.review_comment: this hotel across the street next to the temple which has ceremonial chants/drums/bells every couple of hours or so very noise cant sleep , check in waiting time about 45 min, staff action slow , breakfest not much choose also , i wou;d return to this hotel ...

Not really near to mrt station. Surroundings easy to get food. Mind you. You have a long queue when checking in and checking out. We queued for half an hour. The Chinese guy at the reception attended our checking in and did our registration. He then demanded a $100 deposit for one night stay! We already prepaid our room in full. He told us that you have to pay your deposit or you will be not get your room access cards. We told him we have not enough cash at that moment and we dont have a credit card. If a debit card, it will take some time to refund back. He told us to draw cash at any atms nearby. So, we did. Then, when we came back with the cash, we saw a very long line of queue at the reception. We approached him and he told us to queue again. And we waited in line for more than half an hour. For goodness sake! You already registered us earlier ago and we have to re-queue.?! So much hassle in the checking in process! Then, we have to wait again for our room.
Very clean hotel with friendly and helpful staff also very polite, breakfast was excellent.

Was shocked coz i had to pay $100 for accidental purposes. I can understand if thats the rule but the way she asked it was nt appropriate. She was also not helpful and expectes us to have $100 cash with us. We dont mind paying but i think better customer service should be given to us.

reviews.review_title: Facility is good but the location is not really good ”
reviews.review_comment: Facility is great and the room is cozy (personally feel quite small). However the location has a little bit of issue. It is too close to India town and for the foreigner's perspectives it was not really pleasure to face it. All Indian restaurants and shops only.
This hotel is new and so has comfort bed . 7 eleven just beside the hotel . And it is convenient to travel to all the attractions

reviews.review_title: Nice comfort hotel with strategic location ”
reviews.review_comment: This hotel is new and so has comfort bed . 7 eleven just beside the hotel . And it is convenient to travel to all the attractions

reviews.review_title: Would hv loved to stay in htl that the staff values guest”
reviews.review_comment: Location is reasonable, middle of little india so predominantly indian guest. refurbed htl. However, very basic hotel, small rooms, dont really care kind of staffs, no mgmt presence, if u book thru agoda , u will be last in queue even to get a room. Will not stay in this htl or brand again
Bring your headphone to have a good sleep at the weekend. Temple is behind the hotel.
Excellent but hard to find place for booking, after three days I have to select another hotel for my family to came and join me

The Hilton Garden Inn is a standard hotel located withing a two minute walk of the Little India MRT and is in near proximity to the Mustafa Centre. The staff is very helpful and attentive to your needs. The pool is not the largest and is awkwardly located outside the windows of the restaurant. Other than this I have no issues with the hotel. It was our second time staying at this property and would not hesitate to stay again.

We loved our stay at the Hilton Garden Inn. We loved how close the hotel was to the city center! Great service let us check in early and made sure we had our grab and go breakfast even leaving the hotel around 4:30am.

Pros: walking distance to MRT, minimart besides the hotel, clean, breakfast ok even there’s not much to choose, city view room I recommend, nice staffs (especially in breakfast) Cons: I have to pay fot the internet connection
I didn't know it was located in Little India district. For Indian visitors, it may be best choice, I think. But almost everything was great.

reviews.review_title: Excellent Staff, Great Clean Hotel, Excellent Location”
reviews.review_comment: My experience with Hilton Garden Inn was excellent. From check-in to check-out, everything was smooth and we were served with a smile always. We had Issam at check-in, after a night flight, we were pretty exhausted and would like to check-in as quick as possible. Issam ensured that we had a smooth check-in. He also gave us tips on where to get a good local breakfast and the best place to get local currency. The room was spacious enough for a couple. The bed was amazingly comfortable. Location wise, it is perfect to experience the local culture. Surrounded by plenty of delicious food stalls. The staff was always very attentive to your needs. Kudos to Isa, Issam, Fithri and the Hilton Garden Inn Team. HIghly Recommended and definitely will be back.

I stayed at the hotel for a few days and was generally very pleased. My room was lovely, it was immaculately clean and the staff were all lovely. I had an issue with the curtains when I checked in and a technician arrived to sort it within about 10 mins - excellent service. The only one issue was that I had requested a quiet room; I appreciate it's not always possible to accommodate these requests, but my room was in the Serangoon Tower, right at the end so virtually backed on to the very busy, often noisy main road. Definitely not a quiet room but overall I still enjoyed my stay.

We stayed here for 4 days at the end of November 2019. The rooms were a good size and extremely clean. The staff were friendly and helpful. A special thank you to house keeping lady Marga (I think she’s Malaysian) she is an absolute asset to the hotel. Very friendly and a great ambassador to the Hilton brand. Also Nicholas at the front desk was also very helpful to us when our son was sick. A great place to stay and great value for money.

That´ s Singapore, so not super large rooms but well equiped and very, very clean. Nice staff, very friendly. 15-20mins walk to Bugis junction. 7-11 store near main entrance. A lot of indian shops around.
Walking distance MRT station and it located in little india. Room was spacious and completed with facilities. Breakfast was superb.

Great hotel! Location of the hotel is behind the Hindu temple. didn’t like the fact the temple prayers started so early ... 7am and it was really loud, you can hear everything right in our room. It was annoying especially if you wanted to sleep a bit more. Besides that it was great.
Good central place to stay with plenty of shops and restaurants all well priced Hotel clean tidy good breakfast helpful staff. Will stay again
Everything was perfect

reviews.review_title: Did not meet our expectations for a 4 star hotel”
reviews.review_comment: This was an okay hotel. Nothing stood out. We did not really use the facilities available at the hotel, outside of refilling our water bottles at the gym. The rooms were on the smaller side with a noisy drain and AC (which could not be turned off). Toiletries were nice and staff was very friendly.
the location is located at little india, surruding by indian restaurants and 10mins walking to subaway station

reviews.review_title: Excellent service in an interesting location. Helpful and friendly staff.”
reviews.review_comment: Facilities were clean. Fantastic breakfast buffet.
Pleasant stay from the minute check in to check out. All staff are very dedicated friendly. Parking is an added plus point. Keep up Hilton to your name.

As the hotel is not facing the main road, it's rather hard to access to public transport, even you can't get a pick up from the Grab App after many attempts. Taxi is only accessible through booking in advance.
The rooms were not cleaned properly and could notice the work is half done.
i enjoyed my stay here.. just what i was looking for
For some taxi drivers hard to find - hotel is behind the hindu temple. Very clean room, fit just enough. Small pool. Simple breakfast but still enough choices. Overall great stay in very clean room.
The hotel is very nice, clean and comfortable. It was a nice stay. We only think that for the price of the room, the breakfast could be included.

Very close to Little India MRT Station, exit E. Lots of Indian restaurants around the area and has a tiny 7-11 at right outside the hotel. Spacious toilet but the water pressure is quite low. Pillow is too soft and difficult to adjust the temperature of the air con (feel cold even at 25 degree). Take note that some of the windows may be frosted because the rooms are facing Istana (due to government regulation).

reviews.review_title: Your hotel reception staffs are very rude to handle the guest..Even duty manager also.”
reviews.review_comment: Our booking is not included breakfast.but some of group guest went to had breakfast and they ready to pay. And i enquire about bill manager said 8pax only..the next day he said 19pax.i was shocked..he gave us a wrong quote.and never ask for appologise.
First, I was given a twin room with a pair of ladies' shoes. Then moved to a king room with a dead cocroach.

Service was great, heard from previous reviews mentioned that their service is not good but I did not experience that. Everything was good, location is perfect. we did not stay at the wing which close to the temple so we couldn't comment about the noise. Room is extremely clean and we totally love it.
A very good hotel in an excellent location. Little India is a wonderful place to explore and enjoy the food delights.
Great

reviews.review_title: Location next to Temple creates a lot of noise”
reviews.review_comment: The facility of this hotel is fine. However, the hotel also has a building across the street next to the temple which has ceremonial chants/drums/bells every couple of hours or so. I remember not being able to nap because of the noise and the noise starts again very early around 6AM. I would not return to this hotel because of this. If you happen to choose this hotel because the location is OK and you're right in the heart of Little India, stay in the main building.
The hotel is nice and elegant, close to MRT, receptionists are friendly and helpful. :)
Clean and centrally located in Little India. Near to many Indian restaurants. Hotel staff is good and room is clean.

I so love the hotel. All the staffs are friendly and accommodating. They have a clean, cozy room. The beds are so comfy, you can really sleep well after a long day touring around Singapore. The location is the bomb because it was near Little India station, near Tekka Centre (where you can eat cheap but delish food). If you are shopaholic and you want the best money exchange rate the hotel is nearby Mustafa Centre.
The room is well furnished. It is clean. The staff are helpful.

The hotel was very clean , the staff were excellent , the pool was nice. For a Hilton Hotel this isn’t up to scratch after we checked in we had to carry bags to our room (not the staffs fault just not enough off them). And the breakfast was ordinary to say the least, l,m sorry I had to mention these negative points but it’s really what I think.

Nice comfortable bed Great location in little India Nice reception staff Unfortunate busy and wasn’t able to get early check in when I arrived Also no porter service so had to carry heavy luggage on my own
This hotel is located in Little India and is surrounded by Indian jewelry shops, souvenir shops and restaurants.

reviews.review_title: Short stay ay Hilton Garden Hotel”
reviews.review_comment: Lovely spacious and clean room. Brilliant friendly staff.
Hotel was lovely, clean and great gym. Location for food not so good however close to train stations and only 2-5 mins from foods.
Nice experience

reviews.review_title: Great stay with perfect location near metroline”
reviews.review_comment: Room is convy and enough space. Nice shower. Nice view and no city noice. Slept vert good on the large good beds
The bed was awesome, only that the pillows were too soft for my liking.
Very nice rooms, excellent service by housekeeping, check-in was tedious and could have been pleasant. check out was very efficient and warm.

reviews.review_title: Clean rooms with very good breakfast ”
reviews.review_comment: We stayed here for 4 nights. The rooms are lil bit small for the amount of money we paid but clean, well maintained. The breakfast was really good. Live omelette and Indian dishes as well.

reviews.review_title: It's a really nice hotel. I like the big windows especially when the sun shines in, in the morning. ”
reviews.review_comment: Nil
very clean and good staffs

reviews.review_title: Technically the best hotel in Little India!”
reviews.review_comment: Travelled to Singapore for leisure and business, and stayed 3 nights here. Absolutely love the service. Extremely friendly staff, especially the Front Office Manager, Riki, is absolutely a gem. Also, quality rooms, quality bedding and bath amenities are nice too. The lady who did the housekeeping should be rewarded. Further, the location is very convenient. Not in the busy centre of little india, and only 2 mins walk to MRT. 5 mins walk to Mustafa center and so many food options around the hotel. The best thing is, this hotel got a 7-11. So you are saved even you forgot something in the middle of the night. Definitely, this will be my stay in Singapore if I needed to stay somewhere close to little india.

Wonderful stay with Hilton. Hotel is located in a place surrounded by plenty of Indian restaurant and typically it is in Little India. Right hotel for people to stay from India. Will never miss the Indian traditional environment !!!
run a touch on the budget side but still maintained high standards breakfast was a treat all you could want and more hats off to this hotel

reviews.review_title: Best Hotel in Singapore till date ”
reviews.review_comment: I have stayed in Many Hotel, Hilton is one of the best in this price range, Need to improve area of Breakfast as well as food.
It was ok property to stay and go around location is good as it is close to metro and market. expectation was to see grand place which didn't happened.
Worth stay
Nice view from high floor room Nice toilet/room interior Good customer service crews/receptionists
Hotel is located in a very good location Near to all important places Maxiumum taxi fare is 15 dollars. From airport 20 minutes drive Hotels are walkable distance Central located

We loved the location. Rooms were clean and nice, didn't enjoy bathroom and shower facilities. When showered, water was all over the floor made us very uncomfortable. Half of side of the shower has glass and rest is open. Easily water flies over the floor. Could have been avoided if they put at least a shower curtain. When I asked them they answered that's all they have without any apologies. No space in bathroom for toiletries. It was not as comfortable as we expected. Staffs are not welcoming at all. No smile, no greetings at any point of time. Life Less hotel lobby.

Pros: staff were friendly and their buffet was pretty good Cons: Room service menu is very expensive and the food was below average. I ordered a cheese naan and they gave me a naan which had kraft cheese slices melted on top of it! There was no effort or skill put into it. In lieu they gave me a cheesecake and still charged me for the naan. The area was pretty poor. I wouldn’t stay there again

The location is great, less than 5 min from the train station, the staff is super friendly and helpful, but oh my god the property itself is super Disgusting, creepy and filthy. Hilton is a big name I am also a member of this chain of hotels , I stayed in many property of Hilton and trust me they have nice hotel with pleasant stay, but oh my god this hotel seems like it must be a old hotel which they may have renovated but the rooms , floors, are so dirty, the over all look is great when you walk in you will say nice, but oh my god the toilet have stains and the floor are dirty with black marks, we complain about this and staff member show us 3 different rooms and guess what it was hard to pick which one is more dirty, one room have spiders in it and the shower was leaking, the staff have no words, we were luck we only have 2 nights otherwise I would have asked for return . I will never ever stay in this hotel . sorry Hilton I never leave negative comment but I hope you will listen.

reviews.review_title: Next to a very loud temple - Avoid if you want to sleep past 6am in the morning”
reviews.review_comment: First impressions were good aside from a dirty bathroom and not being able to connect to the hotel wifi. Hotel room was clean, spacious and had a good view but not so good for privacy - I think the flats next door could watch me getting changed. Had a good nights sleep until 6am in the morning when the c*nts next door started banging drums and singing at 6am. This noise continued for 10 mins, stopped for 50 mins and started again at 7am. Thankfully I only stayed for 3 nights but given that I was feeling jet-laggy and wanted a decent sleep. The location of the hilton hotel is terrible and based on that would avoid at all costs.
The front desk staff was quite helpful, unfortunately we did't have a single bed as we requested before
Breakfast - very poor

My stay in Hilton Garden Inn was very enjoyable. It's located only 300 m from Little India MRT (Exit E - it's closer to the Property). I am amazed how the Hotel is always kept clean! The room is quite spacious (for Singapore size), very very clean, and the bed is so comfortable. I consider it a gem as the price is very affordable. I don't mind paying a few dollar more to get this kind of property. I will surely stay in this hotel again for my next visit to Singapore.

The place was clean and exceeded my expectations that was set. It was also great value for money and close to public transport. 10/10 would return to the hotel when I am back in Singapore. Thank you all for the pleasant experience.
Nice hotel to stay, but the soundproof can be better.

hotels.name: Furama City Centre Hotel (SG Clean Certified)
hotels.address: 60 Eu Tong Sen Street, Chinatown, Singapore, Singapore, 059804

reviews.review_title: Nice staying, but can have improvements ”
reviews.review_comment: It’s nice staying for us, even we have a bit worrying as saw a lot of bad reviews. The hotel looks ever 4 stars accommodations just no maintenance and service drops now. The TV cannot be play and called to reception, they told me will send technician but the end no and keep quietly :(
The hotel is not clean enough and I see a lizard in my room behind the TV. The staff is helpful and happy to serve.
This place is unbelievably dirty.
tiolet is moldy

I think the hotel is overdue for renovation. The toilet is old. the electrical plug is falling out and the bathroom door has wrapped that you can't close it... there is more to list but I think you get my idea. The staff is helpful and friendly tho. It's the hardware that needs to be updated. I'm sure it must be a great hotel back in the day.

Value for money - one of the cheapest hotels for a family staycation. The location near an MRT station allowed us to travel without driving out. The rooms are spacious enough but the TVs may not be working. The tap hot/cold water function may not be working. It was not easy for young kids to wait 2.5 hours to check in on a weekend. This could be improved. The staff was nice about it but the service level could be better improved on weekends. Note that there will be no housekeeping services during your stay unless you are planning to stay for more than 3 nights.
good location, and value for money
My check in was too long though there were only 1 guest in front of me.
Good to have a nice and beautiful staycation
Value for Money
Everything is good. I’ve stayed in this hotel numerous times. Staffs are friendly and helpful 😊

Very bad reception. No one to respond call after 6pm. Poor service as well at reception counter. Outlook of hotel seem nice but internally needs lots of improvement. Pillows are flatten, bathing towers old and tear. Howerver, compliments given to all elderly staffs at luggage concierge, and housekeeping/cleaning staffs, verg courtesy, helpful and commited to their work.

everything of the hotel so far so good, just that the wifi in the room is really slow, cant get anything done. For business traveller, I will expect to have high speed connection. Overall is still a good hotel
The best location central to the city .. mrt down stairs good food nearby
The staffs are very helpful, always a service with a smile.

Hotel is in a great location in Chinatown and walking distance to Raffles Place, City Hall and Orchard Road. Room finishes needs a bit more maintenance but otherwise a comfortable stay. There was only 1 room service done throughout my 6 day stay but it wasn't a problem for me. At the price I was paying, it was value for money
Swimming have very limited slots

reviews.review_title: Cheap but not worth your money”
reviews.review_comment: Pipes in the toilets are leaking. They have a 3 -day cleaning policy meaning you can only request for cleaning if your stay is for 4 days. They will only clean after Day 3. If your stay is lesser than that, you have to do it yourself!
I bring my 2 childs went this hotel for 2 days. end up fully taken slot for the swimming pool . They should updated they're service.

We did not even manage to use the pool, and when we call customer service saying we could not get a slot for the pool, the staff said " Too bad". LoL, i cant believe i just stayed at a hotel in Singapore! Hotels outside of Singapore provide better service
A very busy hotel with excellent location, large room for this price compared to the other newer hotels. Clean despite being a home quarantine hotel.

1st time staying in Deluxe Room as all the bigger rooms were fully booked. Pleasantly surprised that the Deluxe room is also spacious and well maintained with a bath tub, a big comfortable bed and a nice couch. Very relaxing and peaceful. Sadly, for once, I could not use the pool as it was fully booked. Room rate is much higher than normal this time as it was the school holidays but still worthwhile as I like the friendly staff, the good location and the big floor areas of the clean and comfortable rooms. Thanks to all the nice staff members who attended to me during my stay there.
Overall everything was good. But toilet part is meh! There is no bidet spray and the toilet smell of smoke like someone was smoking in the toilet.
I love how the hotel is located at the center of coffee shops, eateries and mall. The room isn’t 100% clean but is very conducive for a 2 night stay. I stayed for work and the Internet is very fast.
Nice hotel
Very nice view and big room, comfortable stay!
Clean with good food
Don't go on holiday season..the queue is very long plus waiting time for keycard will exhaust you
Room is big, view is stunning but kitchen area is quite oily and not that clean. Can improve in this area.

We stayed in room 2011. - Room interior furnishing desperately needs overall uplift including carpet steam clean. - Room has this strong musty odour which suggest that there's mold growing in the building. We noticed the odour is everywhere in the buiding. - Power points are not universal sockets so we had to buy an adaptor. - Daily buffet breakfast menu is dull - this too needs an uplift. Hotel is understaffed particularly during staycation period. Do expect longer queue to be serve. - Hotel vibe gave this somber mood to us + Room view was great 'City View' + Lifts were quite fast + Club lounge access is 6pm-8pm and all day refreshments are available + Most staff were friendly but some lack customer interaction experience + Hotel location is central to most tourist spots. We mainly walked to places like Chinatown Street Market, Peoples Park, Maxwell Food Centre, Clarke Quay, Bugis Street/ Bugis Junction, Lau Pa Sat hawker centre, Hajii land and Arab lane.

Positive: 1) Good Location as it's very close to Chinatown area. 2) Room size is good. 3) The restaurant inside the hotel-- the staff's team spirit was very evident. We were there on CNY eve n the staff looked like all are involved in serving. Negative: 1)We asked abt interconnecting / adjoining room and was told by check-in counter staff we need to.pay for to secure one. First time heard of the need to pay extra for adjoining room. 2) Our dad's room (if remember correctly is 6022), the floor carpet at the edge of the bathroom, has 2 or 3 stapler pins sharp ends. Informed but understandably nt rectified immediately, but shld at least put something ontop of the sharps. 3) The same room internet (the router) was real bad affect the ability to watch TV programmes. 4) The same room the bathroom shower tap not user friendly. Different from the room i was given which on comparison, appeared to hve been changed or uograded.
Hotel room is spacious with bathtub,i enjoyed staying at the hotel with my friend.. we also tried their food. Pool is clean and not crowded.Thank you for accomodating is.

I have requested for a chair as me & partner r having dinner in e room. 1st request waa at ciunter frint & the guy agreed that e cheair will send to the room in short while. But after waiting fir more than 30mins, i made a trip diwn to coubter again since no one answering my call. Tgis time round, they told me request has been send to house keepibg, if they have an extra chair, then they would send to me. If i dont get it, mean hotel diesnt have any chair to spare for me A very disappointing trip, doesnt worth the value

reviews.review_title: Staff were rude & room was old”
reviews.review_comment: During checking in...the staff was not helpful & very rude.The room that was booked were not available,2 x single bed was given and were told to push the bed by ourself...after complaining,room was upgraded to family rm.was really upset...1st time treated this way during my staycay.
Slow check in around 2 hours to wait so sad waste of time
Really bad Wifi - unexpected in a Singapore and that too in a business-centric hotel

I waited long time to check in, the room given was not gd, dusty, the wardobe, dressing table look bad not furnished, the side chips came off. I requested from duty manager liza to change, she was not friendly at all. When told abt room condition she said its not her department. Very rude infact. She gv me another room, even tht one the toilet door could not close properly. Looks like the hotel is not maintained properly.overall not gd impression of the hotel and staffs,

Sorry i accidentally press No earlier on where actually i would recommend to have a staycay here because everything were good for me. These was my third time staycation in this hotel, it was superb! Love it!
Free upgrade of room! The view was fantastic, super worth the price paid for.
hotel is very accessible to mall ,eateries and transportion.. Room has a nice view.. Checkin process is smooth and the room is clean and spacious..
Walking distance to clerk Quay. Easy get foods at the area
Located within MRT walking distant n cbd...Lots of culinary with local traditional n international gourmet...

reviews.review_title: Value for money with excellent location ”
reviews.review_comment: The front desk staff and duty manager izuh was professional and friendly. The housekeeping team was great and friendly as well.
very helpful staff,spacious room,could do with more tv programmes

The front desk staff, izuh and her team was friendly and very professional helping us to check-in despite the long queue. The housekeeping staff was very polite and friendly as well. The only issue that I faced was a bathtub that will leak. Other than that the whole stay was great.

But small pool and not city view. Not same advertised in pictures. Tv is small always having issue. Advised to use smart tv. Or maybe better tv box. Tv box hangs. Also run you tube also quite difficult from the tv box. Its opening from browser and not the app. Room is bigger and better city view and with bathtub. Value for money. But there are few cons. Choose wisely
Wifi in room is poor No tv program provided , wires all over old hotel not satisfied with room . Esp the entrance of room as kitchen .odor of room Staff are dissatisfied with hotel management

- the whole level smelt like cigarette smoke, cigarette smoke was strong most of the time in the bathroom, the exhaust fan did not work, spoke to the staff multiple times and they said they will talk to someone about it but nothing happened. - wifi continually drops out and struggles to load webpages it is working. - tv programs, Netflix, YouTube and everything else on the tv continually dropped out making it hard to watch anything. - close to train station
Bad smell in the room. Too many restrictions. No service. We won’t come back
This room is like hotel 81 room.
Hotel is nearby to MRT stations. There are a lot of shopping malls & in fact Chinatown lane are very easy assessible.
First check in, toilet cannot function, change another room, shower shampoo empty did not top up.
Highly recommend this place if you want a comfortable place to stay but not too expensive and you don’t require much facilities.

The room is so dusting and broken glass on the carpet never vacuum at all. My hubby injured his leg and the TV was spoil ! I remember last time l stay was clean and excellent. But now how come? I hope you will improve next time. Thks

reviews.review_title: Very bad service and old, not well maintained at all ”
reviews.review_comment: 1)we reached the hotel at 2pm to check in and was shocked to see a long queue at the reception, it only got to our turn at 4+ plus and we were told that there’s a shortage of rooms, and they wanted to offer us a suite and brought us up to see. The first suite we viewed reeks of smoke smell , and there was only 1 double bed when I have 4 persons, and they suggested to put two single beds into the room. I’ve paid for two rooms and two bathrooms , and they were trying to just up sell us one room?! We rejected the suite and went to check out a normal room 2) so we settled for a normal room but was told that we have to wait for the other room which would be ready by 5 or 530pm. But in e end there was still no call by 630- we had to head down to the reception to ask for the status, and we were still shocked to see that the check in queue was still long, unbelievable 3) state of the room was also old, the shower head holder came out of the wall, the second room that we were given- the tv was not working , and there’s an ancient DVD player- we called the front desk but no one picked up. We wanted to ask for bottled water too- but no one picked up the calls- we called in intervals of 10-15mins , and so we went down to the reception once again- and the staff told us that the lines could be engaged. But the fact was we called multiple times, it’s just not right that someone is actually at the reception, but he’s not picking up the phone. Even a two stars hotel will pick up phone calls no matter what , and that we have to head down just to ask for water Overall, it’s really an unpleasure stay and we will never come back again .

Everything is ok. But I don't know whether is it only for my room 0714,when only turn on cold water ,the water becomes very hot constantly.hence not able to take shower Have a lot of choice of food from nearby hawker. Buffet is worth the price

Location is fine but we had to stay till almost 8pm ( CNY period ) to get our room because as told by the staff rooms are not ready. Rooms are not cleaned properly as well. 👎🏼 Later then staff offered late check or breakfast
We have been upgraded to a room with singapore flyers view, breakfast was good and room is clean.
Within walking distance to hawker centers, and 5 minutes walk to Chinatown MRT station.
Ms.Eliza as front counter provide a friendly services. Thankfully we have a nice room
Within 5 minutes walk to Chinatown MRT station. Labor shortage, housekeeping was scheduled once every 3 days. Guests left bags of garbage (mainly takeaway food containers packaging) in the hallway.

Took a break in this CNY celebrations. Deluxe room is spacious enough & very clean. All amenities, drinking corner & bottle water replenish were above my expectations. Only the safe is bit complicated to use. Oh.....took a bit times on checking in hotel, it was bit slow. By the way, the buffet eve dinner at Tiffany Cafe was fantastic, value for $, it's awesome except the queue too slow......in fact, don't see safety distance!
Good location! Had some trouble getting services as staff seems to be too busy. Housekeeping isn’t everyday. Good view tho and very accessible everywhere.

the hotel is too pricey and the images on the said hotel is not what we expected. the room needs renovation the aircon is too loud and the bath tub is slippery , the television is not working properly, we cant watch netflix nor youtube. the operator is not answering the call , the front desk staff is not accomodating and if i can give negative star i will do
Gd

Had an enjoyable and delightful stay here. Many thanks for upgrade to spacious and comfortable suite. Only hitch was the TV in the room was not functioning despite reporting the fault twice. Otherwise, I had a great staycation here to do my CNY shopping at Chinatown as well. Thanks to all at Furama City Centre who attended to me. Gong Hei Fatt Choy!

The food was nice and cheap when i ordered inroom dining. Worth the price. Was given a birthday cake on my birthday. The room is huge and love the bathroom. The breakfast buffet was okay. The executive lounge staff was friendly and the food was great. Will come again.
Very comfortable
Staff tried to fAsten the check in process even though there was crowded. Got free upgrade to executive room and view was unexpectedly great . Overall experience was good

reviews.review_title: It's a non 4 stars Hotel as claimed.”
reviews.review_comment: TV in rooms too small. Called room svc no one answered. Room cleaning never done. Hot water not constant during shower. Reported also can't do anything.
The TV was not working during my stay, other than that, it was a pleasant experience
Water for bathing super low flow.. take ages to bath.. mosquito in the room even tho we clear food outside the room.. location and spacious tho
Strategically located. Spacious room and fully carpeted. Staff was warm and friendly. TV connections could be improved.
Hotel is dated with older facilities and look. Overall worth the price. Rooms are spacious.
the hotel is slightly run down. they definitely need to upgrade the wifi and TV. Location is prefect, so near to attractions.

Got stuck in the lift with my young childen for half an hour, thanks for the lif maintenance, did a great job to save us. Its old hotel and yet not a wheelchair friendly? I guess. So.. Overall was Great. Family Room was superb. Good Halal Food. Breakfast and dinner is served. If you have big car, might be problem for parking because Its too cramp, small and narrow unless you’re a skill driver. 😅

Value for money. However room feels abit dated albeit spacious. The bathtub and toilet is clean. However had some issue with the hot/cold water for the shower. There wasnt any cold water for that room. Bathtub water temp was fine. Not much channels on tv. Powerpoint for tv was not working, had to change to another powerpoint to make it work. Bed and pillows were nice.
choice of buffet dinner not that good. most of the hot dishes are spicy and not suitable for my toddler. The aunty staff knew that and cook a non spicy pasta for my son.

Made a booking with the hotel for 14 Jan. One of the check-in staff, an Indian lady took notice of the birthday comment. She even personally delivery the birthday cake. Thank you so much for paying attention at the small details! :) Didn’t actually use the facilities, but everything else was a breeze

TV was not working , air cond is not too good, pillow is old and too soft, breakfast sucks with very limited choices and they serve mee rebus with noodles and gravy ( no shredded chicken , eggs , nuts or even simple egg )
The experience is excellent! Recommended for all!
Good
Nice view at night time

The air conditioner is centralised like all good hotels. But, the temperature control SHOULD ALLOW adjusting of room temperature instead of PRE-SET MODE ONLY!👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼👎🏼. The temperature was pre-set to a Low of 21.5 degrees Celsius. It was freezing cold during the night!
Hotel was old, the heater wasn’t working. The tv speaker isn’t working.

The netflix has some issues, so called the operator and they sent their technician to check. Upon arrival, technician ask us to wear mask as if he was scolding. Aircon is not too strong too. Lowest temp but still not as cold as normal aircons.
I got it for below 150 sgd per night. Worth it.

Overall the experience staying in the hotel is pleasant. Here are some of the feedback. The hotel furniture looks a bit old. Maybe it’s time for a refresh Notice that there seems to be lack of manpower for service staff. We need to wait for at least 15 to 20 mins to check in to our room. The last point is the we notice a strange whirring sound which sounded like a heavy traffic along an expressway. The sound apprears like every 10 to 15 minutes. A bit of distracting for those light sleepers. Later we realise it is The Central aircon sound. We stay on level 18 Regards Mr Li

I stayed in the hotel for two days fro 14 Dec. It was almost impossible to get answered by the hotel. The person who assisted me for the check in did not show any sign of willingness to accommodate the request. On the second day there was no housekeeping even after requesting for it. They did not even provide the daily share of water. The lady dressed like a manager in the restaurant was very rude on the busier day of my stay. For an instance when a customer approched her for the tissue she just replied buffet closed. I have never seen anyone replying that way in a reputed hotel. Very unprofessional by all means. I would recommend the hotel if you are looking for a cheap 4 star one and don't care about the service. Because there is no service at all.

reviews.review_title: Staycation with kids aged 10 yrs old”
reviews.review_comment: Everything is good except that we are unable to use the swimming pool for 3 days staycation due to fully booked during the day we checked in, a bit of disappointed
the room water heater spoils water too hot.

We booked for staycation for the swimming pool n all but it say fully booked only 5pax perday. What nonsense.. the building is like 23 storey n only 5pax can swim? Other hotels have no problems with the seimming pool though have restrictions

The rooms were so dusty, and it made my itch skin the entire time, even after changing bedsheets. I think on that note, it made the entire stay quite miserable. Other room toilet smells (smoking) entered our toilet. Some staff were friendly, but others were not very professional.

The hotel is considered quite classic. It was well known since my younger days. But now with all new buildings and hotels around, it becomes less popular. Nevertheless, the staffs really work hard to maintain provide good services and overall cleanliness. It is really located near to Chinatown and CBD. The rooms are consider big, spacious, large beds and comes with bathtubs and separate showers. My suggestions to hotel management are to refurbish the hotel's lobby, hall rooms, rooms and amenities with new upgrades as well as vibrant colours. The entertainment systems also need to be upgraded, up to date with current technology.
The hotel have really great staffs!!!
Staffs really friendly and great service when you need help....
Aircon Was cold, the city view was great staff were friendly and helpful. Tv could play YouTube.

reviews.review_title: Dont expect to use the facilities & delayed check in”
reviews.review_comment: Swimming pool booking slot is always full but you cant see anyone swimming. I requested the staff to look into it they said people book so they cant do anything about it even if they don't show up. I also came in early (11am) to pre register. I only get a room at 6pm. They mentioned the room is not cleaned yet so i need to wait indefinitely as they no idea what time the housekeeping will be done & waiting is the only option.
Loved the bathtub, room was just sufficient and clean. High floor gave a great view of the city.

reviews.review_title: Don't book this hotel u will regret”
reviews.review_comment: Don't book this hotel,long waiting time during check in,service very bad,swimming pool is tiny,old hotel

hotels.name: Hotel Chancellor@Orchard
hotels.address: 28 Cavenagh Road, Orchard, Singapore, Singapore, 229635

reviews.review_comment: Convenient location for downtown hang out. Rooms are with reasonable size for the price.
No channels.
Nice room, cleaniness good, staff polite and good service. Location fantastic...well worth the money.
I stayed for 6 nights, but the room key didn't respond well and I had a lot of trouble getting in and out of the elevator and the room. I consulted with the receptionist once, but it didn't improve.
Cant expect much for its price , Overall good stay.

This hotel is a bit old but the location is superb for the value if you need to do business around Orchard. Need to upgrade the cleanliness especially the bathroom (some yellow stain on the wall) and also on the bed cover which a little bit yellowish. Should provide more hangers in the closet only 2 hangers? It has a very good size Swimming pool which very helpful after a busy hot day.
If you like quiet environment.this will be good for you.

reviews.review_title: Hidden gem a stone throw away from Somerset MRT”
reviews.review_comment: Very close to Orchard road and Somerset MRT. My room overlooked the expressway and the Istana, which was an amazing view to wake up to every morning. Could hardly hear the traffic at all. The room itself looked partially refurbished, but otherwise very comfortable and well-sized (for a city hotel). I enjoyed the hot water machine, much better than the standard kettle supplied in hotel rooms. Hotel wifi was stable and fast, but unsecured. This is not big issue unless you are concerned about cybersecurity over an unsecured network (e.g. banking). Each room does come with a secured network (password-protected), but it was down during my stay and took 4 days to set up, hopefully this has been rolled out for all the rooms by now. Hotel staff were helpful and supportive through my stay, the manager understood my concerns and personally ensured my request was resolved. Would definitely consider staying again.
The hotel is very old and all the rooms have an old smell, old furniture and a cabinet for storing your clothing all have an old smell. I did not enjoy my stay.
Front desk bit harsh. Not reply properly

Good but don't expect too much for the price. Check-in is slow. Queue is long but there are ppl walking ard at counter not willing to open more counters. Got a room with 2 single beds when requested for double. Tell us can merge the beds ourself.. but later realized not possible also. Tv remote not working. Corridor got a v.strong stench in the morning.
it a nice hotel and comfortable. if u dont mind it look old and need littlee brush up. if you re not fussy i recommended it. good for short stay which nearby to shop and sight see city
Height is too high for a short person like me (165cm) Slipped and fall and had a really bad bruise
1. Took 2 hours waiting time for check in - long queue and very slow staffs 2. The lady filipino receptionist was very unfriendly when we ask about the pool reservation.

Room not cleaned. Amenities just dumped in a bag and dumped on the floor corner of the room! Staff were not helpful. 2 beds but only gave 1 pillow and i blanket. When asked for extra, another set came without covers! Called and asked again, the only thing dey can say is they will check. But nothing happened. Wanted to book for pool. Were told at reception to call "0" from the room. Called "0" from the room, was told to go down reception!!

We were greated by super long Queue at the reception which leads us to a Q even out of hotel which we were fine since its the start of a holiday. After a 45mins Q, someone started distributing Q number and moving us to 2nd level to sit and wait. After waiting another 30min our number was called and we were made to go back down to reception and resumed our Q. Since our Q no was on a bigger number, we had to wait for the front to be cleared. We asked a staff why we were shifted up and down and still in a Q. He rumbled and was angrily blaming his chairman for reducing the room rate that causes the overbooking. Over at the check in counter, we saw 3 struggling front desk staff with super long chcek in procedures that also contributed to the not moving Q. When our turn, we were welcomed by a stressed looking gentleman who told us they are left with only single rooms. We offered to wait for housekeepers have not finish cleaning the room so we can get what we booked for

Waste 45min waiting for the check in. Even check out also need to Q up n wait. Room is below expectation Everything look n feel so old Cleanliness is below expectation The corridor smell rotten Not a good experience staying there
Libby sofa very old and dirty

Generally was a clean room. Mattress was comfy but pillows were too soft n low not the usual feather down one would expect. Only a few cable channels and youtube access. Tried to connect laptop to hdmi tv but unsuccessful as room wifi was not working. Breakfast was a simple bento sent to room. No bidet in toilet.
