Location was great, within walking distance to alot of eateries, malls & movies.
strategic location makes it easy for us who bring 2 toddlers to go easily. clean rooms, friendly staff.
Staff ramah
Hotel is abit old and rusty

The staff very kind, I was supposed to pay another cost for late checkout. When I explain to the staff that I was Lost because i was wrong get the bus, he said ok you dont have to pay for late check out
It's a bit out of Orchard Road and not really in the shopping area.
walking distance to Orchard Road
City center just around Orchard Road. The room is just good enough for resting after all-day activity
Excellent location to go shopping
Awesome location very close to public transit, rooftop pool tons of shopping nearby. 10/10 would recommend
Service was horrible. Staff were very rude and the room was hap hazard
The breakfast wasn't good
excellent as always
good location
great for money and comfortable
Terrible place, no rooms with balcony available, no smoking in the entire hotel and the worst breakfast ever had.
Car park is very expensive. Room is not too bad. Good for short and budget stay.
It was a very convenient and relaxing stay for me, my mother and my mother-in-law. Very near to train stations, malls, restaurants

I was having meeting at the hotel is very strategic to the place I was going to. Brought my spouse also, and she was happy to be able to walk around Orchard Road on her own since the hotel is nearby. No complaints
Bit more choice of tv channels would be nice.
Staff are great hotel has good vibe

reviews.review_title: It is in heart of the city so convenient”
reviews.review_comment: If you want to be in heart of the city.........this is it.

reviews.review_title: Great location for shopping on Orchard road”
reviews.review_comment: Pros we’re the great location and very competent and helpful manager, Dimitri. The hotel caters primarily for guests from India. Rooms were small, but clean and functional. Major downside is the terrible breakfast buffet and shabby restaurant.
Typically Singapore service, no smile "Receptionist only"
Great Stay. Great Price.. Cosy and Clean..
No shampoo and conditioner are provided.
Can't complain, pretty good place.
The beauty of this hotel is the location - a 2 minute walk to Somerset with the MRT, shops and restaurants. The hotel itself is ok. Clean and good value for money.

reviews.review_title: I dont have chance to stay at this hotel, since Singapore “Red” for the Corona Virus, ”
reviews.review_comment: I felt disappointed since wasted my money then I cant reschedule the hotel although I have written an email to agoda if it is possible to reschedul since Singapor “ Red” condition for the Corona Virus, for my safety I postphone my travel, luckly I can reschedul the ticket but not for the hotel

reviews.review_title: Poor experience dominated by staff with attitude”
reviews.review_comment: A decent hotel in central SG - good price considering location - is spoiled by staff who go on the attack when you ask for reasons behind some decisions. Considering i paid in advance, i was surprised to be asked for a S$50 deposit. When i questioned this there appeared to be no reason so i was met with wishy-washy responses like 'we'll tell the management'. But this response was from the Duty Manager. Who was he going to tell? Himself? On checking out i asked for a receipt. The person behind the counter said i should ask Agoda, so I asked why they couldn't supply one and i got less than friendly response followed by the person staring at the desk for the rest of the conversation and mumbling 'uh-huh, uh-huh, yes I AM Listening.' Although they clearly has no interest in listening. All in all guest relations seemed more in line with prisons, than a hotel. It made the last guests half-eaten cake and snacks that i found in my fridge no more than an unhygienic after-thought.
I will not recommend any my family and friends, staff are rude and not helpful
Restaurant does not cater for Australians and there is no option for a decent evening meal.

The room is not that spacious. But the location is perfect for you who only stayed 24 hour in Singapore. We came during the corona virus. So when we arrived the staff checking our body temprature before we going inside the lobby. The staff was super nice she even offer us a late check out, since we check-in pretty much late too.
The hotel is too old and not up to the 4 star standard. Staff seem busy with bus loads of tourists and have little time if you are not on one of the tour buses they operate.
no reviews because we were not able to push thru with our travel to sg and stay at the hotel because of the corona virus scare..we tried to ask for a reconsideration but no response.thanks anyway..

reviews.review_title: Breakfast was served as if you’re in a third world country. Food trays are always empty. ”
reviews.review_comment: Room needs more attention in cleanliness.
Not very convenient to reach town
close to orchard road and mrt somerset. Room is basic but clean. Consider good price for Singapore standard.
If any of you are looking for a hotel which located in Orchard, I would like to recommend this hotel.
Best location, clean and comfort
Overall Good Only If They Could Put Water Hose Near The The Toilet Bowl For Ppl To Wash Up After Doing (Business) will be good. Housekeeping very friendly and doing good job.
no comment
Breakfast was very below standard. Nothing tempting. Location of Hotel is good.
Room is so dusty. not clean. Also not handbook for water tool which hotel provided. Staff does not change towel for guess

reviews.review_title: Not chean hotel, Absolute NOT a 4 star”
reviews.review_comment: I had book 5 nights 14 -19 Jan in this hotel, and that was a BIG mistake. The hotel as Agoda say its a 4 star hotel but its not even a 3 stars worth. Hotel lobby as hallway have a bad smell, room was even worse..bathroom have a smell like a public toilet (urine) the bedsheet was dirty and strongly change after 1 night. Feel likethere are flees in the room

reviews.review_title: We had a very pleasant stay”
reviews.review_comment: We had a very pleasant stay
Elevators not working properly and very slow, too crowded
Very old and very nasty hotel. Full of chinese tourists. The hallways are dark and gloomy, and there were a lot of shady people. Only good for those just wanting a sleep and checking out the next day
Great location and access to train station and restaurants. Worth the money and good stay on our booking.
Best value for money.
I am happy because a lot of mall at surounding of hotel
Hotel needs badly renovation. The room has very unpleasant smell. And the interior is rundown.
nice place in orchard in a budget price, the room is enought for a couple, very cold AC, Near Sommersert. Decent place to stay.

reviews.review_title: Breakfast is limited, few dishes only”
reviews.review_comment: Staff at receiving door (for breakfast ) is not good, not friendly
Good place and hygiene

Location is the winning chip for this hotel. It is close to Orchard malls, the post office and the MRT. There is also a small Hawker place a block towards Orchard Road. ON the other hand, I suspect the hotel has been around for some time now and it is quite obvious with some of its room facilities. The staff can also use some upgrade or refresher on hospitality and clientele relations. I am sure some adjustments will make this hotel a high contender for more clientele, even more than it already is.
The standard of the hotel is not as it has been rated. New owner but the hotel is not fresh, clean and tidy
Location is great, centre of Singapore
Good location but too expensive. The room is very small. There are much better hotels than this.

The location is best between Somerset and Dhoby Ghaut station. Lots of shopping malls within few mins walk(unless you hate walking under Singapore’s hot scorching sun). Hotel itself is just okay average; during my check in there were lack of front desk agents and they were too preoccupied with themselves + when asked for room service at early morning, staff were saying that we need to wait until the housekeeping clock in which is very unprofessional (not to mention the tone of annoyance on the phone). Room-wise, the hot water dispenser is very useful however, placed too high, probably suitable for tall guests, but it would be difficult for shorter people to see into the cup (very dangerous for hot water). Body wash/shampoo wasn’t filled up enough upon check in; room wasn’t prepared thoroughly. Other than that everything’s great great. It’s a good location and price and hotel with enough facilities, if the service improves I believe guests will feel more welcomed&comfortable!

Hotel is located next street of Orchad, location is very good for being in Center. Rooms and baths are too small, you just pay this price for location, if you don't interest on Orchad you can check for Hotels/Apartments in other regions better than there, but if you are looking to be around Orchad and would like to go room for just sleeping, that's very good. I just had unexpected visit and made reservation just after I landed to Singapore, for that situation i didn't have too much option and it was fine, but If I come for holiday I do not choose this hotel for sure.
it' a good hotel with helpful staff.

reviews.review_title: Swimming pool on rooftop is excellent but the room and hall way ugly. Bad ambience ”
reviews.review_comment: Swimming pool on rooftop is excellent but the room and hall way are ugly
Hotel Chancellor location is near MRT, Full room amenities include a dispenser.
Everything was perfect and loved the location close to everything.

Yes, the location is fabulous! The room satisfactory. Decor tired but the linen was white and fresh. Wasn't keen on the waterheater for a cup of tea. Confusing to operate. Minimal tea/coffee satchets (2 x teabags) Staff very pleasant and attentive at the front desk. Breakfast unsatisfactory. The worst I've had anywhere and I'm not fussy! Dining staff disinterested. I needed my earplugs for a good nights rest as the traffic noise disturbed me but I am a very light sleeper. Summary : Probably worthy of its 3 * status due to the location, cleanliness and the pool looked clean and inviting. Recommend eating elsewhere.
Modern and nothing special, but decent price and good location for what we wanted

No Hygenie at their breakfast. We got food poisoning from eating there plus over priced. The rooms were tiny. Tv and fridge were not working. The bathroom lock was broken. Over all not a great experience. Will never go there again.

Located on the road next to Orchard road so the popular malls MRT stations and bus stops are within wlaking distance. Room was clean. Pool is good for lap swimmers (approximately 28m long) but a little narrow which wasn't too much of an issue when we used it before 8am.
The reception was very unfriendly and arrogant

This is the mostly dirty hotel we have stay. When we check in. The toilet seat still have urine stain on it. The floor is dirty as well and once we lay down on the bed, our leg and body being to be itchy. Stay there for 3 hours max and check out. This is not even a 4star hotel. Feel like a 1star or even 0 star!!!
1. Hotel reception staff is wonderful - Ms Helen is really courteous & helpful 2. Worth e money - simple but clean facility. 3. Great location - near to MRT stations ie sommerset & dhoby ghaut

reviews.review_title: toilet very dirty when it wet . mean no cleaning at all”
reviews.review_comment: only location
House keeping staff very unhappy working there.
The room is very basic there are much better hotels for value for money
- best location - best value for money - nearby plaza singapure & orchard -near mrt sommerset - will stay here again thanks! :)

I like how the hotel room provided a water filter dispenser. Bed and pillows were comfortable, hotel breakfast was great. Good location, located near Orchard malls. There were not many amenities but the roof top pool was okay. Hotel reception service and waiting time could be improved...
Pls put a hose near the toilet bowl. Check in time at 2pm.

reviews.review_title: The location is very strategic for shoppers. ”
reviews.review_comment: The bathroom is relatively small. The facilities in the hotel room is just too basic.
check-in was fuss free, the room was clean and the WiFi is fast! love it.right smack in the cbd!

hotels.name: Pan Pacific Singapore (SG Clean Certified)
hotels.address: 7 Raffles Blvd, Marina Bay, Singapore, Singapore, 039595

reviews.review_comment: Club benefits were amazing! The room was huge, we had free flow champagne breakfast and free flow alcohol during Canapés. There’s the afternoon tea set too but we didn’t go for it because we were out during that timing. Overall, 10/10 experience. Would come back to book with Pan Pac again :)

Really enjoyed my stay in February, very friendly staff and lovely facilities. I requested a view of marina bay which was spectacular, one thing I would make better would be to broaden the room service menu slightly as there wasn’t much to choose from. Thank you.

reviews.review_title: Good location and nice room view”
reviews.review_comment: Booked the panoramic room. Cosy room with big bathtub. Views were amazing
Indoor kid play ground …….I book the slot for one hour, but the staff let us go at 45 mins… they need wear sock but there is no obvious place to find this notice.
Thanks Pan Pacific enjoyed our stay!! Love the room the room was so comfortable.

I booked a staycation with my gf, stayed at the deluxe balcony room type. Honestly it has the best view in my opinion with the price I had paid for. Marina Square on the left, Suntec on the right. Promenade mrt 2 mins walk. Recommend to everyone!

Connecting room was given about 3 hours late and it was inconvenient as we have baby that need to sleep at that time. So end up we received the key to the room at about 6pm, after 2 visits to the reception.
Love the facilties they have for kids and very family friendly.
Pan Pacific hotel has one of the best location in Singapore! Staff services are attentive and polite. Clean room but room services are a bit slow though. Overall highly recommended.
Generally good stay with nice breakfast option.. only issue we have is the bed.. Probably old bed amd so very soft .. cannot sleep well .
My family of 5 enjoyed our stay at the hotel. My kids had a great time at the pool and at the Urban Jungle Village. 😊

The hotel was so pleasant to stay,the hotel staffs were very attentive and friendly.Thanks to staff Abishi at the reception who patiently checked me in and made my stay at the hotel a blast with a nice view room!!!..Super love the view!!!..Thank u Pan Pacific Hotel for making my stay a memorable one and I will definitely return and make more memories!!
Very happy with this hotel.
My 8-year old enjoyed the stay. The hotel room was kinda of old style but the overall stay was enjoyable.

I booked for a connecting room deluxe as i have younger childrens so i thought it would be easier for the family. Upon checking in, the staff said there's "no more conneting rooms" already which i find odd because i did my bookings 3 months in advance. The staff gave me 2 separate rooms. It was side by side but not connected. It was so annoying as i have to walk over a pillar just to get to another room. Other than that, all the staffs are great, welcoming and accommodating. The kids love the pool. Other than the room bookings, will recommend to my friends/family for sure.

reviews.review_title: Great rooms, great service, great location, will return ”
reviews.review_comment: Amazing friendly service by reception, big and clean rooms including a huge bathroom, nice wide LCD tv, very comfy bed, great shower area, nice branded toiletries, huge gym with many machines. What's not so good: lack of coffee machines in the room (for a hotel in this price range a nespresso machine is a must), small swimming pool. Overall very comfortable stay would definitely return

reviews.review_title: My first experience with Pan Pac”
reviews.review_comment: My wife and I arrived at the Pan Pacific for our first staycation in this hotel at 3 pm on Monday, 7 of March. We were promptly met at the entrance by an elderly bell boy who helped unloaded our two pieces of luggage and carried them all the way to the Reception Counter. Kudos to this gentleman for exhibiting this level of sterling service. Unfortunately whatever good impression our elderly gentleman gave me of this hotel was all eroded once I was at Reception. A very wooden looking Shawn processed my check in in the most officious and functional way possible, without any smile or any extra ounce of effort to get any of the freebies my wife asked for as a newly minted Pan Pac member. All requests were faced with the same response - No you can’t. Of course I acknowledge that this young gentleman was most likely not empowered to do more than the paper work but at least he has to be trained how to say no or decline any requests politely, cheerfully and regretfully right? Well, this is not the end. The last straw of this unwelcoming reception happened when our dear Shawn said in an extremely condescending tone ‘So you know how to use the free wifi right? Your room number followed by your surname!’ Under normal circumstances, I would have said yes and then walked off but because of his tone, I asked him, ‘So what is my surname?’ And expectedly, he said ‘Chiew’ in an extremely sheepish manner as obviously my surname is ‘Hon’ as I am Hon Chiew Weng! I don’t want to break Shawn’s rice bowl or cause him distress but if he wishes to continue doing this job at your hotel, he has to go for a lot of customer service training! Thank goodness I checked into my room and was instantly happy again! The room was clean, spacious and with a fantastic pool view (contrary to what Shawn said about me facing Suntec City because I paid for the lowest room class)!
Will stay here again! Awesome facilities

Awesome experience! Best hotel so far. Staff is friendly. Unfortunately its not a halal restaurant, but its okay, you can find food nearby, eg: suntec city, marina square. Definitely its ‘a must go’ again! ✌🏽
Enjoyed our stay there as staff were polite and assisted with all our needs. We are now liasing with them to hold our wedding banquet at Pan Pacific
No WOW factor.
Very big and comfortable bed. Clean and timely making up of room.
Hotel was perfect. Kids love it

It was a pleasant stay with friendly n helpful staff especially Miss Stella Ng. Mr Andrew at the pool was always with a cheerful disposition tat brighten our day. Thank u Pan Pacific. Will definately staying there again
My elderly mum and her caregiver enjoyed their staycation and everyone had been pleasant, helpful and just nice... Thank you

TLDR: If you are looking for a hotel with great service and compassion, please look for somewhere else. We had a non-cancellable reservation for 24 Feb. One of us got Covid on 20 Feb. We started emailing and messaging the hotel daily since 20 Feb but the first reply we received was on 23 Feb. We appealed to the hotel to change our dates but the hotel was adamant about maintaining their no date change policy. Agoda's support even said, "As of now your booking is still valid, just in case you change your mind and decide to use it." As if it is possible to change our minds and un-have Covid!!! We understand the booking policy of the hotel. But we also know of other five star hotels with similar policies which are more flexible in this covid situation. We managed to give away the booking to someone else late in the night. Even though Agoda's room facilities labeled balcony / terrace, they were given a room without one. Pan Pacific used to be a great place to stay but this incident has shown that the service has dropped significantly, showing neither compassion, flexibility nor an accurate representation of the room's facilities. If Pan Pacific management is reading this, I urge you to rethink your flexibility. It would be terrible to force other people to go to your property when they are unwell and spread the virus even further. Thank you.
Good Location & Comfortable stay

reviews.review_title: ROOM IS GREAT BED IS DIRTY”
reviews.review_comment: Everything is perfect except the bed and tower is very dirty and smelly. Not sure why tho.

I should have requested to change the room! I was greeted with musty smell when I entered the room. The smell was gone after I had gotten used to it. I wanted to blame it on my sensitive nose and skin - I wore T-shirt and shorts to sleep and all the exposed areas were itchy. Some areas had rashes and raised bumps. Each time I turned on the bed, there was musty smell. I asked myself whether the smell could be from the disinfection spray the hotel used. Anyway, I will not attempt another itch-cation in this hotel.

Got informed a week prior to my stay that Pan Pacific is a quarantine hotel and that they offered to relocate me to Parkroyal Marina Bay. Thus my review is based on Parkroyal Marina Bay. Really grand hotel when looking from the outside. But room is a little dated and not exactly clean. The floor has marks from previous occupants and the toilet walls are black with fungus. Customer service is terrible. Upon checking in, no one informed us that the hairdryer in the toilet cannot be used. We only learnt that it was not supposed to be used after my mother turned it on and it caused a spark that sizzled and lit up the room and caused blackout. Their room cleaning staff told us it cannot be used that’s why they placed another one in the clothes cabinet for us to use instead. To that I ask, how would we know, if your customer service didn’t tell us or even leave a note in the room to inform us? Their breakfast is buffet style and we had a young girl serving us at the bread counter. She served another customer bread and accidentally dropped one piece on the counter. The customer picked it up using his bare hands and placed it back on the breadplate and asked for a new piece. After giving him a new piece, she just proceeded to rearrange the dropped bread nicely like it never was dropped and ready to be served to the next customer. Really appalling from a hotel. Will not recommend to anyone.
Amazing room, view. Cant ask for more.
Beautiful and clean hotel.. Nice swimming pool...we loves the room and will come back again to the hotel.
nil

Can’t believe this was sent to me as I didn’t even get to stay at the Pan Pacific because it was being used for SHN hotel and I didn’t even get informed! Complained fo agoda for not informing me and never even had a reply.

considering covid, i think it was good. Wait time was a little long, breakfast was slow acceptable for circumstance, but there were cockroaches in the room, which was disappointing for a hotel of such stature
Great team with awesome service. Clean and nice view.
Stay during CNY 2021, it was nice and relax.
near to mrt, great location & many food outlets nearby
Our preferred hotel for staycation
Located just above Marina Square which is link to suntec. Perfect location for shopping and dining. Amenities wise is perfect love their service .
Service and room were great, location too!
Staff was friendly and gave us late checkout 🤍 it was a beautiful experience during our honeymoon
Thoroughly enjoyed ourselves. Will be back.
Very accessible
This is my 2nd staycation within a month with the same property. Should say a lot about this property with repeated stays 👍
Old Hotel.. Kinda square.. Balcony was a plus.. But would have preferred a newer and larger room. Location can't go wrong w malls connected and food is aplenty

Given that we booked this place for our post cross-island hike retreat, the location is a god-send (direct access to multiple malls and dining options). The skyline suite that we booked was spacious, with a great view to boot.

We had an awesome stay here during my birthday! Check in was smooth and staff are friendly. I was so happy with the birthday complimentary pastries and with the birthday note. The room was amazing. I love the bathtub and the window view. Breakfast buffet was great too! No complaints, all compliments. Thank you!
Booked panoramic room, located at high floor with nice view. King size bed sufficient for couple with 1 young toddler. Breakfast spread has wide variety of food
Excellent service especially to the staff in club lounge sir Jayrick!.. we enjoy our staycation..
I enjoyed my stay in pan pacific and it’s the best hotel I ever stay in sg so far. The staff is all very friendly as well. The hotel itself is also very clean and comfy.
Location & cleaned. Wonderful staffs

Great staycation experience here at Pan Pacific! We must commend on the great hospitality provided by each and every staff that attended to us. This is our 2nd time back at Pan Pacific and will definitely return there again!
Its our normal staycay. Rooms are big and location is great for us to travel around for dining and movies.
Room spaces. Staffs very helpful. Good location for shopping. In future will stay here again.
Good place for rest n relax
Very comfortable bed, friendly and helpful staff, good breakfast, and the list goes on.
Best hotel too relax with friend and family. The room is big and clean.

Some hiccups happened before and after check-in. But our concerns are promptly settled by Mr Abel ultimately. He’s very friendly and responsive. Generally, we had a good experience and will consider coming back again due to Mr Abel’s great follow up.
I like the facilities and their restaurants
Good location. I booked harbour room with nice view. Swimming pool just meh and crowded.. the rest was alright.. breakfast was good too

Thank you to Pan Pacific for going the extra mile to make our honeymoon such an unforgettable experience. They upgraded our room and offered to store our wedding cake. The afternoon tea and evening cocktails and Champaign breakfast were all on point and the food was absolutely delicious!

reviews.review_title: Overall ok but needs some improvement. ”
reviews.review_comment: Long queue during check-in but it was swiftly resolved within 15 mins, kudos to front desk team. Some usual vanities were not provided, like comb/shaver/sanitary bag. There were also orange stains on the bath towel provided in room. We were not aware that housekeeping will only be arrange via phone/in-house app and not for every room. So when we were leaving our room, we tried to get the attention of a housekeeping staff who happened to be cleaning up the room next to ours. But the staff did not sound very happy about it and told us "not me, not me." which surprised us. Maybe this form of communication can be improved with further training. Overall we find our stay overpriced for such service standards.
Very clean and good location
Very nice hotel, all the staff is very goo.

Although we were asked to get bucket of ice ourselves which was unexpected for this best service hotel (please have it send to the room as par to the room service please) everything else was EXCEPTIONAL. From getting greeted from the entrance and great hotel facilities and leaving the hotel. Never have we ever received such warm hospitality. It’s the little things that matter. Thank you for making the difference! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
Easy access to near by shopping mall. Friendly staffs and rooms very clean and neat.

Great view, great location - accessible to malls, importantly its swimming pool is shaded most of the time by its building and hence giving great pleasure swimming without worrying much about getting burnt

Good location, pleasant and very friendly staffs, room very neat and cosy, room with bathtub is great so go for panoramic, conplimentary carprk available and very near shopping center for food or shopping.

Beautiful hotel! Overall it was a pleasant stay. Carpets in room seemed dated & needed a good wash. Shower drain seemed to be easily clogged. Checking in process was smooth & seamless. Early check in & late check out; room on high floor granted without much fuss.
Enjoyed my stay from start till finish. The staff were friendly and attentive. Please keep this up! Will definitely return to stay!

Longer check in 1.5hours due tp high occupancy. But staff did their best to manage the crowd. Breakfast apps is block due to hotel full. However we were advise to just walk in. Overall it was a pleasant experienced.

The best hotel with great location because its just beside 2 shopping centres, Marina Square and Suntec city mall. Fantastic view of the city from the 29th floor of the room. Good range of breakfast during this Covid period as they offer sitting down buffet. Just use the QR code to order and the food will be delivered to your table. The only downside for me was the cleanliness of the room. Can be improved. Rating cleanliness 3.5/5 since its the pandemic period right now and cleanliness would be one of the main issues that customers might look into. Overall, great stay with friendly staff everywhere.

Swimming pool was over crowded though staff claimed is under quota of 83. No control of booking time, thus, defeat the purpose of booking the time slot. Food wise, not too bad for 5 stars hotel. Overall still acceptable. Of course, going for a vacation is more worth!
I enjoyed my staycation here last December and will definitely comeback.
amazing view !
Booked Harbor View - the room is amazing, spacious and clean. The staff is nice, friendly and helpful. One of the best hotel that we've stayed at, we'll definitely come back again.

I was in a Long Q with a stroller, luggage and badly behaved toddler in tow. I was really feeling stressed up. Jimmy from Front Desk approached me and swiftly brought me to another check in area. Knowing the situation, he even brought a colleague, Sam who tried to befriend my 4yo. They became fast friends, holding hands and walking alongside me. Instantly, I felt a wave of relief! This is the first time I experience help outside and I greatly appreciate it! While I did my check-in, I overheard Sam negotiating with my little one that if he can get in the pram, he will get him some chocolates while Jimmy kept watch. Everything went smoothly, I even had a nice room upgrade for my toddler’s birthday! This is the most impressive service I have received from any hotel so far! Thank u Pan Pacific for going the extra mile to make my day less stressful. Having a meltdown before the day started was no joke and I’m thankful for Jimmy and Sam. They deserve a recognition award for what they have done! I will always remember these 2 names in association with Pan Pacific and the great service standard! Highly recommended hotel to stay in!

reviews.review_title: Great stay with nice view and breakfast”
reviews.review_comment: Staff was helpful when checking in and out.great thanks to Vivien for the arrangement.our view was nice and at high level.the breakfast was nice and good price when booking thru agoda and the staff was friendly.the free parking was also the main consider of booking this hotel.

reviews.review_title: One of my best staycays in SG”
reviews.review_comment: Check in was smooth with friendly and helpful staff around controlling crowds. Room was perfect, enjoyed our stay. Will be back again definitely!

Excellent stay at Pan Pacific, great bed, clean room. Long queue before check in during Valentine but the hotel staffs managed it well with efficiency. Breakfast at Edge was great. Service was good and fast with yummy food
verification process is ???

reviews.review_title: Celebrated our anniversary at pan pacific , the hotel staff are very kind and amazing in assist.”
reviews.review_comment: Many more special thanks to Ms.Amanda who had assist and surprised us with sweets and arrangements to our anniversary, thankyou amanda , we wish to celebrate there again

reviews.review_title: SHN well taken care, hotel PPCARES standard up there”
reviews.review_comment: I took one more night stay out of my original two nights stay. Frequent Sanitization and well segregated from SHN guests from the hotel management make me safe to stay with them extra one night to make it 3nights in all.

Location convenient, want to shopping at Marina Square or Suntec City or Millenia Walk is within walking steps. Breakfast though in virus season and yet the food options plenty of choices. Food serve is fast and efficient. Dinner buffet at Edge restaurant is also very high standard and staffs always serve with their excellent service in speed, tip top food fresh food and always top up your drink and clear your empty dishes without your say. I have no complains. Harbour Studio Room I stay very spacious. Room very clean and Harbour view very spectacular. Worth the price worth the stay

Second stay and I still love it as much as the first time. The hotel is beautiful, the room is clean, modern and spacious. Facilities are great with easy access to the bay area and some shopping malls around the area. Best of all is the warm and attentive services provided by every single employee at the hotel. Definitely one of the top 5 stars hotel in Singapore
Room was nice. Place was great. Feels nice. Just hoped for the check in to be faster as there was a crowd st check in.
The hotel is well maintained. Marina bay view was great!
Friendly staff and excellent location
Very fast and hassle free
Excellent property with centralised location. Easily recommended

Was sceptical at first when I read all the reviews regarding the cleanliness and all but I had a lovely experience with Pan Pacific. The check in and check out process was fuss free. Booking for the breakfast was really fuss free. Didn’t get to try the pool as it was the rainy season. The room is really wonderful and very clean eventhough we didn’t get a nice view but it was alright. All the basic amenities in the room was provided. They even arranged for a slice of cake to be delivered since we are celebrating our anniversary.
Its our first staycation as a family and it was a great stay. The bathtub is spacious, we all enjoyed the bath. Room is spacious which we like alot.
Expensive, old and dark room and lobby. Not all harbour rooms have balcony. Smaller actual room compared to the size of the booked room.
Value for money, spacious room, good view and location. Linked to Suntec, Marina Square and Millennia and nearby mrt Station.

Worst hotel stay i ever had. Did not seemed to be a 5 star standard. Don’t bother with the paranomic room, small, nothing special and view was bad. Also. definitely not recommended for anyone who finds water as essential (hotel charge for $3 per bottle beyond what is provided in the room). Had to go to the lobby to collect bucket of ice ourselves and go all the way up to 29th floor with crowd of people waiting for the lift (yeah its 5 star service don’t be surprised). Spoke to the duty manager and even he agreed this is the first hotel he had experienced with such regulations. Fridge was locked for no reason (despite no mini bar snacks at all when we checked in) and we had to make several phone calls before we could eventually retrieve our personal food items from the fridge at check out. Hotel Technician had to dismantle the whole fridge door to figure out whats wrong with it. Finally, we stormed off with a really bad experience. With the amount of money, suggest travelers to go elsewhere. Really not recommended at all. The only good thing is, location is near shopping malls, thats it.

I booked the hotel staycation for my boy 1st birthday 2 months ago. I was worried about the check in process since there was a surge in staycation due to the Singapore vouchers. However, my worries are all nothing. I checked in early and got an upgrade to panaroma room as it was my boy birthday. Check in was fast and the front counters has many staffs to direct us for fast check in. Room was clean and sound proof was good. I wasn't too worried if my boy cry in the night. Morning breakfast never fails to impress us.. We didn't get to swim as it was very rainy. The only inconvenience is when you have a stroller and it is raining. The exits to the mall on 2nd floor were all closed and only level 1 exit to marina square mall is open. But there is only escalator available. Another option is via the main entrance but if it is a rainy day, then it will be very inconvenience. Overall, we enjoyed our stay and will return again...
Frontdesk staff had impeccable service, I was impressed with how friendly they were and the fuss-free check-in. Loved the view from the Panaromic room, which was spacious with a comfy bed.

reviews.review_title: There's always room for improvement esp.in service area”
reviews.review_comment: Room- stay in De luxe balcony not that big or small either quite ok it has a partial view of marina bay view Cleanliness- if your working in a cleaning company and doing some routine work inspection then you can easily spot dust and hairs in the room especially in toilet Breakfast- not really enjoying the breakfast i asked the lady if they could give us a drink promise us she will get back to us waited for 20mins but no drinks come, so we politely ask another lady who clean the next table to us if she could serve us some drinks and she immediately gave us some juice,for 3person they only served us 1 small plate of fruits and 1 yoghurt,1 small plate of bread not a big deal cos im not heavy eater during breakfast (it's covid so buffet not allowed that's why they just send the food to your table) Overall experience during my stay not a happy one but looking forward that they can improve a lot better so the next stay what we always remember is a pleasant and happy experience during our stay. Cheers!

Had a wonderful 2 nights stay in Pan Pac. Receptionist Risse are exceptionally friendly and helpful! My 7yo son love the hotel it at first sight while we had high tea on Oct. He has requested to stay in the hotel and I apprreciate the experience didnt dissapointed both of us!
